If the characters do visit {@creature Mirt|WDH}'s manor, there's a {@chance 90|90 percent chance} that {@creature Mirt|WDH} isn't home and no one answers the door.

rows: "One of the drays working in the city is pulled by a talking mare named {@creature Maxeene|wdh}. Locate her, find out if she's learned the identity of any Zhent operatives, and if so, determine their whereabouts."

Characters can find {@creature Maxeene|WDH}, a {@creature draft horse} with an Intelligence score of 10, with a successful DC 13 Intelligence (Investigation) check. {@creature Maxeene|WDH} speaks Common, and characters must try to convince her that they're Harpers by making a DC 13 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the horse recalls giving a ride to a sun elf and his half-orc bodyguard two days ago; she picked them up at an intersection (she doesn't recall which one) and dropped them off at the Yawning Portal. They talked about hiring spies to root out Xanathar Guild hideouts in the city. {@creature Maxeene|WDH}'s descriptions of the passengers match the appearances of {@creature Davil Starsong|WDH} and {@creature Yagra Stonefist|wdh}. {@i Reward}: Each Harper character gains 1 renown.
"乌扎-索利泽夫是一个老妇人，她在贸易区索恩街的一栋狭窄的三层楼里卖书。她声称在她的店里困住了一只怪物，并担心她的书和她的猫的安全。鉴于乌扎喜欢说大话，城市守望者不可能伸出援手，但哈珀斯夫妇欠她一个人情。你会发现她在费尔祖恩的幸福里啜泣，那是一家位于索恩街和萨拉巴街拐角处的酒馆。快点！"

Uza (LG female human Mulan {@creature commoner}) describes the threat as a "monstrous orb of many eyes" that chased her cat, Fillipa, into the shop. The monster is, in fact, a {@creature gazer|VGM} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). If the characters met a gazer in chapter 1, they know what they're up against. Uza lends them the keys to the front and back doors of her shop. Characters find the interior in shambles and hear a cat meowing on the third floor. The sounds are coming from the gazer, which is hunting Fillipa. The cat has so far eluded the nasty little predator. {@i Reward}: Each Harper character gains 1 renown if the gazer is defeated. Uza also gives the party a used spellbook containing four {@filter 1st-level|spells|class=wizard|level=1} and three {@filter 2nd-level|spells|class=wizard|level=2} wizard spells.
"我们的一个成员，Mattrim Mereg，与一帮二重身的人结盟，认为哈珀人应该招募他们。我们需要一个没有偏见的意见。追踪并与每个二重身的人交谈，衡量他们的可信度。"

The characters must speak with five {@creature doppelganger||doppelgangers}, starting with their leader, "{@creature Bonnie|WDH}," who works at the Yawning Portal. She needs a few days to round up the other doppelgangers, who agree to meet at the tavern in human guises. Characters must interview each doppelganger and succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom (Insight) check to ascertain its trustworthiness. Only "{@creature Bonnie|WDH}" is trustworthy. {@i Reward}: Each Harper character gains 2 renown. Every contributing party member receives 50 gp.

"Lady {@creature Remallia Haventree|WDH} is hosting a party at House Ulbrinter, her villa on Delzorin Street, located between Vhezoar Street and Brondar's Way in the North Ward. We have reason to suspect that drow spies have infiltrated the guest list. Attend the party and root out the disguised drow. Dress sharply."

{@creature Remallia Haventree|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）知道这个任务，但并没有向人物透露她是哈珀人。有一个鸦人间谍在场。{@creature Jarlaxle Baenre|WDH} (见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12})。他用他的{@item hat of disguise}作为一个来自Luskan的年轻演员出现，名叫Erystian Demarne。需要成功地进行DC24智慧（洞察力）检查，以找出贾拉索。他对这些敏锐的冒险家留下了深刻的印象，感谢哈文特女士给他带来了一个愉快的夜晚，然后匆匆离去，但并没有先向揭发他的人物致敬。{@i Reward}: 每个哈珀角色获得2个名声。每个参加聚会的成员都会得到200金币。

entries.name: Lords' Alliance
entries: 将城市和王国的安全置于自身利益之上的角色被邀请加入该派别。潜在的被招募者必须是水底世界的居民。

entries.name: Jalester Silvermane
entries: 人物的主要联系人是{@creature Jalester Silvermane|WDH}(见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12})，他是一个向开放领主{@creature Laeral Silverhand|WDH}汇报的外勤特工。杰莱斯特大部分时间都在 "打哈欠的门 "和其他冒险者经常光顾的酒馆中度过。
杰莱斯特为符合条件的人提供领主联盟的成员资格。成员应及时、专业地完成分配给他们的任何任务。拒绝接受或完成任务会导致被停职或开除。被停职的联盟成员在停职结束前不会收到任何联盟任务，而被开除则意味着失去成员资格，并失去在该派别中的所有声望。

rows: "一场帮派战争正在引起整个城市的动荡。我们已经向扫地僧公会的成员提供保护，你被指派保护他们中的一群人。六点在码头区船街的骡牛酒馆与他们见面，在他们工作时保护他们。每天都要这样做，持续一个工作日。"

每天早上，人物与四名扫粪工({@creature commoner||commoners})会面，并前往贸易区，扫粪工们在那里花一天时间清理街道上的垃圾。这是很无聊的工作。第九天，大约在高阳时分，一辆{@creature carrion crawler}从附近的小巷中出现，被两个城市守卫{@creature guard||guards}追赶。人物可以帮助杀死这个从下水道上来的腐尸爬行者。{@i Reward}: 每个领主联盟的角色获得1个名声。

"Harko Swornhold, an evil adventurer who was exiled three years ago for attempting to bribe a city magistrate, has returned to Waterdeep illegally. We think the Xanathar Guild is using him to incite violence. He was last seen recruiting kenku in the Dock Ward. Find him and quietly put him to the sword."
在获得三次失败之前，无论哪个角色带领的搜索必须成功进行三次DC14智力（调查）检查，每次检查代表8小时的调查。其他角色可以协助，给予检查的优势。哈科（{@creature bandit captain}）有两个{@creature kenku}同伴在他身边战斗。{@i Reward}: 每个领主联盟人物获得1个声望。
"Zhents "正在追求一个名叫Esloon Bezant的泰族红袍巫师，试图将他的暴徒团伙加入他们的队伍。我们对他的了解是，他几年前逃离了自己的家乡，而且很聪明，不会因为做违法的事情而被抓住。他和他的那帮恶棍在码头区游荡。破坏交易，而且要快！"

The characters can create a rift between the Zhentarim and Esloon's gang by sowing rumors of betrayal. They must spend 25 gp in bribes and succeed on a DC 16 Charisma (Deception or Persuasion) check. Conversely, they can confront Esloon Bezant (LE male Thayan human {@creature mage}) and his gang of five {@creature thug||thugs} and either defeat them or bribe them with at least 500 gp. {@i Reward}: Each Lords' Alliance character gains 2 renown. The characters can also deprive Esloon of his spellbook, which contains all the spells he has prepared.
"城市守望被最近激增的暴力事件压得喘不过气来，需要我们的帮助。我们有报告说，一个刺客在屋顶上徘徊，用箭射杀目标，惊动了市民。我的消息来源说，他在巨魔胡同附近的某处落脚。找到他，提醒城市守望者注意他的行踪，如果可以的话，协助逮捕他。不要杀他，因为那样做会使暴力进一步升级。"

Whichever character leads the hunt must succeed on three DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) checks before gaining three failures, with each check representing 8 hours of investigation. Other characters can assist, granting advantage on the checks. If the search succeeds, characters corner the assassin, {@creature Ziraj the Hunter|WDH} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}), in the greenhouse of Corellon's Crown in Trollskull Alley ({@area T4|09f}). Ziraj surrenders to the City Watch without a fight, believing that his fellow Zhents will find a way to free him. {@i Reward}: Each Lords' Alliance character gains 2 renown. Every character who aids in Ziraj's capture receives 50 gp.

entries.name: Order of the Gauntlet
entries: 高塔骑士团寻找的是那些寻求与各种形式的邪恶作斗争的成员。崇拜赫尔姆、托尔姆或泰尔的冒险者尤其受到追捧。

entries.name: Savra Belabranta
entries: If the party includes one or more likely recruits, Savra Belabranta (NG female Tethyrian human {@creature knight}) visits the characters' residence and invites them to the Halls of Justice, the temple of Tyr (located west of the Market in the Castle Ward), where they can be sworn into the order. The swearing-in ceremony involves the recitation of an oath to find and destroy evil in all its forms. The oath is spoken while every candidate wears a silver gauntlet (a symbol of the order). After the ceremony, Savra gives new recruits their first mission.
贝拉布兰塔家族是一个沃特达维亚的贵族家庭，为狮鹫骑兵队饲养狮鹫。萨芙拉正试图通过为泰尔服务来恢复她的荣誉，从而为她作为一个名为 "嚎叫的仇恨 "的邪恶元素邪教成员所犯下的邪恶行为赎罪。萨瓦拉的罪过与这次冒险无关，但你可以在{@adventure Princes of the Apocalypse|pota}中了解更多关于她的过去。每当她有任务给人物时，她会亲自向他们传达信条。

rows: "We hear that the Zhents are paying gangs in the Field Ward to attack suspected Xanathar Guild members. Fights are breaking out in the ward daily. Stop a fight before it happens. We need to send a message to these thugs that further altercations won't be tolerated."

The characters must visit the Field Ward and, as a fight threatens to break out, make three successful DC 12 Charisma (Intimidation) checks before failing three checks, or else defeat four {@creature thug||thugs} (preferably without killing them) to disperse the would-be brawlers. {@i Reward}: Each Order of the Gauntlet character gains 1 renown.

"A notorious thief called the {@creature Black Viper|WDH}, long thought dead, has apparently returned to Waterdeep. She has already robbed at least a dozen noble estates. No one knows her identity because she wears a mask, but it was reported in The Waterdeep Wazoo that she's a noble. Find out what else the broadsheet's publisher knows about her and report back to me."

The characters can meet with Gaxly Rudderbust (N male Illuskan human {@creature commoner}), the publisher of The Waterdeep Wazoo, and either succeed on a DC 12 Charisma (Intimidation or Persuasion) check or bribe him with at least 50 gp. If they do so, Gaxly shares his suspicions that the {@creature Black Viper|WDH} is the secret, evil twin sister of {@creature Ammalia Cassalanter|WDH} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}), and that she wears a mask to hide a disfigurement. Interviewing the Cassalanters at their villa (see chapter 6) or conducting a day-long investigation and succeeding on a DC 15 Intelligence (Investigation) check reveals that no such person exists.  {@i Reward}: Each Order of the Gauntlet character gains 1 renown for reporting what Gaxly said.
"位于菲尔德区Endshift街的Endshift酒馆的守卫每晚都被抢劫，旅馆老板说他看到巨大的老鼠在后巷游荡。听起来很沉闷，但这是一个我们不能忽视的求救。"

The inn is being harassed by the Shard Shunners, a gang of halfling wererats, because the innkeeper's guards once threatened a gang member. To end the harassment, the characters must defeat three {@creature wererat||wererats} or scare them off with a successful DC 17 Charisma (Intimidation) check. {@i Reward}: Each Order of the Gauntlet character gains 2 renown and receives a {@item potion of healing}.
"我刚刚收到一份报告，有刺的魔鬼正在恐吓田野区的Twelvedog法院的公民。来吧，让我们一起杀了他们，并找到他们的邪恶召唤者！"

The characters must help Savra defeat five {@creature spined devil||spined devils}, which have locals pinned down in nearby buildings. Right afterward, Gysheer Omfreys (LE female Tethyrian human {@creature cult fanatic}) emerges from an alley and attacks Savra. Gysheer is an overzealous member of a devil-worshiping cult led by {@creature Victoro Cassalanter|WDH} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). Savra tries to subdue and question her, but only magical compulsion can force her to implicate Victoro. Since devil worship isn't illegal in Waterdeep, Savra has no grounds to stir up trouble with the Cassalanters, and she advises characters not to do so, either. {@i Reward}: Each Order of the Gauntlet character gains 2 renown. Every character who took part receives a {@item potion of greater healing}.

entries.name: Zhentarim
entries: The Doom Raiders try to contact evil-aligned or morally ambiguous characters. A {@creature flying snake} with a parchment tied about its body visits one character in the dead of night. The message reads:
"想成为大事件的一部分吗？请在 "打哈欠的门户 "与{@creature Davil Starsong|WDH}交谈。

If the characters seek out Davil, {@creature Yagra Stonefist|wdh} (see "Familiar Faces"), greets them and leads interested parties to a table in the center of the Yawning Portal's taproom, where her boss waits with drink in hand.

entries.name: Davil Starsong
entries: {@creature Davil Starsong|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）是这些人物在黑色网络中的主要联系人，至少在最初。在喝酒时，他分享了以下信息。

items: 达维尔是一名退休的冒险家。几年前，他和他的冒险同伴们加入了Zhentarim。他们帮助有需要的人。(更确切地说，他们提供贷款、雇佣兵和其他服务）。

Another Black Network gang has recently infiltrated the city and tried to take over the Xanathar Guild. They failed, setting off a war in the streets. Davil and his colleagues want to end the violence and restore the peace.

entries: 达维尔向感兴趣的角色提供派别成员资格，然后为他们分配第一个任务（见Zhentarim任务表）。随后的任务简报写在卷轴上，由飞蛇传递。

entries.name: Tashlyn Yafeera
entries: After the characters complete two missions for Davil, he is arrested by the City Watch and held in Castle Waterdeep while he waits to be questioned by the Lords of Waterdeep about the Black Network's operations in the city. The characters continue to receive missions, but they come from {@creature Tashlyn Yafeera|WDH} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). Characters first become aware of this change when they receive their next mission briefing, since it's written in a different hand.
如果人物想直接与塔什琳交谈，亚格拉可以安排在死亡之城或其他安静的地方见面。当人物见到她时，塔什琳已经了解了以下信息。

items: 传闻中叛逆的Zhent派系的领导人是{@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh}，一个已知的黑网刺客。
已经发出了对乌尔斯图尔的逮捕令，但他目前的行踪不明。即使是魔法探查，也未能发现他的位置。
拙劣的绑架{@creature Renaer Neverember|wdh}不会让乌尔斯图尔感到满意。他可能会再次尝试。(塔什琳实际上并不相信这一点，但她知道雷纳与哈珀人有联系，可能会与人物分享感兴趣的信息。)

entries: 在被捕数周后，一旦沃特德普的领主确信他和他的同伙都不应对最近的暴力事件负责，戴维尔就被释放了。

rows: "有人在码头区杀害精灵和半精灵水手--到目前为止已经死了三个，每个都是在夜深人静时被刀砍死的。请你调查一下，好吗？我认为城市守望者可以得到一点帮助。"

Characters who spend three consecutive nights loitering around the docks spot Heldar, a drunk half-elf sailor ({@creature bandit}), leaving the Muleskull Tavern (on Ship Street in the Dock Ward). Characters who follow Heldar can save him from {@creature Soluun Xibrindas|wdh}, a renegade {@creature drow gunslinger|WDH} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). Soluun hides in the shadows, blade drawn, waiting for the half-elf to stumble by. Spotting him before he strikes requires a successful DC 18 Wisdom (Perception) check. Soluun flees if reduced to half his hit points or fewer. {@i Reward}: Each Zhentarim character gains 1 renown. If Heldar survives Soluun's attack, each character receives 50 gp.
"在贸易区有一家商店，名叫 "怪异瓶 "调制品。经营它的地精是我们的一个朋友，名叫斯基莫。他为一个客户制作了一些读心术的药水。拿起药水，把它们送到神捕手那里，这是城堡区的一个巨大雕像。把药水交给穿紫色斗篷的女士，并保留小费。"

{@creature Skeemo Weirdbottle|WDH}(见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12})在一个衬有丝绸的小棺材里放了四瓶毒药。这些药水看起来、闻起来、尝起来都像是读心术的药水。在捕神者附近等待交货的是埃斯维尔-罗斯纳，{@creature Black Viper|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）。她穿着一件带帽的紫色斗篷，坐在一辆出租马车的后面。她把小金库换成一个黑色的天鹅绒袋，然后命令司机离开。马车将埃斯维尔送到她在海区的庄园。{@i Reward}: 每个Zhentarim角色获得1个名声。艾斯维勒的袋子里有15pp，角色可以保留。

"Waterdeep's richest halfling family, the Snobeedles, is offering 500 gold pieces for information leading to the safe return of a missing family member named {@creature Shard Shunner|wdh|Dasher Snobeedle}. Those dragons sure would look good in our coffers! Investigate and see what you can learn, but don't get in any trouble. The City Watch already has it out for us."

任何花了至少三天时间在南区或码头区询问相关问题和追查线索的角色，都可以在这段时间结束时进行DC18魅力（劝说或恐吓）检查。如果成功，这个角色就能说服一些口风很紧的半身人安排与达舍见面。会议定于第二天在Waymoot的Highsun举行。达舍尔出现了，他想听听人物的意见，但他并不打算回家。他最近加入了一个由半身人组成的狼人团伙，名为Shard Shunners（因厌恶银而得名），此后他自己也成了狼人。现在，"碎片顺从者 "是他的家人。{@i Reward}: 每个Zhentarim角色获得2个声望。
"{@creature Skeemo Weirdbottle|WDH}已经背叛了我们! 这个小虫子一直在向我们的敌人提供信息。他必须被消灭。让它看起来像一个意外。"

{@creature Skeemo Weirdbottle|WDH} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) manages to stay one step ahead of the characters. As they approach his shop, they see him ride off in a dray with five other passengers and a driver (all {@creature commoner||commoners}). If Skeemo realizes he's being followed, he casts fly and takes to the air. If the effect is dispelled or the characters maintain pursuit, he casts greater invisibility on himself and uses crowds to cover his escape. If the characters fail to nab him, he takes refuge in Kolat Towers (see chapter 8). {@i Reward}: Each Zhentarim character gains 2 renown if Skeemo is eliminated without implicating the Black Network. In addition, characters who snatch Skeemo's satchel find that it holds his spellbook (containing all the spells he has prepared), a {@item potion of mind reading}, and 150 gp in a silk coin purse.

entries.name: Open for Business?
entries: 如果人物打算修复并重新开放巨魔胡同里的酒馆，他们可以期待与各种行会打交道，没有他们的支持，生意很可能会失败。修理墙壁和屋顶需要得到木匠、屋顶工和绘图师公会的批准和监督。酒窖和水管工协会最有能力处理地下室和水管的整修工作。清洁的床单是由洗衣工协会提供的。场所周围的街道由扫墓者协会和街道劳工忠诚会负责维护。肉类必须来自屠夫协会；啤酒和葡萄酒来自葡萄酒商、蒸馏商和酿酒商协会；面包和糕点来自面包师协会。这样的名单还在继续。
酒馆经营费用 "侧边栏列出了人物必须支付的费用，以使他们的地方准备好营业，以及他们在酒馆营业时必须履行的经常性义务。

entries.name: Sample Guild Representatives
entries: 一旦全城都知道巨魔巷的酒馆打算重新开门迎客，冒险者们就会收到对酒馆的福利感兴趣的公会代表的拜访。本节将介绍这些代表中的少数人。

entries.name: Broxley Fairkettle
entries: {@i Fellowship of Innkeepers}

Broxley (LG male strongheart halfling {@creature commoner}) is a laid-back, law-abiding halfling with mutton chops and bushy eyebrows. Inns and taverns are few and far between in the North Ward, so he makes frequent visits to the characters' place to see how it's doing and to offer his well-wishes. If none of the characters are members of the guild, he strongly urges them to join "to avoid further harassment." The cost of membership in the Fellowship of Innkeepers is included in the regular expenses outlined in the "Tavern Keeping Expenses" sidebar.
布洛克斯利一直认为酒馆闹鬼，很高兴再次看到活人在里面。在感叹作为九个孩子的父亲的负担时，他很快指出，这些人物继续遵守行会的规则和条例使他相当困难的生活 "稍微轻松了一点"。

entries.name: Hammond Kraddoc
entries: {@i Vintners', Distillers', and Brewers' Guild}

Hammond (N male Illuskan human {@creature commoner}) doesn't like adventurers, but he likes their coin. This effete, well-dressed man is always seen in the company of a young scribe, Jinny (NG female tiefling commoner), who wears spectacles and silently records notes and conversations in a small book as Hammond speaks.
哈蒙德喜欢在每个月的中旬停下来，告知角色们公会所提供的新酒，并给他们一份清单，告诉他们哪些酒要大力推广。为了测试他们合作的意愿程度，他责备他们目前选择的饮料，即使他之前卖给他们这些货物。

entries.name: Justyn Rassk
entries: {@i Guild of Butchers}

Dead-eyed, slack-jawed Justyn (NE male Illuskan human {@creature thug}) grew up in the toughest neighborhood in the Field Ward and has the scars to prove it. The guild doesn't pay him enough for him to afford a residence in the North Ward, and going to that part of the city fills his heart with resentment. He darkens the characters' doorstep once a month to deliver a cartload of chopped meat for the tavern's larder. Although delivery fees are covered by the guild's monthly dues, Justyn always demands some extra coin for his service. If the characters don't give him a gratuity of at least 3 gp, he says, "Maybe next time the meat will be someone you know." He lets the threat hang in the air, then departs.

entries.name: Ulkoria Stonemarrow
entries: {@i Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors}

Ulkoria (NG female shield dwarf {@creature archmage}) has defended Waterdeep with her magic more times than she can recall. She's known as "the Gargoyle" because her face is frozen in a scowl that frightens adults and children alike. No one knows where she lives, but it's believed to be underground, possibly a cellar or dungeon under one of the city's oldest estates. She uses {@spell teleport} spells to enter and leave her home, and she's never seen without her {@creature shield guardian} close by.
一个鲜为人知的事实是，乌尔科里亚曾经拥有巨魔骷髅巷的酒馆。她把它卖给了一个盾牌矮人家庭，后者陷入困境，把它卖给了一个女人，后者把它变成了孤儿院。"原来是个巫婆，她在做饭，吃孩子，"乌尔科里亚回忆说。在随后的岁月里，该庄园又经过了几位主人。乌尔科里亚希望新的主人能对其进行妥善处理。

Anytime she passes through the North Ward, Ulkoria stops by the tavern for a drink and to check out the place while her shield guardian waits outside. If she doesn't like what the characters have done with the establishment, she keeps her criticisms to herself. The characters can hire her to cast {@spell glyph of warding||glyphs of warding} on the place, for which she charges 300 gp apiece.

entries.name: Tavern Keeping Expenses
entries: 本侧边栏总结了在巨魔胡同经营酒馆的一次性付款和持续支出，并提供了确定企业赚取或损失多少金币的规则。

items: 1,000金币，在12天内装修好酒馆
250戈比的公会执照和合同（先付）。
每个工作日50戈比，用于维护和雇佣人员的工资。
每个工作日有10金币用于所有其他的公会开支

entries.name: Profit or Loss
entries: 在每个工作日结束时，掷出{@dice d100 + 10}，并参考《{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg}》第六章中的 "经营生意 "表，以确定酒馆是亏损还是盈利。如果人物在那一天里花了硬币来宣传他们的生意，那么每花1个金币就在卷子上加1。如果人物有未支付的费用，则每欠1戈比从卷中减去1。

entries.caption: Running Trollskull Manor
rows: 你支付了你的商业成本，并获得了{@dice 1d6 × 5}GP的利润。
你支付了你的商业成本，并获得了{@dice 2d8 × 5}GP的利润。
你支付了你的商业成本，并获得了{@dice 3d10 × 5}GP的利润。

entries.name: Business Rival: Emmek Frewn
entries: {@creature Emmek Frewn|WDH}，一个咸湿的北方人（东北男性Illuskan{@creature commoner}），最近想买下巨魔骷髅巷的酒馆，但被Volothamp Geddarm出价超过。被这一损失所刺激，他在同一条巷子里买下了一个较小的、不那么引人注目的建筑，并把它改成了一个酒馆，他把它叫做Frewn's Brews。如果你决定引入艾梅克作为商业对手，在地图2.1上选择一个没有标记的建筑作为酒馆。
埃梅克的家族在永夜城的财产被1451年的霍特诺山爆发摧毁后，移民到了水底世界。他们一家在贸易区靠鞣制皮革来维持生计。艾梅克的父母去世后，他的姐妹们接管了生意并把他买了下来。反正他从来都不喜欢这份工作，他特别讨厌与剥皮者和制革者联盟打交道。
埃梅克的财务状况不稳定，因为他把大部分财富都投入到最近的这项工作中。他还遇到了两个行会的麻烦。首先，他试图通过自己修理屋顶来节省钱财，无视木匠、屋顶工和绘图者协会。然后，他把矮人的胡子比作船上的藤壶，从而冒犯了酒窖和水管工协会的成员。

entries.name: Goals
entries: 埃梅克希望他的酒馆成为北区最成功的酒馆，他希望这些人物的生意失败得很厉害。

entries.name: Assets
entries: 当涉及到某些类型的开支时，埃米克很吝啬，而在其他方面则对他的钱财很愚蠢。他倾向于在大的、炫耀性的项目上花费很多，而在小的设施上偷工减料。因为他现在没有太多的钱可以花，所以他的计划是以借钱的方式来毁掉这些人物的机构。

entries.name: Plans
entries: 艾梅克从{@creature Istrid Horn|WDH}那里获得了150戈比的贷款（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）。他花了50戈比购买了Shard Shunners的服务，这是一帮半身人的狼人，他过去曾与他们有过不正当的交易。他付钱给半身人，让他们阻碍人物的工作，而他则疯狂地管理自己的生意。

Four gang members have been assigned to work with Emmek: two males named {@creature Shard Shunner|wdh|Kelso Fiddlewick} and {@creature Shard Shunner|wdh|Dasher Snobeedle}, and two females named {@creature Shard Shunner|wdh|Danika Fiddlewick} (Kelso's younger sister) and {@creature Shard Shunner|wdh|Brynn Hilltopple}. These halflings are {@creature wererat||wererats}, with these changes:

items: 每个狼人是小型的，有27({@dice 6d6 + 6})点。

It has these racial traits: It can move through the space of a Medium or larger creature. It has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}. It speaks Common and Halfling, and it knows thieves' cant.

entries: Emmek破坏竞争的策略以及将其付诸行动的后果总结如下表所示。

entries.caption: Emmek's Plans
rows: 狼人以半身人的形式考察了人物的酒馆，并可能试图在那里获得工作。
狼人在人物的住处内种下食物，并在外墙上钻出小孔，吸引老鼠，造成鼠患。
埃梅克散布谣言说，人物的酒馆里有老鼠，这就是他不买的原因。在 "经营生意 "表上，对人物接下来的三次掷骰子施加-10的惩罚（见 "酒馆经营费用"，第41页）。
Shard Shunners声称他们已经为他们的硬币做得够多了，要求更多。
艾梅克又付给狼人50戈比，让他们在晚上以混血儿和老鼠的形态在人物的酒馆里爬来爬去，在邻居的门上刻下老鼠的脸，并以其他方式引起人们的注意。
艾梅克说服几个当地居民在他起草的一封信上签字，然后将信寄给城市守望。信中指责这些人物为狼人盗贼行会开了一个幌子，并敦促守夜人关闭他们的机构。

entries.name: Level Advancement
entries: In this section of the adventure, the characters should advance to 3rd level by engaging in faction missions, dealing with {@creature Emmek Frewn|WDH}, or partaking in self-directed activities. This period of time represents an opportunity for the characters to make friends and gain a reputation (for good or ill) in Trollskull Alley-and in Waterdeep itself-before the events of chapter 3 embroil them in a greater plot.

data.name: Fireball
entries: 巨魔胡同的居民被一声巨大的嗖嗖声、窗户的摇晃声和城市居民的尖叫声所震慑。一个{@spell fireball}的法术刚刚在街上被引爆，附近地区陷入了混乱。当城市卫队、城市守望、魔法师和保护者的守望会成员赶到现场时，人物有机会评估损失并进一步调查。这一事件启动了主要情节，并使角色们与那些想要找到并要求获得Neverember勋爵藏匿的黄金的人发生了冲突。
火球在清晨爆炸，当时所有人物都在巨魔庄园。大声朗读以下文字来设置场景。
当爆炸的轰鸣声充满巨魔巷时，窗户发出响声。烧焦的尸体和痛苦的尖叫声在空中飞扬。一团厚厚的刺鼻的烟雾从爆炸中向外飘散，这似乎就发生在你的门外。

Let the players tell you what their characters are doing at this moment and how they react to the explosion. Those who want to guess the nature of the explosion can, with a successful DC 13 Intelligence (Arcana) check, conclude that someone just cast a {@spell fireball} spell outside.

entries.name: What's Happening Here?
entries: Dalakhar, a rock gnome spy working for Lord Dagult Neverember, was on his way to see the characters when the fireball went off, killing him and ten other people. The gnome is important because he was carrying the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} (see {@adventure appendix A|WDH|11})-the key to finding Lord Neverember's hidden cache of gold. Hounded by agents of the Zhentarim, the Xanathar Guild, and Bregan D'aerthe, Dalakhar was unable to escape from Waterdeep with the artifact, so he planned to entrust it to the characters briefly, for surely the folk who rescued Lord Neverember's son could keep it safe where he could not.

By the time the events of this chapter have played out, the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} has changed hands a few times and the characters have learned more about the big picture-though they still have a long chase ahead of them.

entries.name: Zhents Caught in the Act
entries: 三名黑网成员，包括赞特刺客{@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}），在接近抓捕达拉哈时被卷入爆炸。这三个人中，只有乌尔斯图尔幸存下来。虽然他受了伤，但在逃离现场之前，他还是从达拉哈的口袋里掏出了{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}。当其他幸存者逐渐清醒过来的时候，乌尔斯图尔跌跌撞撞地穿过烟雾和阴霾，最终回到了不远处的格拉洪德别墅。

entries.name: House Gralhund
entries: Gralhund贵族家族的首领{@creature Yalah Gralhund|wdh}和她的丈夫{@creature Orond Gralhund|wdh|Orond}向Urstul和他的Zhents同伴提供钱币和住所，以换取他们在隐藏的黄金库中获得公平份额的承诺。但格拉洪德人并不愿意完全信任黑网；他们派出了自己的特工来跟踪甄子丹，消灭达拉哈，并代表他们获得（2%）。亚拉给了这个可能的刺客一个{@item necklace of fireballs}，并说明了如何和何时使用它。当达拉哈似乎可能给{@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh}滑倒时，这个特工从项链上扔下一颗珠子，阻止了地精的行动。

The Gralhunds' assassin is a {@creature nimblewright|wdh} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) that escaped from the House of Inspired Hands, the temple of Gond in the Sea Ward, a month ago. The construct hitched a ride on House Gralhund's coach. {@creature Yalah Gralhund|WDH} befriended it, offered it shelter, and used it as a servant until she and her husband found a more sinister use for it.
火球的事件使格拉洪德和黑网之间的联盟关系紧张。{@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh}拒绝交出{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}，直到他与他的秘密主人{@creature Manshoon|WDH}谈话。同时，Gralhunds正在权衡在自己家里背叛和谋杀Urstul的风险。如果人物的调查进展顺利，他们会在本章结束前误入这个蛇窝。

entries.name: Unraveling the Plot
entries: During their investigation, the characters should learn who or what cast the {@spell fireball} (a {@creature nimblewright|wdh}), why the attack was committed (to steal the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}), and where the stone was taken (Gralhund Villa). If the investigation stalls, friendly NPCs might step forward to help in exchange for compensation. One such figure is {@creature Vincent Trench|WDH}, the private detective, who lives in Trollskull Alley (see chapter 2, {@area T5|0a1}). The characters can also consult with friendly factions such as the Harpers.

entries.name: The Crime Scene
entries: 爆炸发生后，人们从自己的房子和商店里走出来，勘察破坏情况。火球没有烧毁任何建筑物，但却导致11人死亡。

items: 一位外出散步的老年女性人类（没有人认得她）。
两名披头散发的男性人类（Zhentarim卖家），身穿皮甲，手持带鞘长剑。
两名女性人类和一名男性半精灵，身着便装（北区富裕家庭的仆人，在跑腿时被杀）。
一名男性地精（Dalakhar），身穿烧焦的斗篷，手握一把匕首
两个女半身人在吹笛子和拉小提琴，两个男半身人在跳舞。

entries: The characters have only a few minutes to search the crime scene before members of the City Guard arrive. After that, they aren't allowed anywhere near the bodies, although {@condition invisible} and similarly hidden characters can search the crime scene further. A search of the bodies accompanied by a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check reveals the following:

items: 其中一个死去的男性人类的右前臂上纹有一条黑色的、有翅膀的蛇（黑网的象征）。
死去的地精的靴子和斗篷上有干燥的废物，说明他最近在下水道里呆过。他还有一个装有5颗100GP宝石的小袋子。

entries: 一个角色可以尝试在不被NPC围观者看到的情况下抢走达拉哈的袋子，只要成功地进行DC13灵巧（灵巧）检查即可。如果检定失败，这个角色仍然会得到这个袋子，但是有人会观察到这次偷窃，并在城市守望者出现后将其报告给他们（见下文 "守望者到来"）。这个盗窃案的目击者可以用50戈比或更多的贿赂来压制。

entries.name: After the Blast
entries: The characters have a few minutes to examine the crime scene before the City Guard arrives and cordons off Trollskull Alley, posting six {@creature guard||guards} at each entrance. The guards don't allow anyone in or out without permission from a superior officer. Another six {@creature guard||guards}, including a {@creature sergeant|WDH} with 18 hit points, make their way to the crime scene and watch over the dead bodies until the City Watch arrives. Lingering smoke from the fireball also attracts a {@creature Griffon Cavalry rider|WDH} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). As its {@creature griffon} mount circles the neighborhood, the rider watches the streets and alleys for suspicious figures.

entries.name: The Watch Arrives
entries: 爆炸发生20分钟后，一位名叫{@creature Saeth Cromley|wdh}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）的城市守望者{@creature sergeant|WDH}护送一位名叫{@creature Barnibus Blastwind|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）的法师和保护者守望团成员前往犯罪现场。巴尼布斯此时悄悄地负责调查，而{@creature Sergeant|WDH}克罗姆利则指挥一支由20名警员({@creature veteran||veterans})组成的队伍去敲门，询问当地人。
在允许尸体被移走并送往当地寺庙之前，巴尼布斯仔细检查了现场，并得出以下结论，他更愿意将这些结论留给自己，但可能会与守望团的其他成员分享。

items: 地精是在逃避武装追捕者，其中有三个人。追赶地精的第三个人并不在死者之列。
地精和他的追兵正朝着巨魔头巷的酒馆走去（巴恩布斯很快就会意识到这是人物的财产）。
侏儒和他的追兵都没有看到爆炸的到来。

entries: 鉴于这些发现，巴尼布斯决定询问酒馆的主人和住客，而{@creature Sergeant|WDH}克罗姆利作为证人和保镖在他身边。具体来说，巴尼布斯想弄清楚这个地精的身份，以及他是否被任何人认识。这些人物由于从未见过达拉哈，除非他们决定撒谎，否则几乎没有什么信息可以提供。
巴恩布斯和{@creature Sergeant|WDH}克罗姆利都不急于下结论。他们都倾向于在进行任何逮捕前拥有铁的证据和可靠证人的证词。即使这些人物因接近犯罪现场而成为嫌疑人，但他们在光天化日之下在离营业场所这么近的地方释放破坏性的魔法，似乎也不太合理。因此，Barnibus打算不占用他们太多的时间。
巴尼布斯和{@creature Sergeant|WDH}克罗姆利拒绝了人物加入调查的请求。"那会在一个已经很混乱的方程式中引入太多新的变量，"巴尼布斯皱着眉头回答道。"相信守望者，"克罗姆利不屑地补充道。那些看起来很诚实的人物可以向巴尼布斯逼问进一步的信息，方法是进行DC15魅力（说服力）检查。如果成功，他们就会劝说巴尼布斯说出他所发现的东西，如上所述。

entries.name: Eyewitnesses
entries: 还有许多人目睹了这个火球，但没有被卷入爆炸。他们中的三个人有重要的信息可以分享。任何花了至少1分钟与他们中的一个人交谈的角色都能了解到这个人看到或听到的东西。(不需要检查能力，因为目击者都很想说话）。

entries.name: Fala Lefaliir
entries: {@creature Fala Lefaliir|wdh|Fala}，Corellon's Crown的所有者（见第二章，{@area T4|09f}），讲述了以下信息。
"我正在我的商店二楼的温室里给植物浇水，爆炸将一些窗户炸毁了。幸好我没有受伤！"。透过烟雾，我看到一个披着斗篷的人从一个死去的地精的尸体上取下什么东西，然后开始一瘸一拐地离开。他被严重烧伤，并向肩膀上瞥了一眼，好像他害怕有人跟踪他。他正朝着 "弯钉 "走去。

Fala saw {@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh} fleeing the scene with the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} in his clutches. He circled around the Bent Nail (see chapter 2, {@area T2|09b}) on his way out of Trollskull Alley.

entries.name: Jezrynne Hornraven
entries: 杰兹琳是出生在财富和特权阶层的沃特达维亚人，在离开 "虎眼"（见第二章，{@area T5|0a1}）时，刚刚雇佣了{@creature Vincent Trench|WDH}来监视她花心的丈夫，她目睹了以下情况。
"我告诉你，那不是一个人。更像是一个形似男人的木偶。一个没有绳子的木偶。它在屋顶上。它向下面的人群投掷了一些东西，引起了爆炸。我看到那些半身人被活活烧死了！我看到了他们！我看到了他们！"
Jezrynne不知道那个 "木偶 "投掷了什么东西来引起火球。她在混乱中把目光从那东西上移开，不知道它去了哪里。

entries.name: Martem Trec
entries: 这个12岁的男孩眼睁睁地看着他的半身人朋友在火焰中丧生。除此以外，他没有看到什么，但他在爆炸发生后发现了一些重要的东西。
"就在爆炸之后，我躲在一个雨桶后面。然后我听到'扑通'一声，在桶里发现了这个。"
马特姆拿出一个{@item necklace of fireballs}，还剩两颗珠子，扣子断了。当它逃过一个屋顶时，{@creature nimblewright|wdh}不小心扯到了项链，项链脱落了，掉到了屋顶上，从边缘滑下，摔进了马特姆旁边的雨桶。
他不知道该如何处理这个东西，但打算保留它。一个角色可以从他那里抢走它，或者用成功的DC 8魅力（恐吓或劝说）检查说服Martem放弃它。
对城市守望者隐瞒项链和相关知识的角色，在沃特德普犯了罪。通过隐瞒证据来妨碍司法公正，将被处以最高200金币的罚款和最多1天的苦役。

entries.name: Speaking with the Victims
entries: The dead are taken to a City Watch station in the North Ward and kept in a cellar morgue. Clerics from local temples are brought in to cast {@spell gentle repose} spells on the corpses, to preserve them while the investigation is ongoing. Any character who has a renown of 1 or higher in Force Grey (the Gray Hands), the Harpers, the Lords' Alliance, the Order of the Gauntlet, or the Zhentarim can petition their faction representative to hire a cleric to cast {@spell speak with dead} on one or more of the fatalities.
角色们可以自己雇佣一个牧师，方法是为每次施法向牧师的神庙捐献至少25戈比。他们还必须提供一份他们想要回答的问题清单。
如果问对了问题，一个{@spell speak with dead}的法术可以从达拉哈的尸体上撬出以下部分或全部信息。

items: 达拉哈从城市地下深处的地牢中，从一个被称为{@creature Xanathar|WDH}的看守者的巢穴中，偷了一件叫做{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}的神器。
Dalakhar worked for the Open Lord of Waterdeep. (Here he refers to Lord Dagult Neverember, whom he believes is the rightful Open Lord, not {@creature Laeral Silverhand|WDH}.)
％0％）是找到隐藏在城市中的龙囤的关键。
达拉哈听说有一群冒险者从赞塔林人手中救出了纽伦堡勋爵的儿子，他认为{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}暂时在他们手中会很安全。他正在去给他们送东西的路上，打算在躲过追兵后再回来取回它。然后火球就爆炸了。

entries: 通过对一个或两个死去的Zhentarim卖主施放{@spell speak with dead}，可以了解到以下信息。

items: 他们的名字是Bashekk Ortallis和Wern Malkrave。他们为{@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh}工作，居住在格拉洪德别墅。
他们的工作是帮助抓住一个叫达拉哈的地精。
达拉哈拥有某种神器，据{@creature Urstul Floxin|WDH}说，这将使他们像国王一样富有。

entries.name: Nim's Secret
entries: 询问耶斯林-霍恩拉文（Jezrynne Hornraven）的角色（见上文 "目击者"）可以得到关于引发火球的生物的描述。它与有时在奇迹日游行中游行的自动机有着惊人的相似之处，任何在秋季生活在沃特迪普的人都知道这一点。因为奇迹日游行是由当地的冈德神庙赞助的，所以角色们可能想去神庙看看，调查一下可能的联系。

entries.name: House of Inspired Hands
entries: 灵感之手之家是沃特德普的冈德神庙，位于海区的海望街和鲨鱼街的角落。如果人物访问该神庙，他们会看到以下内容。
灵感之家 "看起来就像一座寺庙和一个工场之间的交叉。贡德的象征，一个有四个辐条的齿状齿轮，被摆在显眼的位置。你看到一个人形的剪影栖息在屋顶上。它伸出一只手臂，将一只小小的金属麻雀放飞到天空。这只鸟在空中转了几圈，然后向右转向你。

The creature atop the temple is Nim, a {@creature nimblewright|WDH} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). Nim was given to the temple as a gift from a visiting Lantanese wizard and has been creating its own inventions on the sly. One of those inventions was the nimblewright that detonated the fireball in Trollskull Alley. Another less-dangerous invention, a mechanical sparrow, is on an accidental collision course with the party.
让角色们掷出主动权。尼姆的机械鸟在主动权数为10时行动，飞行速度为60英尺，并从距离角色60英尺处开始。它有15点攻击力，1点命中率，对毒药和精神伤害有免疫力。在它的回合中，它随机飞向一名党员，并对该角色进行一次近战武器攻击（命中率为0）。命中时，这只鸟造成2({@dice 1d3})的穿刺伤害，因为它以惊人的力量撞向该角色。如果没有击中，它就会坠落。无论怎样，它都会在撞击中被摧毁。
袭击发生后，尼姆通过屋顶上的一个秘密舱口撤到了寺庙的阁楼上，低调行事，希望人物不要向寺庙的圣徒报告此事。

entries.name: Inside the Temple
entries: 贡德神庙在白天是开放的，活动频繁，然后从日落到日出时关闭。到了晚上，圣徒们会退到他们的私人住所，为宠物项目工作。

entries.name: Hall of Exemplary Inventions
entries: 寺庙的主厅里有二十几个大理石基座。每一个都有一个获奖的发明或其他一些非凡创造的微型模型。在这些展品中，有几件是非常突出的。

items: 一个4英尺高的钟楼工作模型在每个小时的顶端响起。它是由木材、铁、青铜和玻璃制成的，有黄铜铃铛和纯金形成的精致指针。
一个木制的飞行器有翅膀，当它在空中飞行时，翅膀会扇动。
一个机械龙龟的微型模型的基座上贴着一块铜牌，上面写着："大贝尔奇。在公元1363年的奇迹之日沉没于深水港"。
一个功能性的 "唤醒头盔"，配备了小的、可铰接的金属手臂和手，如果佩戴者睡着了，可以轻轻地拍打他。
A miniature model of a red submarine shaped like a manta ray has a brass plate affixed to its pedestal that reads, {@i "The Scarlet Marpenoth}. Lantanese submersible. Launched in 1489 DR."

entries.name: Meeting Valetta
entries: 这些人物是由{@creature Valetta|wdh}，一个拥有青铜龙血统的龙裔{@creature priest}遇到的，有这些变化。

items: {@creature Valetta|WDH}为中性。
她有这些种族特征。她可以用她的行动呼出一条5英尺宽、30英尺长的闪电线（但在她完成短期或长期休息之前不能再这样做）；线中的每个生物必须做一个DC11的灵巧救赎，救赎失败时受到{@dice 2d6}的闪电伤害，救赎成功时受到一半的伤害。她对雷电伤害有抵抗力。她会说普通话和德拉科尼亚语。

entries: 如果人物提到他们在寺庙屋顶上看到的身影，{@creature Valetta|wdh}就会认出那是尼姆，一个由兰特人的巫师赠送给寺庙的{@creature nimblewright|wdh}。如果他们描述了机械鸟的事件，{@creature Valetta|WDH}叹了口气，带领他们沿着螺旋形的楼梯走到一个阁楼，尼姆把这个阁楼当做巢穴--结果发现阁楼的门装了一把新锁。{@creature Valetta|WDH}不认识这把锁，也没有钥匙可以打开它，但是使用盗贼工具的人可以通过DC20的灵巧检查来开锁。一个{@spell knock}的咒语或类似的魔法也能打开门。{@creature Valetta|WDH}不允许角色破门而入，但她允许他们通过门与尼姆交谈。一个角色可以劝说尼姆打开门，只要成功地进行DC17魅力（说服力）检查。{@creature Valetta|wdh}通过强烈敦促尼姆服从，使其在该卷中获得优势。

entries.name: Meeting Nim
entries: 尼姆能听懂普通话，但不能说话。它开发了一种简单的手语，{@creature Valetta|wdh}和寺庙的其他成员都能理解。在鸟的事件发生后，尼姆躲在它巢穴的杂物中，但如果人物找到他们进去的方法或哄骗它打开门，它就会出现。如果人物问起另一个敏捷者，尼姆承认（通过对{@creature Valetta|WDH}的手势），它建造另一个敏捷者是为了缓解它的孤独感。但一个月前，尼姆的创造物在困惑的恐惧中逃走了，此后尼姆就再也没有见到它。鉴于这一启示，{@creature Valetta|WDH}愤怒地命令圣徒们把尼姆的工具和未完成的发明从阁楼上移走，而她则强迫尼姆看着。

entries.name: Nimblewright Detector
entries: Characters who search Nim's attic or watch the area as it's being cleaned out can find a 1-foot-long copper contraption with an umbrella-like metallic protrusion at one end. A {@spell detect magic} spell reveals an aura of divination magic around it. If asked about it, Nim tells {@creature Valetta|wdh} that it built this device to find the errant {@creature nimblewright|wdh} and tried to seek it out, only to discover that Nim couldn't leave the temple grounds. Once Nim explains how the nimblewright detector works, {@creature Valetta|WDH} allows the characters to take it. To activate the nimblewright detector, a character must hold down its trigger. When the activated device comes within 500 feet of a nimblewright other than Nim, the umbrella begins to spin, whir, and click. The spinning, whirring, and clicking accelerates as the distance to the target lessens, reaching maximum velocity and volume when a nimblewright other than Nim is within 30 feet of the device.

entries.name: Reward
entries: 如果角色想自己去追踪那个不听话的{@creature nimblewright|wdh}，{@creature Valetta|wdh}说灵感之家会付给他们500金币来摧毁它。如果他们带着销毁它的证据回来，{@creature Valetta|WDH}会看到他们得到承诺的奖励，并且还提供给他们以下非魔法发明各一个。

entries.name: Adjustable Stilts
entries: 高跷需要1分钟来穿上或脱下。它们能使任何穿上它们的人的身高增加2至5英尺。每个高跷的重量为8磅，完全折叠后有1英尺长。

entries.name: Backpack Parachute
entries: 穿着这套装备的人可以在下落时作为反应展开降落伞，也可以作为其他动作展开。降落伞至少需要一个10英尺的立方体空间来展开，而且它打开的速度不足以减缓小于60英尺的坠落。如果它有足够的时间和空间来正确展开，降落伞可以让它的穿戴者着陆而不受到坠落伤害。一旦使用，降落伞需要10分钟重新包装。

entries.name: Barking Box
entries: 这个金属立方体，边长6英寸，上面有一个曲柄。使用一个动作给曲柄上发条可以激活盒子8小时。在激活期间，只要盒子和振动源接触到相同的地面或物质，只要它检测到周围15英尺内的振动，盒子就会吠叫。盒子一侧的开关将设备设定为发出小狗的叫声或大狗的叫声。

entries.name: Matchless Pipe
entries: 在这个精美的木制烟斗的碗里有一个用火石制成的开关。只要轻按几下开关，烟斗就会自动点燃。

entries.name: Finding Nim's Creation
entries: 装备了{@i nimblewright detector}，角色们可以搜索尼姆逃脱的创作。逐个区搜索是最好的方法，但让玩家告诉你他们的角色如何进行搜索。根据他们去的地方，搜索可能需要几天时间。

一个骑着狮鹫的角色可以在几个小时内完成整个城市的搜索。要获得狮鹫的使用权，一个角色必须是与萨瓦拉-贝拉布兰塔关系良好的高塔骑士团成员，或者是与{@creature Jalester Silvermane|WDH}关系良好的领主联盟成员。碰巧的是，一个名叫Bonesnapper的年轻（%%）正在接受训练，以作为狮鹫骑兵队的坐骑。如果萨瓦拉或杰莱斯特愿意帮助党，角色们可以安排在第二天早上黎明后不久在河门外见到狮鹫和它的训练师。(狮鹫和它的训练师通常居住在沃特德普山顶的峰顶艾利，但那里不欢迎大多数平民。） 要获得骨头猎手的信任，角色必须在DC16智慧（动物处理）检查中取得成功。狮鹫不允许任何检查失败的角色骑它。

Nim's errant {@creature nimblewright|wdh} is in Gralhund Villa on Saerdoun Street, in the North Ward. It isn't, however, the only nimblewright to be found outside the House of Inspired Hands. If the characters decide to search the Dock Ward, the nimblewright detector starts to whir when it comes within range of a couple of the ships in port.

entries.name: Dock Ward Distraction
entries: 海女集市的主人扎尔多兹-佐德把他的三艘船带到了水底世界。其中两艘大帆船，{@i Heartbreaker}和{@i Hellraiser}，已经停靠在码头。佐德的旗舰，{@i Eyecatcher}号，停泊在深水港。这三艘船（在第7章中描述）中的每一艘都至少有一个灵活的工匠在船上。
除了冬天，码头在白天是熙熙攘攘、混乱不堪的。到了晚上，黑暗为人物提供了足够的掩护，使他们可以不被发现地接近码头上的船只。如果一个或多个角色被抓到船上，船员们会试图把他们逼到角落里，直到船长跟他们说话。他们说，敏捷战士们是 "景点，仅此而已"。如果人物要求与船队的主人交谈，就会用一个{@spell sending}的法术来联系佐德，他邀请人物在{@i Eyecatcher}的船上与他共进晚餐。

entries.name: Dining with Zardoz Zord
entries: 接受佐德提议的角色会被小艇送到他的旗舰上，由神奇地伪装成有吸引力的人类的鸦人船员欢迎上船（更多信息见第7章），并被带到船长的餐室（{@area J10|371}）。
饭厅里摆放着金色的装饰品，紫色的窗帘上挂着丝质的流苏，木板上散发着香水味。一场华丽的盛宴摆在金色的盘子上，铺在一张工艺精湛的红木桌上。甚至连餐巾纸都是值得一看的。站在这一切后面，手拿酒杯的是一个身材魁梧、衣着暴露的男人，他的猩红色服装旨在突出他的修长身材和丰满的胸毛。他时尚的腰带上挂着一把华丽的剑。
"欢迎登上Eyecatcher号，"他说，亮出他那颗珍珠般的白牙。"Zardoz Zord，为你服务。"
这个潇洒的身影不是别人，正是神奇地伪装成Zardoz Zord的{@creature Jarlaxle Baenre|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）。
这些人物激起了贾拉索的好奇心。他对他们了解不多（还没有），想确定他们是否构成威胁（他们没有）。为了赢得他们，他在晚餐和葡萄酒中分享了以下信息。

items: 由佐德拥有和经营的 "海女节 "是一个设在卢斯坎的航海狂欢节，沿着剑海岸旅行。它以奇妙的街头游行的形式提供良好的、健康的娱乐。
{@i Heartbreaker}和{@i Hellraiser}是用来运送艺人、{@item wagon|PHB|wagons}和游行花车的。{@i Eyecatcher}号是佐德的指挥船和私人游艇。这三艘船都是为舒适和速度而建造的。
佐德大约每年访问一次遥远的兰坦岛。在他最后一次访问期间，他从一个兰坦岛的巫师那里购买了四个灵活的骑士。他在自己的旗舰上放了两个，在另外两艘船上各放了一个。
当他们不参加游行的时候，佐德的敏捷战士们就留在他的船上。"他们完全无害，"他证明说，这时，一个拿着酒壶的{@creature nimblewright|wdh}进入餐舱，悄悄地给每个人的酒杯加酒。

entries: If the characters mention the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}, Zord shrugs his shoulders in a manner that suggests he doesn't know what they're talking about. He also feigns disinterest in Waterdeep politics, saying, "Every city has problems, I suppose. My job as an entertainer is to make people forget about politics for a while." Characters who are suspicious of Zord can make a DC 24 Wisdom (Insight) check. Any character who succeeds on the check senses that there's much more to him than meets the eye.

Jarlaxle owns a {@item hat of disguise} but doesn't need it to hide his true form while he's aboard any of his ships. His disguise (and the disguises of his drow subordinates) can be dispelled only by destroying the ship's figurehead (see chapter 7). If the characters somehow discern his true form, Jarlaxle gives the party a slow nod of his head, dryly says "Bravo!" and lets them make the next move.
晚餐结束后，佐德向这些人物告别，并看到他们被安全护送回码头。

entries.name: Drow Characters
entries: 如果冒险队伍中包括一个或多个乌鸦角色，佐德船长会密切关注他们的言行，但不会把他们与其他队员区别对待。

entries.name: What Renaer Knows
entries: 在调查过程中的某个时刻，人物可能想和{@creature Renaer Neverember|wdh}谈谈火球的事，因为他自己最近和Zhentarim打过交道。反之，他可以决定去他们的酒馆拜访一下。如果他被告知一个地精和两个珍特人在爆炸中丧生，雷纳就会扔下一个重磅炸弹。
"当水底世界的领主们赶走我父亲时，我以为他漫长的黑暗阴影终于永远消失了。事实是，我不想和他有任何关系。但他的探子却对我穷追不舍。其中一个叫达拉哈的地精，已经监视我几个月了。然后，大约两天前，这个间谍突然不知所踪。我父亲不相信很多人，但他相信那个地精。"

"I spoke to a few of Dalakhar's friends. Apparently, he was on a special mission to retrieve the Stone of Golorr and was afraid that the Zhentarim and the Xanathar Guild were close to catching him. When he heard about my kidnapping, he wanted more information about the adventurers who had rescued me. I think Dalakhar was planning to pay you to deliver the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} to my father in Neverwinter."
任何试图跟踪达拉哈的朋友的努力都被证明是徒劳的，因为他们在地精突然死亡后已经躲起来了。
如果人物告诉雷纳，{@creature Fala Lefaliir|wdh}看到一个人从巨魔骷髅巷逃出来（见 "目击者"），雷纳就会联系他在哈珀斯的朋友。一天后，他带着以下信息回来。

items: 法拉看到的那个人符合{@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh}的描述，他被怀疑是黑网的成员。
另一位北区居民称，在火球事件发生后不久，他看到乌尔斯图尔进入北区的格拉洪德别墅。该居民向城市观察站报告了他，因为乌尔斯特尔看起来很可疑。
两名城市守望的警员与格拉洪德勋爵交谈。他向他们保证，没有人闯入庄园，一切都很好。警员们没有理由获得搜查令，所以他们没有追究此事。

entries.name: Gralhund Villa
entries: 在带着{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}逃离巨魔胡同后，镇特刺客{@creature Urstul Floxin|WDH}回到了格拉洪德别墅，质问{@creature Yalah Gralhund|wdh}关于派{@creature nimblewright|wdh}插手他的任务。Gralhund夫人决定不再喜欢Urstul，并利用他的伤势，用剑指着他的{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}，命令她的卫兵把他关起来，直到她决定如何处置他。
Your choice of main villain determines Lady Gralhund's motivation, which is a secret held by her and {@creature Hrabbaz|WDH}, her loyal half-orc bodyguard:

items: 如果{@creature Xanathar|WDH}是主要的反派，{@creature Yalah Gralhund|WDH}已经秘密地与beholder犯罪头目达成了协议，提出如果beholder帮助她在假面领主理事会中制造一个空缺，就把{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}还给它。

If the Cassalanters are the main villains, Yalah is a fawning member of their Asmodeus-worshiping cult and intends to deliver the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} to them as a demonstration of her fealty and friendship.
如果贾拉索是主要的反派，他和雅拉是秘密恋人。他承诺，在他用纽伦堡勋爵丢失的囤积物收买卢斯坎进入领主联盟后，将促进她的权力上升。
如果{@creature Manshoon|WDH}是主要的恶棍，他承诺如果雅拉允许她的别墅被用作他的秘密阴谋的中转站，他就不会摧毁雅拉的家庭。亚拉相信(%%1)是为了自己的金子，因此计划将乌尔斯图尔排除在交易之外，并将{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}交给{@creature Manshoon|WDH}自己。

entries: Having gravely misjudged and underestimated Lady Gralhund once, Urstul isn't about to do so again. Rallying despite his injuries, he manages to kill the two inattentive Gralhund guards who were watching over him and alert the other Zhents on the estate, who begin dispatching the other guards and servants. Urstul's goal is to capture Lord or Lady Gralhund, force the surrender of the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}, and deliver it to his master {@creature Manshoon|WDH} in Kolat Towers (described in chapter 8).
Urstul的计划--他不知道--在Gralhund夫人命令她的{@creature nimblewright|wdh}把{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}带到其他地方时破灭。在一片混乱中，这位灵活的作家逃离了庄园。

entries.name: Should They or Shouldn't They?
entries: 角色们必须谨慎行事，因为他们没有任何证据可以直接证明格拉洪德家族与巨魔巷的袭击有关。他们的两个基本选择是与城市守望者分享他们所知道的信息，或者自己去拜访格拉洪德别墅。

entries.name: Let the Watch Handle It
entries: The characters can go to any City Watch station in the North Ward and report what they have learned to the constables there. Shortly thereafter, the characters receive a visit from {@creature Barnibus Blastwind|WDH} and {@creature Saeth Cromley|wdh} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}), who have no reason to suspect the characters are lying. Their own investigation corroborates much of what the characters said. Barnibus concludes the meeting by saying, rather brusquely, "Thank you for the information." Cromley adds, "Rest assured, we'll have this case resolved in no time."
一位地方法官向城市守望者提供了搜查格拉洪德别墅的许可。之后的某个时候，克罗姆利独自拜访了这些人物，出于礼貌，告诉他们发生了什么。

items: Officers arrived to find Lord Gralhund {@condition unconscious}, Lady Gralhund in shock, and their half-orc bodyguard bloodied but unbowed.
显然，Gralhunds已经被黑网的特工挟持了一个多星期了。大多数Zhents人在Gralhund勋爵本人领导的血腥叛乱中被杀。
Zhent的领导，{@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh}，是那些逃脱的人中的一员。他仍然在逃。观察团计划加强对他的搜寻。

Of the nimblewright, there was no sign. According to the Gralhunds, the construct was delivered to Gralhund Villa weeks earlier. The family took it in, not realizing it was a Zhentarim spy. Lady Gralhund reported that it stole her {@item necklace of fireballs}.

entries: Cromley's summary of events is based on information given to the City Watch by the Gralhunds and is riddled with falsehoods. The hostage situation, Lord Gralhund's heroism, and the theft of Lady Gralhund's {@item necklace of fireballs} never happened. The nimblewright's affiliation with the Zhentarim is also a lie. The Gralhunds' account further doesn't explain why the {@creature nimblewright|wdh} would use the {@item necklace of fireballs} to inflict harm on the Zhents if it was working with them. If characters raise that question, Cromley thinks for a moment and then ventures the guess that the nimblewright underestimated the necklace's explosive power.

entries.name: Investigate the Villa
entries: 如果他们小心翼翼地将暴力事件归咎于Zhents，或者他们能够在城市守望者出现逮捕所有人之前神不知鬼不觉地进入和离开，那么这些人物就可以插入Gralhund Villa，并肆无忌惮地搭讪其居民。
在不被邻居和路人看到或听到的情况下溜进或溜出别墅，需要每个角色在DC15灵巧（隐身）检查中取得成功。熟练掌握隐身技能的人物可以在检查中处于劣势，从而在另一个成员的检查中获得优势（基本上是对隐身能力较差的同伴的补偿）。
如果角色们在冲突中站在格拉洪德一边，格拉洪德夫人就会倾向于忽略他们的侵犯行为。然而，如果他们开始问太多的问题，她的态度就会变坏。她极力否认关于她的家族与黑网有关的指控，并声称Zhents人挟持了她的家人（她的丈夫、她的保镖、她的孩子和她的工作人员也是这样的错误说法）。如果人物攻击任何家庭成员或挥舞武器试图恐吓，格拉洪德人就会将该党的罪行告知城市守望。
在人物入侵Gralhund Villa的过程中，{@creature nimblewright|wdh}和{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}一起逃离了庄园（关于其目的地的更多信息，见第4章）。如果角色们使用尼姆的小精灵探测器来追踪小精灵，这个装置会让他们知道小精灵已经逃离了现场，但不知道它去的方向。

entries.name: Overview
entries: 格拉洪德别墅坐落在北区的一个上层住宅区的中间。以下是一些需要记住的一般事实。

items: 别墅周围的街道上随时都有行人和教练车在行驶，不过白天的交通比较繁忙。
庄园被12英尺高的石墙围住，需要在没有攀爬工具或魔法的帮助下，成功地进行DC 15力量（竞技）检查才能通过。

Neighbors and bystanders alert the City Watch if they hear loud, disturbing noises (such as a {@spell thunderwave} spell) coming from the estate or if they see anything suspicious. The Watch sends a {@creature mage} and six {@creature veteran||veterans} (one {@creature sergeant|WDH} and five constables) to investigate, and it takes {@dice 1d6 + 4} minutes for this force to arrive.
大宅的所有天花板都有20英尺高。

entries.name: Encounters in the Villa
entries: 以下的遭遇地点，以地图3.1为关键，描述了人物刚到时格拉洪德庄园的情况。甄氏家族已经占领了大宅的楼下；格拉洪德家族正在为守住楼上而战斗。

entries.name: G1. Locked Gates
entries: 穿过一组华丽的铁门，人物可以看到一个有几棵大树的院子，以及两条通往两层砖砌大宅的人行道，并向东通往一个独立的马车房。

An {@spell arcane lock} spell is cast on the gates. Forcing them open requires a successful DC 25 Strength (Athletics) check, while picking the lock requires a successful DC 20 Dexterity check using thieves' tools. The spell doesn't bar members of the Gralhund family, their staff, their guards, or Lady Gralhund's {@creature nimblewright|wdh} from opening the gates.

entries.name: G2. Yard
entries: 这座庄园被精心打理。在春天和夏天，大树提供了阴凉。这些树在秋天开始落叶。到了冬天，它们的树枝被剥光了。

entries.name: Balcony
entries: 穿过树林，人物可以看到一个大阳台（{@area G17|116}），由大宅正门上方的铁栏杆围住。阳台离地面有20英尺高，在没有攀爬工具或魔法的帮助下，攀爬大宅的砖墙到达阳台需要成功进行DC15力量（竞技）检查。

entries.name: Evil Groundskeeper
entries: The yard is looked after by a menacing groundskeeper named Hurv Taldred (LE male Illuskan {@creature cult fanatic}) and his two quiet {@creature mastiff||mastiffs}. The Gralhunds paid a necromancer to perform a ritual on Hurv and his mastiffs. After sundown, the physical forms of these figures melt away, and they become three {@creature shadow||shadows} until dawn. Characters who succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity (Stealth) check can cross the yard without being detected. Otherwise, Hurv and his hounds detect the characters and attack, day or night.

entries.name: G3. Coach House
entries: This stone building contains a beautifully maintained coach and clean stables that house four {@creature draft horse||draft horses} and Lady Gralhund's jet-black {@creature riding horse}, named Maladar. A sliding wooden door bars access to the street and has a padlock on the outside that holds it shut. Picking the lock requires a successful DC 20 Dexterity check using thieves' tools.
马厩北面较大的房间里有每匹马的马具和马具，还有成捆的干草和院子里的工具。西北角的小房间里有两张床：一张是场地管理员赫夫（见{@area G2|0f6}）的，他白天睡在这里；一张是一个叫艾克（{@creature commoner}）的马夫，他晚上睡在这里。如果人物在白天来到这里，艾克就不在这里（要么为马匹采买食物，要么和朋友出去喝酒）。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Lady Gralhund's horse is outfitted with {@item horseshoes of speed} and two saddlebags, each of which holds four 5-pound gold trade bars worth 250 gp each.

entries.name: G4. Guard Barracks
entries: 这座附属于大宅的一层石制建筑是20名宅卫的宿舍。主房间里有十张双层床。每个人都有一对脚锁，里面装有折叠的衣服和不值钱的个人物品。
西北角的房间里有木制的人体模型和架子，用来放置盔甲和武器。由于没有守卫，人体模型和架子上都是空的。

entries.name: G5. Kitchen
entries: 一扇未上锁的木门从院子里通向大宅的厨房，里面有炊具和餐具。一个大壁炉用来做饭。

entries.name: G6. Pantry
entries: 这个储藏室的架子上摆放着干粮、香料、折叠的桌布和蜜饯罐子。这里还存放着一桶桶淡水、麦酒和葡萄酒。

entries.name: Barred Door
entries: 一扇后门通向街道。这扇结实的木门在里面被闩住了。从外面强行打开它需要成功地进行DC20力量（运动）检查，而且会产生很大的噪音。

entries.name: Corpses
entries: 甄氏家族杀害了两名仆人，一名年长的男性人类（首席管家）和一名年轻的男性半身人（厨师），并将他们的尸体留在地板上。

entries.name: G7. Laundry Room
entries: 这个房间是仆人清洗衣物的地方。它包含擦洗桶、洗脸盆、{@item soap|PHB}、拖把和分水壶。

entries.name: Corpses
entries: 甄氏家族杀死了一个仆人，一个中年女性人类（女仆长），并将她的尸体留在通往仆人住处的楼梯上（{@area G19|119}）。女仆的腰带上有一圈钥匙，可以打开大宅中所有锁着的门以及{@area G8|102}的柜子。

entries.name: G8. Great Hall
entries: 第一次进入这个大厅的人物注意到以下情况。

items: The floor is strewn with bodies. Two {@creature thug||thugs} holding bloody maces stand over them.
The sound of fighting can be heard coming from the top of a wide staircase in the northwest corner (see {@area G13|10d}).
两盏铁制吊灯悬挂在深色桃花心木天花板上，上面是一张用红色落叶松木雕刻的长餐桌。椅子围绕着桌子，两端各有一把特别高大精致的椅子。
木板墙的两边是挂毯和上锁的木柜，里面有精美的餐具、银器和烛台。
一个带有黑色大理石壁炉的壁炉上方镶嵌着一幅镶框的家庭画像。(画像上画的是格拉洪德勋爵和夫人，他们的三个年幼的孩子，以及一只三年前死去的家犬）。

entries.name: Corpses
entries: 房间里躺着八名卫兵的尸体，他们在链子衬衫上穿着血淋淋的破烂的格拉洪德家族制服，还有两名身穿黑色皮甲的甄子丹的尸体。所有人都是人类。

entries.name: Thugs
entries: 这两个拿着长矛的人是身穿黑色皮甲的甄子丹。他们的任务是守住这个房间。他们一见到陌生人，包括城市守望者的成员，就进行攻击。他们没有携带财宝。

entries.name: G9. Parlor
entries: {@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh}回到别墅时被关在这里，但此后不久他就杀了他的卫兵并逃跑了。房间里的家具很舒适，有精致的椅子、一张躺椅、一个酒柜，以及格拉洪德家族各个早已去世的成员的画框。

entries.name: Corpses
entries: 两名卫兵的尸体躺在沾满鲜血的地毯上。卫兵们穿着链式衬衫和格拉洪德家族的制服。

entries.name: G10. Den and Trophy Room
entries: 格拉洪德勋爵的书房里，墙上挂着各种野兽的头颅，角落里站着闪闪发光的盔甲套装。房间里铺着熊皮地毯，坐着臃肿的椅子。
Lord Gralhund recently took up falconry as a hobby. In the middle of the room, resting on a table, is a cage containing a hooded {@creature falcon|WDH} (use {@creature hawk} statistics).

entries.name: G11. Orond's Study
entries: 这个房间的门是锁着的。角色可以通过使用盗贼工具成功地进行DC15灵巧检查来打开锁。这个房间有这些特征。

items: 房间中间的地板上铺着一张10英尺见方的帆布摔跤垫。
天鹅绒扶手椅、基座上的小型裸体男人雕像和高大的红木书架整齐地排列在房间周围。
一个角落里的桃花心木办公桌看起来不怎么使用。

entries.name: Books
entries: 大多数书是用油漆纸板制成的假盒子。有几本里面藏有下流的图画和淫秽的诗句。

entries.name: G12. Family Library
entries: 镶有木板的图书馆包括这些功能。

items: 高大的书架上堆满了书本。安装在栏杆上的滑动木梯可以方便地进入更高的书架。
在一个角落里矗立着一个铁制讲台，上面放着一本封闭的、上了锁的、皮制的小册子。
两张软垫椅子面对着一个大壁炉。其中一张上面披着一张狼皮。

entries.name: Books
entries: 许多书是格拉洪德夫人的父母传给她的，它们被保存得很好。它们包括历史文本、戏剧剧本、小说和诗集。

entries.name: Locked Tome
entries: 虽然它看起来像是一本法术书，但讲台上的这本巨著是格拉洪德家族成就的编年史，经过润色或重铸，以最有利的方式描绘家族。一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语揭示了从这本巨著中散发出来的堕落魔法的光环。

这本巨著是要用格拉洪夫人戴在脖子上的链子上的一把钥匙来开锁的。这把锁可以由使用盗贼工具的人物在DC15的灵巧检查中成功打开，也可以用{@spell knock}咒语或类似的魔法打开。除了使用适当的钥匙之外，以任何其他方式打开这本书都会导致三个{@creature specter||specters}出现在书的10英尺范围内，并攻击其打开者。捆绑幽灵的魔法随着时间的推移而减弱；他们只能在物质界存在1分钟，之后他们会被驱逐到虚无界（除非先被摧毁）。幽灵表现为具有修长手指的幽灵般的铁弗莱人。

Gralhund家族的徽章出现在书的扉页上。这本书的其余部分是用普通话写的，描述了从公元1239年（带血的剑年）到公元1422年（前进的影子年）之间的出生、死亡和其他家族事件。特别值得注意的是一个鲜为人知的事实，即格拉洪德家族在过去几年中与魔鬼签订了契约，产生了一个铁皮人的品系。所有这样的家族成员都被送到远在北方的城市亚尔塔的格拉洪德庄园生活（书的后记中是这么说的），并顺便提到了一些沃特达维亚家族成员生来就有尾巴。

entries.name: G13. Upstairs Foyer
entries: 在这个优雅的门厅里发生了很多事情。

items: 几名甄子丹和内务府卫兵之间的战斗正在激烈进行，地上散落着死尸。
主卧室的门({@area G16|113})打开。(如果格拉洪德夫人在主卧室，她会喊："城市守望者在路上了！"）。
通往G15a区的门是虚掩的。在门外，人物可以听到有人在给另一扇门穿靴子。

entries.name: Corpses
entries: 躺在地上的是六名身穿格拉洪德家族制服，外罩链子衬衫的卫兵和两名身穿黑色皮甲的甄子丹的尸体和武器。

entries.name: Fight in Progress
entries: Gralhund家族的四名{@creature veteran||veterans}成员(每人剩余30点命中率)正在对抗由三名{@creature thug||thugs}(每人剩余20点命中率)组成的Zhents攻击部队。镇民们正试图前往{@area G16|113}，但卫兵们正在阻挡他们。
如果人物没有做任何事情来影响这场战斗的结果，那么假设这场战斗以三个格拉洪德家族的老兵还活着和所有甄氏家族的人都死了而告终。

entries.name: G14. Ballroom
entries: 这个房间的门是锁着的。一个使用盗贼工具的角色可以通过DC15的灵巧检查来撬开锁。这间舞厅无人居住，包含以下特征。

items: 墙上挂着镀金的镜子、流苏的挂毯和彩色玻璃灯。安装在壁炉上方的是一个吹制玻璃制成的雄鹿头。
脉络清晰的大理石地板被打磨得如镜面般光亮。
俗气的水晶吊灯从天花板上垂下，天花板上画着一幅描绘狂欢的壁画。

entries.name: G15. Guest Suite
entries: Until recently, this suite was set aside for the use of {@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh}. Lord Gralhund has barricaded himself in area G15b, using heavy furniture to block the door. Forcing it open requires a successful DC 18 Strength (Athletics) check.

The characters encounter {@creature Urstul Floxin|wdh} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) in area G15a. Urstul is wounded with 50 hit points remaining and has no poison coating his weapons, reducing his challenge rating to 3 (700 XP). He's trying to kick open the door to area G15b in a desperate attempt to capture Lord Gralhund and trade him for the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}. If he is accosted before reaching Lord Gralhund, Urstul tries to flee the villa and uses any other surviving Zhents to cover his escape. He knows the same information that Lord Gralhund does (see "{@creature Orond Gralhund|wdh}" below) but won't divulge it or the name of his master, {@creature Manshoon|WDH}, unless he's magically compelled to do so.
G15a区是一个浴室。东边的窗帘被拉开，露出一个爪足式浴缸。

G15b区是一个木板寝室，桌子上有一个鸟笼，地板上刻有一个永久的传送圈。鸟笼里有三个{@creature flying snake||flying snakes}，乌尔斯图尔用它来给他在整个城市的间谍传递信息。这个圆圈被{@creature Manshoon|WDH}用来与{@creature Urstul Floxin|WDH}秘密会面，并将Zhents传送到Kolat Towers（见第八章）。关于圆环的功能，请参见{@book Player's Handbook|phb}中的{@spell teleportation circle}法术描述。

entries.name: Orond Gralhund
entries: Having blocked the bedroom door with a wardrobe, a desk, and an overstuffed chair, {@creature Orond Gralhund|wdh} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) cowers behind a bed in the southwest corner of area G15b. Although he's armed with a rapier, Orond throws himself at the mercy of the first person to bust through his barricade.
对Gralhund勋爵有求必应的角色可以通过成功的DC 10魅力（恐吓）检查从他那里撬出以下信息，但如果Gralhund勋爵有理由相信他的妻子可以看到或听到对话，则该检查是不利的。

items: "{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}是某种古老的生物，变成了一件工艺品。它知道沃特德普的一个隐藏金库的位置，里面有50万条龙。"
"格拉洪德家族一直在资助黑网在水底世界的行动，包括绑架{@creature Renaer Neverember|wdh}的阴谋和从他父亲的地精间谍达拉哈那里偷取{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}的阴谋。"
"我的妻子对Zhents和他们无法保证文物的安全感到很沮丧。她给了她的机械仆人一个{@item necklace of fireballs}，并派它去帮助取回石头。它粗心大意，误打误撞地把甄子丹卷入了火球。"

entries.name: G16. Master Bedroom
entries: 这个房间的门被推开了。这个房间里有以下住户和特征。

items: {@creature Yalah Gralhund|wdh}，身穿胸甲，手持长剑，站在她衣着光鲜的半兽人保镖旁边，{@creature Hrabbaz|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}的统计数据）。
西南角的一张带顶大床脚下放着一个上锁的木箱。
西北侧的凹室里有一个爪足式浴缸，靠近一面独立的镜子和一个隐私屏幕。
东南角的壁炉上方挂着一个盾牌，上面有格拉洪德的纹章。原木整齐地堆放在壁炉旁边。
一个高大的红木衣柜塞满了昂贵的长袍和礼服，站在一对打开的玻璃门旁边，通向阳台。

entries.name: Yalah Gralhund
entries: Lady Gralhund gave the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} and a map of where to take it to her {@creature nimblewright|wdh} servant, who has left the villa by the time the characters reach this chamber. Its escape is crucial, since it sets into motion the events in chapter 4.
Gralhund夫人和{@creature Hrabbaz|WDH}是唯一知道nimblewright去了哪里的人，但他们在被问及此事时假装不知情。
{@creature Yalah Gralhund|wdh|Yalah}带着一圈钥匙，可以打开宅子里所有锁着的门，以及床脚上锁的木箱。如果她的情况变得很糟糕，{@creature Hrabbaz|WDH}无法保护她，雅拉会打开{@area G18|117}的门锁，冲进去，并在她的下一个动作中锁上身后的门。她在那里做最后的挣扎，她的孩子们在她身后瑟缩着。

entries.name: Wooden Trunk
entries: 箱子上的锁可以用盗贼的工具和成功的DC15灵巧检查来撬开。箱子里似乎有折叠的衣服和鞋子。底部有一个秘密的隔间，如果有人检查了箱子的外部并成功地进行了DC15智慧（感知）检查，就可以发现。这个夹层里有两个阿斯莫德的神圣符号和两件长袍，分别是红色和金色的。
格拉洪德勋爵和夫人都是阿斯莫德崇拜者邪教的秘密成员，在水底世界的特定贵族中很受欢迎。该邪教由{@creature Victoro Cassalanter|WDH}勋爵领导（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}），不过格拉洪德夫妇并不愿意透露这一信息。

entries.name: G17. Balcony
entries: 这个大阳台由华丽的锻铁栏杆围着，上面整齐地摆放着休闲椅。地面在20英尺以下，敞开的玻璃门通向主卧室（{@area G16|113}）。

entries.name: G18. Children's Room
entries: 这个房间的门是锁着的。使用盗贼的工具，通过DC15的灵巧检查，锁可以被撬开。
南墙有三张床，一个空的摇篮靠在东墙。其他家具包括蹲式衣柜、游戏地毯和儿童书桌。

entries.name: Children
entries: 为了安全起见，被关在这里的是格拉洪德家族的两个最小的孩子，一个叫扎坦的13岁男孩和一个叫格雷斯的10岁男孩。两人都是非战斗人员。他们18岁的妹妹托马辛（Tomassin）正在亚尔塔探望一个铁皮人表妹。

entries.name: G19. Servants' Wing
entries: 上层东南区的三个房间是仆人们晚上睡觉的地方。大管家和女仆长有自己的房间，但这些地方目前还没有人住。三间房中最大的一间是公共房间，里面有六张双层床，供初级职员使用。共有九名女仆、厨师和男仆（{@creature commoner||commoners}）躲在这里，等待有人来救他们。他们手持简易武器（擀面杖、拖把、扫帚等），被当作棍棒使用。

entries.name: Aftermath
entries: 在带着{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}逃离格拉洪德别墅后，格拉洪德夫人的{@creature nimblewright|wdh}将神器藏在沃特迪普的一个秘密地点，为第四章创造了条件。

即使格拉洪德别墅的血腥冲突在庄园的围墙外没有被注意到，这场大屠杀也不可能瞒过城市守望者太久。有太多被谋杀的仆人和守卫，任何人都无法掩盖所发生的事情。城市守望的到来预示着{@creature Barnibus Blastwind|WDH}和{@creature Saeth Cromley|wdh}(见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12})的回归，他们带着20名警员({@creature veteran||veterans})和两名{@creature griffon cavalry rider|WDH|Griffon Cavalry riders}(见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12})骑着{@creature griffon||griffons}适时到达。狮鹫和他们的骑手仍然在空中，提供空中支援和侦察。
Barnibus彻底调查了格拉芬德别墅的犯罪现场，并询问了邻居和旁观者。被看到离开现场的人物成为嫌疑人。如果这些人物杀害了Gralhund家族的任何成员，并留下了证人或证据，巴尼布斯指示{@creature Sergeant|WDH}克罗姆利以谋杀贵族的罪名逮捕他们，如果他们被认定有罪，将被判处死刑。

entries.name: Loose Ends
entries: 你可以用下面的可选事件来解决赞塔林人在事后的情况。

entries.name: Bad Time to Be a Zhent
entries: 在被当地报纸称为 "格拉洪德别墅血案 "的事件发生后的几天内，城市观察组织对黑色网络进行了打击。即使是没有已知犯罪关系的Zhentarim成员也被围捕和审讯，包括{@creature Davil Starsong|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）。作为该派系成员的角色暂时是安全的，只要他们保持低调。否则，他们也会被围捕，并在几天内被审问，直到水底城的领主确定他们在格拉洪德别墅的暴力事件中的参与程度。大报跳出来，以最不光彩的方式描写黑网，从而对该派别已经受到质疑的声誉造成了沉重的打击。

entries.name: Encounter with Istrid Horn
entries: 只有当人物直接参与了格拉洪德别墅发生的事件时，才会发生这个遭遇。在{@creature Davil Starsong|WDH}被带去问话后，{@creature Istrid Horn|WDH}(见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12})通过{@creature flying snake}的方式向人物发送了一个信息。这条信息是用普通话写的，内容如下。
我想知道更多关于在格拉洪德别墅发生的事情。如果你能抽出时间，明天上午在死者之城的阿格海龙雕像前见我。你的时间和麻烦会得到丰厚的回报。
-{@creature Istrid Horn|WDH}
如果人物参加会议，请使用以下方框内的文字来帮助设置场景，点缀它以反映季节。
阿加隆的雕像是城市公园墓地中一个著名的地标：一个高大的大理石雕塑，一个长着胡子、穿着长袍的巫师站在同心圆的台阶上，面向西方的沃特德普的天际线，他伸出双手，脸上带着宽厚的笑容。雕像的脚下站着一个身穿板甲的女矮人。
如果天气晴朗，人物可以看到整个墓地的行人、野餐者和嬉戏的孩子。很明显，伊斯特丽德选择了一个安全的、公共的地方进行会面。通过DC15智慧（洞察力）检查成功的人物可以看出她是独自前来的。

伊斯特丽德担心被城市监察局逮捕。虽然她并没有参与有关格拉洪德别墅的事情，但她担心守望先锋会在调查过程中发现她的非法货币借贷业务。她给人物提供了10个pp，只是为了和她见面，并承诺如果人物同意帮助她潜伏一天，则再提供40个pp--交易达成后支付一半，在她逗留结束后支付一半。如果他们拒绝了她的提议，并且队伍中包括一个或多个Zhentarim成员，她威胁说如果她被逮捕并被指控犯罪，她将揭露他们的隶属关系并把他们也拉下水。

entries.name: Hiding Istrid
entries: 如果角色们决定让伊斯特丽德躲在他们的酒馆里，她会用一个伪装工具把自己装扮成一个名叫乔恩的男性矮人。如果被要求这样做，一旦她安顿下来，她愿意在这里做一些杂务。最终，没有人来找她，但她藏得越久，她就变得越暴躁，要求越高。
如果角色们容忍她的不良行为，伊斯特丽德就会按照承诺在这一天结束时离开，并向角色们支付她所欠的剩余款项。作为Zhentarim成员的角色，在Istrid需要帮助的时候庇护她会获得额外的好处：他们在该派系中的声望增加2。
另一方面，如果这些人物把她赶走或向城市守望者告发她，伊斯特丽德就会成为他们的死敌，并试图处处破坏他们。

entries.name: Harming Istrid
entries: As a precaution against being double-crossed, Istrid shared her plan concerning the characters with at least one other member of the Doom Raiders (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). If the characters betray or harm Istrid, her former adventuring companions use every resource at their disposal to ruin the characters. The laws of Waterdeep discourage them from attacking the characters openly, but they can damage the party's business by scaring off their clientele, and characters might find themselves the targets of worse if they dare to leave the confines of the city.

entries.name: Level Advancement
entries: 如果你使用故事里程碑来提升人物的等级，而不是追踪经验值，那么如果他们对火球事件进行了自己的调查并影响了格拉洪德别墅事件的结果，那么人物就会从第三级升到第四级。否则，他们在第四章开始时仍然是第三级。

data.name: Dragon Season
entries: 金子会让人做出奇怪的事情，而纽伦堡勋爵隐藏的龙的宝库正在被争夺。{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}知道宝库的位置以及如何进入里面，本章的大部分内容都集中在人物对神器的追捕上。摆在他们面前的挑战取决于你选择的反对他们的反派（或反派）。无论在什么季节，反派的目标都很简单：获得石头，找到龙之谷，并索取里面的财宝。

entries.name: Setting the Stage
entries: In chapter 3, Lady Gralhund's {@creature nimblewright|wdh} took the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} and fled with it. The nimblewright delivers the artifact to a location and leaves it there for the main villain or villains to retrieve:

items: 如果{@creature Xanathar|WDH}是恶棍，石头会被送到一个叫{@creature Grinda Garloth|WDH}的法师那里。她拥有一辆{@item apparatus of Kwalish}，住在Mistshore，这是一个建在Dock Ward的码头上的肮脏街区。
如果卡萨兰特家族是恶棍，那么这块石头就会被放在他们家族在沃特迪普的墓地--死亡之城的墓穴里。一个半身人死灵法师会在卡萨兰特人或角色之前找到它。
如果贾拉索是恶棍，石头就会被送到贸易区的点灯人费纳斯-斯托姆卡斯尔手中。费内鲁斯有犯罪史，目前正陷入法律的困境。
如果{@creature Manshoon|WDH}是坏蛋，石头就会被带到{@creature Thrakkus|wdh}那里，他是田野区的一个龙裔屠夫，为Zhentarim劈开尸体。

entries.name: Finding the Nimblewright
entries: If the characters can't pick up the trail after the {@creature nimblewright|wdh} escapes with the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}, they might turn to the City Watch, the City Guard, or a friendly faction for help, which comes forth in {@dice 1d4} days. If it occurs to none of the characters, an NPC suggests that the party visit the House of Inspired Hands to see whether the priests of Gond know a way to find it (see "Nim's Secret"). Thereafter, armed with Nim's nimblewright detector, the characters can sweep the city. But by the time they find the nimblewright, it has already delivered the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} to its intended destination.

entries.name: Caught at Last!
entries: 当它最终被发现时，{@creature nimblewright|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）穿着一件偷来的斗篷，躲在小巷里一堆未被收集的垃圾下面。角色们究竟在什么地方、什么时候偶然发现它，取决于你。由于无处可去，也没有其他目的，它一直战斗到被摧毁。无论这一事件发生在何时何地，当战斗结束时，六名城市守望者（{@creature veteran||veterans}）到达。在这场骚乱的吸引下，守望者们根本不关心这个灵活的人，他们相信人物告诉他们的任何合理的故事。(作为一个结构体，它没有任何权利可言。)警官们已经接近下班时间，急于继续工作；他们敦促角色们回家，不要再惹麻烦了。

entries.name: Lady Gralhund's Map
entries: Lady Gralhund gave her {@creature nimblewright|wdh} a map showing where to take the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}, but she forgot to tell it to destroy the map once the stone was delivered. Characters who search the nimblewright's remains find the folded-up map, which depicts one of Waterdeep's wards. Written on the map is an X with a name next to it. This map points the characters to where they need to be, setting off a sequence of encounters (see "Encounter Chains" below). The main villain determines which ward the map depicts and what name is written on it:

items: 如果{@creature Xanathar|WDH}是恶棍，"{@creature Grinda Garloth|WDH} "就会写在码头区地图的X旁。(X标志着Mistshore的码头区，Grinda住在那里)。
如果卡萨兰特人是恶棍，"卡萨兰特 "这个名字就会被写在亡灵之城地图的X旁。(这个X标志着卡萨兰特陵墓的位置）。
如果贾拉索是反派，"费内鲁斯-斯托姆卡斯尔 "会被写在贸易区地图的X旁。(贸易区的居民知道费纳罗斯。他是一个有小巷住所的点灯人。X标志着这条小巷）。
如果{@creature Manshoon|WDH}是恶棍，"{@creature Thrakkus|WDH} "就会被写在田野区地图的X旁。(这个X标志着{@creature Thrakkus|wdh}的肉店和住所的位置）。

entries.name: Obtaining the Stone of Golorr
entries: {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}拥有聪明的外星智力，并且有足够的预知能力，意识到人物注定要找到它。不过，这块石头并不希望太容易被找到。

如果角色们比预期的时间更早地得到这块石头，它就会证明自己是不合作的，并试图尽快地从队伍中分离出来，在此期间拒绝与角色们分享任何知识。这块石头试图控制任何与之相适应的人，从而引发冲突（见《{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg}》第七章的 "有生命的魔法物品"）。如果石头没能控制住，它就不能再对那个角色尝试，直到下一个黎明。如果石头成功地控制了它的主人，它就会命令那个角色把它送到本章所讨论的一连串遭遇的哪个地点（见 "遭遇链"）。一旦这块石头从它当前的主人身上剥离出来，它就会试图从那个角色的头脑中抹去所有关于它的知识（见附录A中的物品描述）。任何一个角色被迫忘记石头的玩家都要承担扮演这种记忆丧失的责任。你可以授予该角色灵感，作为对该玩家良好角色扮演的认可。
随着第四章的展开，你要决定什么时候该让人物有机会获得Golorr之石了。尽量不让他们得到它，以使悬念最大化。
Once the characters have earned the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}, it no longer tries to take control of them. A character can attune to it and learn the following information:

items: 龙之谷的位置（见 "龙之谷"）。
打开金库大门所需的三把钥匙（见 "金库钥匙"）。
金库的金龙守护者的名字，以及它所拥有的法杖的力量（见附录A中对{@item dragonstaff of Ahghairon|WDH}的描述）。

entries.name: Encounter Chains
entries: 八个遭遇战构成了人物对{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}和龙库的追捕。它们构成了一个链条，其顺序由你选择的反派和季节决定。对页的图示说明了每条链中遭遇的顺序。例如，如果{@creature Xanathar|WDH}是反派，那么这个链条从遭遇2 "迷雾海岸 "开始，以遭遇6 "剧院 "结束。
不要觉得被遭遇链所束缚。让人物的决定和行动来推动故事的发展。你可以改变遭遇战发生的顺序，删除你不需要的遭遇战，或者创造新的遭遇战。你还可以修改遭遇，以适应你的口味。
如果人物偏离了方向，他们可能会发现自己不知下一步该做什么。你有几个简单的方法来引导他们回到正轨。

items: 掌握{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}行踪信息的友好派别可以把这些知识带给人物。
恶棍的一个奸诈的手下以价格为由透露了{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}的位置。

entries.name: If a Villain Gets the Stone
entries: 如果一个主要的反派获得了{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}，该反派需要{@dice 2d6}天来找到龙之谷和它的钥匙。在这段时间里，人物有机会从反派的巢穴中偷到石头。如果人物没有及时偷到石头，小人就会派人进入金库，打败{@creature Aurinax|WDH}并收回黄金，这又需要{@dice 2d6}天。一旦找回黄金，小人就会按照导言中详述的总体计划前进。如果人物还活着，他们可以通过从小人的巢穴偷取黄金来反对小人。

entries.name: Spring Encounter Chain
entries: Golorr之石最初是从{@creature Xanathar|WDH}那里抢来的，而眼球暴君想把它夺回来。它派出怪物和奴仆来做它的肮脏工作。

entries.name: Summary
entries: The stone is delivered to {@creature Grinda Garloth|WDH}, a mage who has worked for {@creature Xanathar|WDH} in the past. When she refuses to give up the stone, members of the Xanathar Guild try to take it by force (encounter 2, "Mistshore"). After the characters defeat these attackers, they learn that Grinda told her rat familiar to hide the stone in her family's crypt in the City of the Dead. From this point on, the characters are followed by a gazer (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}), through whose eyes {@creature Xanathar|WDH} can see. If this gazer is killed, {@creature Xanathar|WDH} doesn't send another one to replace it.

{@creature Losser Mirklav|wdh}, a halfling necromancer, raids the Garloth mausoleum and takes the stone shortly before the characters arrive (encounter 4, "Mausoleum"). As they emerge from the mausoleum, members of the Xanathar Guild attack them, believing they have the stone. A clue left behind in the mausoleum leads the characters to an old windmill in the Southern Ward and a pair of grave robbers (encounter 10, "Converted Windmill"). Fearing arrest, the grave robbers point them to a cellar complex under the Trades Ward (encounter 9, "Cellar Complex"). When the characters arrive, they find Losser surrounded by foes and kenku working for the Xanathar Guild making off with the stone. A chase through the streets on or before Trolltide (encounter 3, "Street Chase") ends when the kenku, fearing capture, duck into an old tower (encounter 7, "Old Tower"). If they are caught and confronted, the kenku hand over the stone.

The Xanathar Guild makes one last attempt to regain the stone (encounter 1, "Alley"). Any character who becomes attuned to the stone learns that the Vault of Dragons lies beneath a theater in the Castle Ward (encounter 6, "Theater").

entries.name: Weather Effects
entries: 在遭遇链完成之前，以下天气效应会发挥作用。

entries.name: Heavy Rain
entries: 大雨从中午一直下到半夜。雨中的生物在依靠听觉或视觉的智慧（感知）检查中处于不利地位。雨水也会熄灭明火。能见度降低到60英尺。

entries.name: Thick Fog
entries: 从午夜到中午，整个城市都被浓雾所笼罩。雾中的生物在依靠视觉的智慧（感知）检查中处于劣势。能见度降低到30英尺。

entries.name: Summer Encounter Chain
entries: 在沃特达维亚人应对炎热的天气时，卡萨兰特人派出他们崇拜阿斯莫德的邪教弟子去夺取戈罗尔之石，同时巧妙地避免与当地政府发生纠葛。

entries.name: Summary
entries: 人物来到卡萨兰特陵墓，发现里面有几个死去的邪教徒（遭遇4，"陵墓"）。一个被遗弃的幸存者透露，这些邪教徒是被他们中的两个人出卖的。角色们前往南区的一个旧风车，邪教狂热者们在那里练习他们邪恶的信仰（遭遇10，"改装的风车"）。有刺的魔鬼猛扑过来，抢走了石头，然后逃走了，从而引发了一场屋顶追逐战（遭遇5，"屋顶追逐"）。

有刺的魔鬼把石头送到停在小巷里的一辆出租汽车上（遭遇1，"小巷"）。车内是{@creature Victoro Cassalanter|WDH}的男仆，{@creature Willifort Crowelle|WDH}，一个二重身的铁皮人。当出租马车逃跑时，一场街头追逐战随之展开（遭遇3，"街头追逐"）。当一群人切断了他的逃跑路线时，威利福特跳出了出租汽车，试图在人群中迷失自己。在混乱中，街头顽童抢走了石头。角色们在孩子们的地窖藏身处追上了他们（遭遇9，"地窖情结"）。
带着{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}的东西，人物从地窖里出来，却发现自己被城市守卫的成员包围。他们因一项或多项罪行被逮捕，并被带到码头区的一个法院，接受法官的判决（遭遇8，"法院"）。与此同时，二重身试图拿回石头。
任何与{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}相适应的角色都会了解到龙之谷隐藏在海区的一座旧塔下（遭遇7，"旧塔"）。当他们到达塔楼时，他们遇到了塔楼的新主人，他正在和当地的各个公会成员讨论装修问题。

entries.name: Weather Effects
entries: 在遭遇链完成之前，以下的天气效应正在发挥作用。

entries.name: Heat Wave
entries: During the day, a character without access to drinkable water must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw at the end of each encounter in the chain or gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}. The saving throw is made with disadvantage if the character is wearing medium or heavy armor. Characters who have resistance or immunity to fire automatically succeed on the saving throw.

entries.name: Autumn Encounter Chain
entries: Deception and misdirection are Jarlaxle's forte, and he likes to trick his rivals into working for him. He steers the characters toward the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} and lets them think they're always one step ahead. Drow player characters who are members of Bregan D'aerthe might find their loyalty to the party put to the test.

entries.name: Summary
entries: The characters visit the residence of Fenerus Stormcastle, a lamplighter and retired brigand who funnels information to Bregan D'aerthe. They arrive to find the place ransacked (encounter 1, "Alley"). The duergar who looted the residence work for the Xanathar Guild, and Bregan D'aerthe spies have tracked them to a cellar complex in the Southern Ward. In the guise of {@creature Laeral Silverhand|WDH}, Jarlaxle steers the characters in that direction (encounter 9, "Cellar Complex"). A search of the cellar complex yields a fake stone, but not the real {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}. With no other leads, the characters can follow up with "Laeral" at a theater in the Dock Ward (encounter 6, "Theater"). Jarlaxle makes the characters an offer they can't refuse, setting his agents on them if they dare to do so.

Once he realizes the Xanathar Guild doesn't have the stone, Jarlaxle asks the characters to interrogate Fenerus to find out where he hid it. Jarlaxle has learned that Fenerus is awaiting trial at a courthouse in the Castle Ward (encounter 8, "Courthouse"). Fenerus wants immunity for all of his past crimes. The characters are in no position to grant his wish, but they might threaten him, persuade him, or use magic to charm him. If he is compelled to reveal the stone's location, Fenerus points the characters to an old tower in the Dock Ward (encounter 7, "Old Tower").
贾拉索的副官们首先到达了石头上，并在码头区的屋顶上逃跑，以躲避这些人物（遭遇5，"屋顶追逐"）。他们到了Mistshore的地面上（遭遇2，"Mistshore"）。一旦人物从这些乌鸦手中夺回石头，他们就可以用它来指引他们到海区一个著名画家的家（遭遇10，"改装的风车"），风车下面是一条通往龙之谷的隧道。

entries.name: Weather Effects
entries: 在遭遇链完成之前，以下的天气效应正在发挥作用。

entries.name: Autumn Wind
entries: 风在街道上呼啸而过，对依靠听觉的远程武器攻击卷和智慧（感知）检查造成不利影响。风也会扑灭比火炬火焰小的明火。

entries.name: Winter Encounter Chain
entries: 现在是沃特德普不满的冬天。为{@creature Manshoon|WDH}服务的Zhents相信他们的主人是全能的，这让他们变得肆无忌惮。在寒冷的背景下，他们愿意对当地政府指手画脚，冒着死亡的危险去追捕{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}。

entries.name: Summary
entries: The stone is delivered to {@creature Thrakkus|wdh}, a dragonborn butcher in the Field Ward (encounter 10, "Converted Windmill"). {@creature Thrakkus|WDH} hides the stone in one of his meat deliveries. The characters follow the delivery cart to an alley in the Trades Ward where Zhents meet in secret (encounter 1, "Alley"). Before the characters can lay hands on the stone, a Zhent named Vevette Blackwater grabs it and flees, initiating a chase across icy rooftops (encounter 5, "Rooftop Chase"). She hands off the stone to Agorn Fuoco, a bard who is attending a play in a nearby theater (encounter 6, "Theater"), before leading her pursuers on a merry chase through the snow-covered streets (encounter 3, "Street Chase"). The characters learn that the stone has been taken by hire-coach to Mistshore. The characters can catch up to Agorn there (encounter 2, "Mistshore").

If he is captured and questioned, Agorn reveals that he made one stop on his way to Mistshore. He dropped off a lady friend, a priest of Bane allied with the Zhentarim, and left the stone with her and her acolytes for safekeeping. The characters can find them in an old tower in the Castle Ward (encounter 7, "Old Tower"). Before they leave that place, the characters are confronted by {@creature Manshoon|WDH}'s simulacrum, which arrives by way of teleportation circle to collect the stone. Once the simulacrum is defeated, the characters can use the stone to learn that the entrance to the Vault of Dragons is hidden below a mausoleum in the City of the Dead (encounter 4, "Mausoleum").

entries.name: Weather Effects
entries: 在遭遇链完成之前，以下天气效应会发挥作用。

entries.name: Blizzard
entries: Shrieking wind and falling snow impose disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight. The wind also extinguishes open fires smaller than a torch flame. Visibility is reduced to 60 feet. Snow on the ground creates {@quickref difficult terrain||3} in areas that are not heavily trod.

entries.name: Extreme Cold
entries: A character exposed to the cold must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw at the end of each encounter in the chain or gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}. Characters who have resistance or immunity to cold automatically succeed on the saving throw, as do those wearing cold weather gear (thick coats, gloves, hats, and the like).

entries.name: Modifying Encounters
entries: 你可以通过增加或减少怪物来调整战斗遭遇的难度。如果你需要增加已经开始的遭遇战的难度，可以让敌人的增援部队在战斗中到达。如果你觉得一场遭遇战太过致命，可以减少敌人的命中率，让NPC来帮助角色，或者让坏人减少损失并逃走。

entries.name: Encounter 1: Alley
entries: 使用地图4.1进行这次遭遇战。除非你另有决定，否则小巷边上的建筑物都有30英尺（三层）高。由于这场遭遇战发生在户外，所以要注意任何天气的影响。

entries.name: Areas of the Alley
entries: 以下地点与地图4.1相呼应。

entries.name: L1. Alley Residence
entries: 这座古老的、单层的、没有窗户的石屋，有一个石板屋顶，藏在小巷的中间，周围是更高的建筑。它的门是用结实的木头做的，外门可以从里面用栅栏锁住。打破有栅栏的门需要成功进行DC18力量（运动）检查。
室内分为两个房间，一个带壁炉的厨房和一个装修朴素的卧室。

entries.name: L2. Store
entries: 这座石头建筑是某种类型的商店。如果遇到的情况没有说明这里卖的是什么东西，可以掷出{@dice d20}并查阅商店货物表来确定商店卖的是什么。
一个小房间作为衣帽间，游客可以在那里挂上他们较重的外衣。穿过衣帽间，就是商店本身，里面陈列着各种商品。北面的房间是一个储藏室或一个车间。店主（{@creature commoner}）有所有门的钥匙。

entries.name: Alley: Spring
entries: 当这场遭遇战开始时，要么人物把{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}抓在手里，在这种情况下，他们在穿过塔附近的小巷时被偷袭，要么是被{@creature Xanathar|WDH}的凝视者间谍夺走，在这种情况下，他们在小巷里追上凝视者，然后这些生物就可以下到下水道里了。

entries.name: Bear Traps
entries: 在地图上选择五个方块。这些方格中都有很深的泥浆水坑。每个水坑中都隐藏着一个弹簧式的捕熊器。一个被动感知分数为13分或更高的生物在不小心踏入陷阱之前会发现陷阱。
任何踏入陷阱方阵的生物都必须做一个DC10的灵巧救赎动作。如果救赎失败，该生物会受到3({@dice 1d6})的砍伤，因为陷阱会在其脚踝处扣住，并且该生物会被{@condition restrained}，直到陷阱被移除。作为一个行动，生物可以尝试撬开陷阱，只要成功进行DC12力量（竞技）检查即可。

entries.name: Ambushers
entries: The characters enter the alley followed by eight {@creature kobold||kobolds} disguised as children wearing troll masks. A {@creature bugbear} named Morga and an {@creature intellect devourer} hide in a doorway halfway down the alley and can be spotted with a successful DC 16 Wisdom (Perception) check.

When the characters reach Morga's hiding spot, the bugbear and the kobolds attack. The intellect devourer stays hidden and tries to take control of a character. Given the chance, Morga tries to shove a character into the nearest trap. If these creatures obtain the stone, they bring it to {@creature Xanathar|WDH} in its lair (see chapter 5).

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果一个角色与{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}相适应，它就会显示出龙库的位置，在城堡区的一个叫做粉色弗隆夫的剧院下面，以及进入它所需的三把钥匙。当人物准备好访问该地点时，继续进行遭遇战6，"剧院"。

entries.name: Alley: Summer
entries: 角色们在俯瞰小巷的屋顶上开始这场遭遇战。如果在屋顶追逐过程中，有任何角色进入地面，就从小巷的一端开始。

entries.name: Hire-Coach
entries: 巷子中间停着一辆由两个{@creature draft horse||draft horses}拉着的出租马车。司机哈鲁-哈马托里（LG男科萨库兰人平民）戴着一顶羽毛帽和配套的衣服。

卡萨兰特勋爵的{@creature doppelganger}侍从，化身为一个名叫{@creature Willifort Crowelle|WDH}的老年铁皮人，坐在客舱里，客舱里有一半的掩护。站在出租马车旁边的是一个{@creature bearded devil}伪装成戴着宽边帽的隐身人保镖，而马车上有三个{@condition invisible}{@creature imp||imps}。任何在之前的遭遇中幸存下来的{@creature spined devil||spined devils}也在这里，他们刚刚把{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}送到了威利福特。
当他看到这些人物时，威利弗特命令小恶魔和带刺的魔鬼进行攻击。大胡子魔鬼紧跟在威利福特身边，与任何试图接近租来的马车的人物交战。
聘请的教练有14点攻击力，45点攻击力，对毒药和精神伤害有免疫力。

If there's any chance that the characters might obtain the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} as the encounter progresses, Willifort orders the driver to move the hire-coach out of the alley as quickly as possible. If the driver is {@condition incapacitated} or killed, the bearded devil climbs into the driver's seat on the back of the coach and steers the vehicle. If the bearded devil is unable to replace the driver, the doppelganger takes the reins. Willifort flees on foot if the hirecoach is destroyed or its horses are unable to move.

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果威利福特逃跑了，而角色们追赶他，则继续进行遭遇3，"街头追逐"。

entries.name: Alley: Autumn
entries: 人物对{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}的追求首先使他们找到了费内鲁斯-斯托姆卡斯尔，一个在贸易区({@area L1|140})租了一间小房子的点灯人。

entries.name: Apple Cart
entries: 人物从两端进入小巷。确定他们的行进顺序，然后在他们到达小巷的中点后阅读以下文字。
一辆满载苹果的手推车从相反的方向向你飞奔而来，滚下山坡。骑在车上的是一个戴着眼罩的铁皮人男孩，正在大声叫喊。"小心！"他喊道。

A character in the path of the apple cart must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or be struck for 5 ({@dice 2d4}) bludgeoning damage and knocked {@condition prone}. A character can forgo the Dexterity saving throw and try to stop the cart bodily, doing so with a successful DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the character is struck by the cart and falls {@condition prone} as it continues to roll. After plowing through the party, the cart flips on its side, sending apples tumbling down the alley. The tiefling boy is thrown from the cart but not seriously hurt.
这个男孩是三个街头顽童中的一个，他们合伙从附近的街角偷走了苹果车。另外两个孩子在小巷的峰顶上失去了对车的控制，他们才跳上去。他们在撞车后追上了他们的朋友，确保他没事，然后向任何受伤的人深表歉意。这些顽童是无害的麻烦制造者，在侧边栏"{@area The Three Urchins|14e|x} "中详细介绍。
如果他们被问及费内鲁斯，孩子们就知道他是谁。他们形容他是一个头发花白的大个子，根据 "他脸上的伤痕"，他看起来像是打过很多架。他们对他一无所知，只知道他独自生活。
如果这些人物没有把他们吓跑，孩子们就会在巷子周围闲逛，吃苹果，在垃圾堆里捡东西。

entries.name: Fenerus's House
entries: 费内鲁斯家的门开着，这里已经被洗劫一空。厨房的墙上用血画了一个圆，圆周上有十条等距的线向外辐射：{@creature Xanathar|WDH}的符号。彻底搜查，并成功通过DC12智慧（感知）检查，可以发现厨房地板上有小块的血迹。检验成功还可以证实地板和墙壁上的血是新鲜的。

entries.name: Fenerus's Story
entries: 费纳鲁斯-斯托姆卡斯尔（Fenerus Stormcastle）是血鹰帮的创始人，这个由骑马的强盗组成的帮派至今仍在通往安菲勒的路上骚扰旅行者。当他在一次失败的突袭后被逐出帮派时，费纳鲁斯 "退休 "到沃特迪普，并加入了钱德勒和点灯人公会。
直到最近，费纳鲁斯还在为卢斯坎城做间谍，向他的联络人提供有关沃特迪普政治气候的信息，以及他每晚在贸易区巡视时听到的一些有趣的消息，以此来补充他的收入。他不知道他的联络人是布雷根-达埃特的乌鸦成员，因为他们穿着斗篷，一直躲在暗处。
领主联盟的特工最近将费纳鲁斯列为通缉犯，并通知了沃特迪普领主，后者派出城市守卫队将其逮捕。费纳鲁斯很明智地将{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}藏在了其他地方，并希望以此为筹码获得自由，以及对过去罪行的宽恕。

Shortly after Fenerus's arrest, drow agents of Bregan D'aerthe showed up to collect the stone and were waylaid by {@condition invisible} duergar hiding in the alley. The duergar were members of the Xanathar Guild that had been sent by {@creature Nar'l Xibrindas|wdh} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) to retrieve the stone. After searching Fenerus's home and finding nothing, they were waiting for Fenerus to return when the drow showed up. The drow barely got away with their lives.

entries.name: The Three Urchins
entries: 三个街头顽童，如下所述，出现在本章的几个场景中。{@b Nat}是一个瘦长的10岁聋哑的伊鲁斯坎女孩，带着一把木制玩具剑。她是这群人的领袖，用她发明并教给朋友的手语进行交流。(1%)是一个胖乎乎的9岁图拉米男孩，穿着斗篷，拿着玩具魔杖，还有一个毛绒猫头鹰 "熟人"。他在陌生人面前很害羞，但在帮助朋友时却很勇敢。(2%)是一个瘦小的9岁铁弗林男孩，戴着眼罩，拿着小弓，还有一个玩具箭筒。他很少在说话或行动前思考。

entries.name: Jarlaxle in Disguise
entries: 在人物离开小巷之前，{@creature Jarlaxle Baenre|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）用他的{@item hat of disguise}化身为{@creature Laeral Silverhand|WDH}，即水底世界的开放领主来接近他们。

A tall, graceful woman in an emerald green cloak approaches you, her long, silver hair billowing out from under her hood. "If you've come looking for Fenerus Stormcastle, I'm afraid you're too late," she says. "It appears {@creature Xanathar|WDH} has gotten to him first. Fenerus had something in his possession that I desire. Perhaps you can help retrieve it."
"Laeral "告诉角色们，Fenerus手上有一个叫{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}的有生命的魔法物品，它知道被城市的前任开放领主侵吞的大量黄金的位置。她要求角色们为了沃特迪普的利益，取回这块石头，并把它送到码头区的七张面具剧院给她。除了沃特德普的开放领主的感激之外，"Laeral "没有提供任何奖励。

Jarlaxle suspects that {@creature Nar'l Xibrindas|wdh}, his spy in the Xanathar Guild, has betrayed him and is now using the resources of Bregan D'aerthe to help the beholder retrieve the stone. Jarlaxle also knows that the Xanathar Guild has a refuge fairly close by, in a cellar complex under the Southern Ward. "Laeral" suggests that the characters search for the stone there. (Jarlaxle doesn't want Nar'l to know that he's onto him, which is why he would rather send a small group of adventurers than call upon a Bregan D'aerthe attack force.)
怀疑Laeral意图的人物可以通过Jarlaxle的魅力（欺骗）检查，成功地确定她在隐藏什么。如果这些人物以某种方式穿透了贾拉索的伪装，他就会微笑着给他们10,000金币，如果他们及时把石头送到七面罩剧院给他的话。他向他们保证，说实话，他打算把黄金还给沃特德普，以换取一些政治上的善意。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: If the characters invade the Xanathar Guild refuge, proceed with encounter 9, "Cellar Complex."

entries.name: Alley: Winter
entries: 人物在寻找{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}的过程中，他们来到了贸易区一条被雪覆盖的小巷，里面有一个没有窗户的Zhentarim安全屋({@area L1|140})和一个叫Cuttle's Meat Pies({@area L2|141})的肉店。

The characters approach from either end of the alley. Hoofprints and wheel ruts in the snow testify that Justyn Rassk's delivery cart passed through the alley recently after a brief stop outside the meat shop. A character who inspects the tracks and succeeds on a DC 10 Wisdom (Survival) check can tell that the deliverer visited both the shop and the alley residence. Before the characters can investigate further, they are assaulted by members of the Xanathar Guild.

entries.name: Bugbears Attack
entries: At the end of a dead-end side alley south of areas L1 and L2 is an iron grate that covers an opening to the sewers under the North Ward. Five {@creature bugbear||bugbears} have quietly climbed up through the grate and concealed themselves in the side alley. They pour out and attack the characters, hoping to gain surprise in the blizzard. Characters who have a passive Perception score of 16 or higher aren't {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.
这些虫子被{@creature Xanathar|WDH}派去取回被关在Zhent安全屋里的囚犯，但他们太嗜血了，不愿意放弃谋杀挡在他们面前的一帮冒险者的机会。风和雪使城市守望者对危险熟视无睹。

entries.name: Cuttle's Meat Pies
entries: Characters who speak to the proprietor of the meat shop, a portly middle-aged woman named Sora Cuttle (LG female Illuskan human {@creature commoner}), learn that she received an unexpected delivery from Justyn Rassk of the Guild of Butchers. Given that fresh meat is in short supply in winter, Sora could hardly turn it down. If the characters see fit to tell her that the meat came from chopped-up humanoids, Sora falls ill. She has no knowledge of {@creature Thrakkus|wdh}'s nasty handiwork and promises to bring the matter to the attention of the Guild of Butchers and the local magister. Until then, she won't use any of {@creature Thrakkus|WDH}'s meat to make her famous meat pies.
索拉对她在{@area L1|140}的两个邻居很怀疑。他们在奇怪的时间来来去去，有时晚上回来时，皮甲上还沾着血。如果人物对索拉有礼貌地提醒她注意这些肉，她会很高兴地分享她对淘气的邻居的担忧，以及对他们的描述。一个是20多岁的苍白、憔悴的女人，有一头乌黑的头发。另一个是一个年长得多的黑皮肤男人，秃头，半截耳朵，留着白色的短胡须。

entries.name: Zhentarim Safe House
entries: This windowless house is occupied by two Zhents loyal to {@creature Manshoon|WDH}-the same individuals that Sora describes. Their names are Avareen Windrivver (LE female Illuskan human {@creature spy}) and Zorbog Jyarkoth (NE male Turami human {@creature thug}).

When the characters first enter the alley, Avareen is in the front doorway of the house, handing the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} to a high-ranking Zhent named Vevette Blackwater (CE female Tethyrian human {@creature swashbuckler|VGM}; see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). Zorbog is stoking a fire in the fireplace while quietly observing the transaction. With stone in hand, Vevette scrambles up to the rooftops, leaving Avareen and Zorbog to deal with the survivors of the conflict between the characters and the bugbears.

Gagged and tied to a chair in the back room of the house is a known member of the Xanathar Guild-a shield dwarf who wears a leather skullcap stitched with fake beholder eyestalks. The dwarf, {@creature Ott Steeltoes|wdh} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}), was captured while buying fish food in a Dock Ward market. After the Zhents interrogated Ott, it became clear to them that {@creature Xanathar|WDH} would want him back. He is being held until a ransom is paid, but {@creature Xanathar|WDH} has learned where he is being kept. Any bugbears that survived the initial attack try to rescue Ott, while Avareen and Zorbog do their best to fight them off. If Ott is set free, he runs back to the waiting eyestalks of his insane beholder master. Characters who follow him are led straight to {@creature Xanathar|WDH}'s lair (see chapter 5).

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 任何在振特家门前10英尺范围内的人物都可以进行DC14智慧（感知）检查。测验成功的人可以听到呼啸的风中传来嘲讽的笑声，并瞥见附近的屋顶上有一个隐身的身影，在暴风雪中飞快地跑开。如果角色们追赶这个身影，就进行遭遇战5，"屋顶追逐"。
