entries.name: Encounter 2: Mistshore
entries: Mistshore是一个破旧的Dock Ward社区，散发着鱼腥味和烧焦的木材。一年多前，一场大火席卷了这个地区，现在大多数建筑都是烧毁的外壳，屋顶上（最多是）有风帆。码头上摆放着渔竿和渔网，15英尺深的水在冬季被一层厚厚的冰覆盖。

entries.name: Areas of Mistshore
entries: 迷雾海岸是一个由旧船的木头制成的破旧房屋的骚乱集合体，居住着贫穷的沃特达威人。去年的大火使一些建筑化为灰烬。虽然有些被重建了，但其他的被毁得无法修复，现在被无家可归的儿童和{@creature rat||rats}作为无屋顶的巢穴使用。
以下地点是地图4.2的关键。

entries.name: D1. Kraken's Folly
entries: 克拉肯的愚蠢号是一艘搁浅的海盗船，迷雾海岸的一些居民将其作为租房使用。在任何时候，{@dice 4d6}{@creature bandit||bandits}的人在甲板上闲逛，希望有需要人手的人给他们工作。这些无赖住在甲板下老鼠成灾的船舱里。他们愿意为任何有求于他们的人提供帮助，但要付出代价。每个人都需要1个金币来参与战斗，或者为他们的雇主制造一个分心的机会。

entries.name: D2. Grinda's Residence
entries: A mad treasure hunter named {@creature Grinda Garloth|WDH} (CN female Illuskan human {@creature mage} who speaks Common, Dwarvish, Halfling, and Undercommon) lives here. Her ramshackle home contains an unmade bed, an alchemist's laboratory, a small stove, a coat rack, a table, a stool, a stuffed chair in poor condition, a wash basin, and a locked wooden sea chest with a {@spell glyph of warding} spell cast on it. Grinda carries the key, and the glyph triggers an explosive runes effect (see the spell description in the {@book Player's Handbook|phb}) if anyone other than Grinda lifts the lid of the chest.

entries.name: Chest
entries: 格林达的箱子里有一把沉重的铁钥匙，可以锁住和打开死者之城的加洛斯家族陵墓（见下文 "迷雾海岸：春天"）。

entries.name: D3. Grinda's Apparatus

entries.title: Grinda and her Apparatus of Kwalish

entries: 当她不使用设备在深水港寻宝的时候，{@creature Grinda Garloth|WDH}把她的{@item apparatus of Kwalish}放在这里。当设备在这里时，它漂浮在一个封闭的码头上。通往港口的水下金属门被一根横跨在里面的铁条挡住了。仪器可以自动抬起铁栏杆；海湾内的生物可以通过成功的DC20力量（竞技）检查抬起它。

entries.name: Borrowing the Apparatus
entries: 格林达允许角色们借用她的{@item apparatus of Kwalish}，条件是他们先用这个装置在深水港的底部搜索宝藏，并把找到的东西分一半给她。为了满足法师的要求，角色们必须花一天时间搜索港口。在这一天结束时，飞行员进行一次情报（调查）检查。检查结果乘以10来确定找到的任何财宝的金块价值。格琳达把赏金卖掉，并把一半给了这些人物。

As the characters search the harbor for treasure, roll any die. If an even number is rolled, an awakened shark named {@creature Obliteros|wdh} attacks them. Grinda has had several close encounters with the shark recently, but fails to mention this to the characters for fear of scaring them off. {@creature Obliteros|wdh} is a {@creature giant shark}, with these changes:

items: 鲨鱼的定位是混乱的邪恶。
它的智力得分是10（+0），它能说和听懂阿肯语。

entries.name: Mistshore: Spring
entries: {@creature Xanathar|WDH} has sent forces to collect the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} from {@creature Grinda Garloth|WDH}, known up and down the wharf as an eccentric wizard who owns a submersible contraption that she uses to hunt for treasure on the bottom of Deepwater Harbor. The characters have no trouble getting directions to her Mistshore residence ({@area D2|15a}).

When the characters arrive at her home, Grinda is holed up inside, having barricaded the doors with furniture. Trying to break down the doors are four members of the Xanathar Guild (CE male human {@creature bandit||bandits}) under the command of a dwarf enforcer named {@creature Noska Ur'gray|wdh} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). A {@creature merrow} also under Noska's command swims beneath the docks. It surfaces to attack when the characters arrive.
如果这些人物来为格林达辩护，诺斯卡就会命令他的打手攻击他们，而他则用他的十字弓向这些人物开炮。两个回合后，又有八个{@creature bandit||bandits}从{@i Kraken's Folly}({@area D1|159})上跃下，加入了战局。这些小流氓每人得到了1个金币的报酬，用来监视诺斯卡的后方。人物可以通过提供更大的贿赂（每个至少5戈比）使他们反对诺斯卡。

If the characters turn the hooligans against Noska or reduce the dwarf to half his hit points or fewer, Noska flees. Any remaining Xanathar Guild members cover his escape. Grinda emerges from her residence to thank the characters once the fight has concluded.

entries.name: Where's the Stone?
entries: Grinda admits that she has done business with the Xanathar Guild in the past. Her orders were to protect the stone until Noska arrived to claim it, but she changed her mind and decided to keep the stone for herself. She now realizes that decision was a mistake.
格琳达告诉角色们，她把石头给了她的熟悉的老鼠，并告诉它把它藏在她家在死亡之城的陵墓里。法师给了角色们前往该地的方向和一把通往陵墓的钥匙。(他们不需要钥匙，因为当他们到达时，陵墓是开放的）。

entries.name: Spy in the Sky
entries: 当人物离开Mistshore时，一个{@creature gazer|VGM}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）开始跟随他们，至少保持60英尺的距离。{@creature Xanathar|WDH}用它来监视人物。被动感知分数在15分以上的角色可以在队伍进入亡灵之城后不久发现凝视者。如果受到攻击，凝视者会自我防御。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 掌握了前往加洛斯陵墓的方向，人物就可以前往亡灵之城了。泉水链在遭遇4，"陵墓 "中继续。

entries.name: Mistshore: Autumn
entries: At the end of their pursuit, the characters corner {@creature Fel'rekt Lafeen|WDH} and {@creature Krebbyg Masq'il'yr|WDH} in Mistshore. The two {@creature drow gunslinger|WDH|drow gunslingers} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) lurk behind the {@i Kraken's Folly} ({@area D1|159}) and wait to be rescued. When the characters confront them, Fel'rekt and Krebbyg stall for time until their escape vehicle arrives. If either drow falls, the other tosses the stone into the harbor to keep it from falling into enemy hands. A character can recover the sunken stone by using a {@spell detect magic} spell to help pinpoint its location.

entries.name: Big Belchy
entries: 一个被称为 "大贝尔奇 "的机械龙龟，几乎在一个世纪前沉没在深水港。为Jarlaxle工作的Lantanese侏儒已经设法修复了这个构造。在角色们把费尔雷特和克雷比格逼到墙角后的两个回合，大贝尔奇在主动权计数5的时候浮出了码头，距离足够近，乌鸦可以在下一个回合跳到它布满藤壶的背部。
在它浮出水面后的那一回合，该装置向码头喷出一团蒸汽，形成一个30英尺的立方体，然后开始以20英尺的游泳速度离开。任何在蒸汽云中的生物都必须做一个DC14的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到22({@dice 4d10})的火焰伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。大贝尔奇只能呼吸一次蒸汽。在此后的每个回合中，它都会向贾拉索的旗舰"{@i Eyecatcher}号 "游去40英尺，后者停泊在1英里外的港口中央。

Big Belchy has AC 18, 75 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. If it is reduced to 0 hit points, it sinks once more to the bottom of Deepwater Harbor. If the drow are still on its back when it goes down, they swim the rest of the way to the {@i Eyecatcher} but gain two levels of {@condition exhaustion} from the cold water and exertion.

If the drow are defeated while on Big Belchy's back, the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} tumbles off the mechanical dragon turtle's shell and drops into Deepwater Harbor. If the water is deep enough, the characters might need to borrow {@creature Grinda Garloth|WDH}'s {@item apparatus of Kwalish} to recover it.

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果角色与{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}相契合，它就会显示出龙库的位置，在海区的一个古老的石制风车下面，以及进入龙库所需的三把钥匙。当人物准备好访问该地点时，继续进行遭遇战10，"转换的风车"。

entries.name: Mistshore: Winter
entries: 角色们前往Mistshore，寻找他们认为拥有{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}的人。在前往目的地的途中，这个人让他的出租汽车在城堡区短暂停留，让他的女性朋友下车。她现在拥有那块石头--角色们可以通过询问那个男人（一个名叫Agorn Fuoco的吟游诗人）来发现这一事实。
阿戈恩给{@creature Manshoon|WDH}留下了如此好的印象，以至于他在组织中的地位迅速提升，但他的生活却充满了失望，否则。他没有取得他所渴望的名声，也没有赚取他认为自己有权获得的财富。他采用了Zhentarim的信条，即权力属于那些值得拥有的人，并将黑网视为一种新的家庭。阿戈恩来到迷雾海岸，看望他真正的家人--他的母亲，她身患重病，生活在极度贫困之中。

entries.name: A Waiting Coach
entries: Waiting at the edge of the neighborhood is the hirecoach that bore Agorn Fuoco through the blizzard to Mistshore. Two {@creature draft horse||draft horses} stamp their hooves impatiently in the snow. The driver, Rowan Evenwood (LG female Chondathan human {@creature commoner}), was paid extra to wait for Agorn to return. He left in a hurry, and she doesn't know how long she is expected to wait, but her patience has limits.

entries.name: A Cold Reception
entries: A blizzard is tearing through Mistshore, turning its rotten tenements into dark, looming shapes behind veils of blowing snow. The water around the docks is frozen solid, and impoverished {@creature commoner||commoners} clad in tattered garments gather around sputtering campfires for warmth. These folk are suspicious of anyone they don't recognize and far from welcoming, even toward those who show them charity. These people would tear the clothes from the characters' backs given half a chance.

entries.name: Ice Escapades
entries: Playing on the ice underneath the docks are three street urchins wearing frayed cloaks and gloves. They dart in and out of view, hurling snowballs at each other and laughing as the blizzard batters the structures above them (see "{@area The Three Urchins|14e|x}").
当孩子们第一次看到这些人物时，他们的兴趣被激起了。孩子们认为自己是个冒险家，他们很快就会崇拜和模仿现实生活中的冒险家。(他们甚至敢于向其中一个人投掷雪球（命中率+0）。孩子们知道阿戈恩-富科是谁，因为他曾经在迷雾海岸生活和演奏音乐。他们提议带领人物去他母亲的住所。

entries.name: Mother and Son
entries: Pick one of the unmarked buildings on map 4.2 to serve as the Fuoco residence. Agorn Fuoco (NE male Turami {@creature bard|VGM}; see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) is inside, trying to smother his bedridden mother, Marta (N female Turami human {@creature commoner} with 1 hit point), with a sack she uses as a pillowcase. With tears born of joy and sadness streaming down his face, Agorn is cutting loose his old family ties and embracing his new family: the Zhentarim. The characters can stop him from committing matricide by pulling him away from his mother before she suffocates.
阿戈恩被他在剧院看到的戏剧和他的女性朋友阿玛斯-塞尔森特所打动，他把戈罗尔之石托付给了她，从而实施了这次行动。他不会心甘情愿地交出她的位置，尽管可以用魔法从他嘴里撬出信息。角色还可以与出租汽车司机罗文-埃文伍德（Rowan Evenwood）交谈，他在将阿戈恩运送到迷雾海岸之前放下了阿戈恩的女性朋友。阿玛斯住在城堡区的一座名为Yellowspire的旧塔中。

entries.name: Zhents in the Wind
entries: As the characters leave the Fuoco residence, with or without Agorn as their prisoner, they are surrounded by nine Zhentarim {@creature thug||thugs}. The thugs fight to the death while Agorn tries to escape. If he gets away, the characters might encounter him again in chapter 8.

当Zhents攻击和Agorn试图逃离时，角色们听到一个孩子的尖叫声从相反方向传来。透过吹来的雪，他们可以看到其中一个顽童{@creature Jenks|WDH}掉进了一片薄薄的冰层，有可能沉到港口的底部。他的两个朋友正试图把他从洞里拉出来，但他太重了。孩子们大约在30英尺以外。在{@creature Jenks|WDH}手臂范围内的人物可以使用一个行动来尝试把男孩从冰冷的水中拉出来，只要成功地进行DC11力量（竞技）检查就可以了。如果在{@creature Jenks|WDH}落入冰层后的1分钟内没有成人来帮助他，他就会沉入水面以下，并开始被冷水淹没。

如果角色们发现自己不敌甄子丹，帮助会以两种形式出现。两个由{@creature Remallia Haventree|WDH}派来的哈珀{@creature spy||spies}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）出现在现场。他们的名字是萨拉扎-洛兰斯（CG男性泰特里亚人）和马维亚-奥克斯兰德（NG女性崇丹人）。如果战斗没有迅速转为对己方有利，{@creature Grinda Garloth|WDH}（见{@area D2|15a}）会出现并使用她的魔法来帮助他们。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 掌握了阿戈恩-富科或他的出租汽车司机提供的信息，这些人物可能会觉得不得不去拜访城堡区的黄泉。继续进行遭遇战7，"老塔"。

entries.name: Encounter 3: Street Chase
entries: For this encounter, use the chase rules and the Urban Chase Complications {@book table|dmg|8|chase complications} in chapter 8 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg}. The chase plays out as a "theater of the mind" experience. Consequently, you don't need a map to run the encounter. The chase occurs outdoors, so be mindful of any weather effects in play.

entries.name: Street Chase: Spring
entries: A {@creature kenku} in cahoots with the Xanathar Guild has the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} and is running through the streets with it. The kenku is 60 feet away from the characters at the start of the chase.
如果在任何时候Kenku是{@condition incapacitated}，另一个{@creature kenku}之前被雨或雾隐藏的Kenku会加入追击，在主动权计数中接下来行动。它突然出现，抢走了石头，并带着它逃走了。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 当角色们快要抓到Kenku时，或者当你想结束追逐时，这个生物会躲进一座旧塔。继续进行遭遇战7，"旧塔"。

entries.name: Street Chase: Summer
entries: 这些人物正在追捕卡萨朗特勋爵的二重身男仆威利福特，他乘坐出租汽车或步行逃离。追逐发生在拥挤的街道上，在激动的观众面前。
如果你没有追踪二重身和角色之间的距离，那么如果威利福特乘坐出租汽车，假设角色在追逐开始时距离他们的猎物有120英尺，如果二重身是步行的，则有60英尺。雇佣马车的主动性修正值为+0，威利福特与它一起移动。雇佣马车上的生物不需要在它的回合中在城市追击并发症表上滚动。

entries.name: Crowded Street
entries: 如果威利福特乘坐出租汽车逃跑，那么在第三轮追捕中，他的逃亡就会受挫，因为一大群人堵住了道路，迫使出租汽车停下来。(如果追捕发生在建国节，那么人群就是节日庆祝活动的一部分）。二重身在下一回合跳出租车，步行穿过人群。
Any creature in the crowd has half cover, and any attack that misses the creature because of the cover hits an innocent {@creature commoner} instead.
如果威利弗特是{@condition incapacitated}，一只乌鸦突然俯冲下来，在主动权计数中扮演下一个角色。它抢走了石头并带着它逃走了。这只乌鸦是一只变了形的（1%），为卡萨朗特女士工作。

entries.name: Street Urchins
entries: The chase ends when three street urchins (see "{@area The Three Urchins|14e|x}"), steal the stone, either by pickpocketing it from the doppelganger or by shooting a toy arrow at the raven and causing it to drop the stone. Once they have the stone, the street urchins quickly lose themselves in the crowd. If Willifort the doppelganger is still around, he tries to slip away, believing he still has the stone. The imp, if present, turns {@condition invisible} and circles above the crowd in a futile attempt to find the stone.

A character can use an action to search the crowded street by making a DC 17 Wisdom (Perception) check. On a successful check, the character spots an iron grate in the street that wasn't closed properly. Lifting it reveals an iron ladder that descends 10 feet to an underground sewer tunnel. Characters who lower themselves into the tunnel can hear the sounds of splashing water and children's voices in the distance and might decide to follow them. (The children are holding hands in the dark and being guided by {@creature Squiddly|WDH}, who has darkvision.)

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果角色跟随街头顽童进入下水道，则继续进行第9个遭遇，"地窖群"。

entries.name: Street Chase: Winter
entries: After leaving the theater, the characters resume their pursuit of the elusive Zhent spy, Vevette Blackwater (CE female Tethyrian human {@creature swashbuckler|VGM}; see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). She leads them on a merry chase through snowy streets until she is finally caught or until the characters give up the chase. She starts 30 feet away from the characters. If forced to make an ability check or saving throw because of a chase complication, she has advantage on the roll. Also, she can use the Dash action during the chase without having to make Constitution checks to avoid {@condition exhaustion}.

entries.name: Where's the Stone?
entries: If she is caught, Vevette surrenders. She's counting on the law to protect her from serious harm, and she knows she has done nothing to warrant arrest. Vevette no longer has the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}, after parting with it back in the theater. She doesn't willingly divulge who has the stone, though the characters can pry the information from her using a {@spell charm person} spell or similar magic.
如果人物回到剧院，{@creature Remallia Haventree|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）向他们招手，并告诉他们，她看到有两个人在他们离开剧院后不久就一起乘坐出租马车离开了。其中一个是名叫阿戈恩-福科的吟游诗人，另一个是哈文特里女士不认识的女人。
雷玛利亚和维维特都知道，阿戈恩经常在危险的码头附近的Mistshore呆着。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 继续进行遭遇战2，"迷雾海岸"。

entries.name: Encounter 4: Mausoleum
entries: The City of the Dead is a public park dotted with mausoleums. The place is closed at night, with two City Guard soldiers ({@creature guard||guards}) stationed at each entry gate. A character can slip over a wall undetected with a successful DC 15 Dexterity (Stealth) check.
黄昏时分，数百名{@item driftglobe||driftglobes}从城市的居民区出发，聚集在死亡之城。他们在这里过夜，然后分散开来，在黎明时分回到醒着的城市--没有人知道原因。

Sir Ambrose Everdawn (LG male human Tethyrian {@creature knight}), an aging servant of Kelemvor (god of the dead), patrols the cemetery from sunset to sunrise, chasing off grave robbers and making sure the dead stay buried. Characters who creep around the cemetery in the dark have a {@chance 30|30 percent chance} of running into him. If that happens, he escorts them out and alerts the City Guard if they refuse to leave.

entries.name: Areas of the Mausoleum
entries: 陵墓中的房间有8英尺高的天花板，有6英尺高的通道和门洞连接它们。
以下地点是地图4.3的关键。

entries.name: M1. Ground Level
entries: 除非遭遇战的内容另有说明，否则通往陵墓的石质双门是锁着的。这个锁可以被一个使用盗贼工具成功地进行DC15灵巧检查的角色撬开，或者可以在成功地进行DC25力量（运动）检查后将门强行打开。
在里面，四个浮夸的大理石棺材之间的地板上刻着一个家族徽章。棺材上刻着被埋葬者的名字，里面只有灰尘和骨头。

entries.name: M2. Underground Crypts
entries: 空的壁灯装饰着墙壁。蜘蛛网和灰尘表明，这里已经很久没有人打理了。小屋里的石棺材里有灰尘和骨头。

entries.name: Mausoleum: Spring
entries: This encounter begins when the characters come to the Garloth mausoleum seeking the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}. The double door to the mausoleum is open when they arrive.

Earlier, {@creature Grinda Garloth|WDH}'s rat familiar arrived to find the mausoleum open and grave robbers inside. They killed the rat, took the stone, and fled along with the skeletal remains of Grinda's ancestors. Characters who search the plundered crypts find neither the rat nor the stone, but they do find a clue left behind by one of the grave robbers (see "Crypt Clue" below). As the characters make their way out, Xanathar Guild members attack them in an attempt to retrieve the stone.

entries.name: Crypt Clue
entries: 搜索地下墓穴的人可以找到一把闪亮的钢钥匙，它躺在地上的灰尘中。其中一个盗墓者在掠夺地下墓穴时掉落了它。

角色们可以把钥匙带到金属奇迹之家、码头区的辉煌盔甲师、锁匠和精细工匠协会的大厅，或者任何当地的锁匠。在这两个地方，都有人能认出这把钥匙是贸易区一个名叫伊拉斯普拉-乌尔玛的矮人锁匠的作品。去Elaspra店里的人可以从她那里得知，她为一个购买了她的优秀锁具的客户制作了一把钥匙。她甚至为他安装了这把锁。伊拉斯普拉不会轻易透露客户的名字和他的居住地。然而，她非常尊重哈珀人；一个属于这个派别的人物，如果能拿出哈珀人的胸针来证明这一点，只要成功地进行DC13魅力（说服力）检查，就能从她那里撬出信息。一个假装是哈珀人的角色可以通过成功的DC16魅力（欺骗）检查来欺骗她。
否则，人物必须用魔法迫使Elaspra释放信息，或者他们必须偷看她的记录，她把这些记录放在一个铁制的保险箱里，可以用{@spell knock}咒语或类似的魔法打开。要撬开保险箱上的密码锁，一个角色必须连续三次成功地进行DC20的灵巧（调查）检查。每次尝试开锁都需要一个行动。
从艾拉斯普拉或她的记录中，角色们得知她把钥匙卖给了一个叫沃尔卡-基布恩斯的人，他的地址是南区的一个旧风车。这把钥匙打开了他的公寓的门，他和另一个叫乌拉斯特-甘恩的人共用这把钥匙。

entries.name: Xanathar Guild Ambush
entries: As the characters leave the mausoleum, they are jumped by four {@creature duergar}, members of the Xanathar Guild, who slipped past the cemetery guards using their invisibility. The leader, Gorath, accosts the characters in Dwarvish, demands the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}, and refuses to believe that they don't have it. If the stone isn't turned over to them promptly, the duergar enlarge themselves and attack. {@creature Xanathar|WDH} watches the battle unfold through the eyes of a gazer (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}), which stays out of the fight and tries to remain unseen.
如果这个遭遇发生在晚上，有百分之零点几的可能，安布罗斯-埃弗道恩听到了骚乱并进行了调查，在两个杜尔加人在战斗中倒下后到达。角色们可以通过成功的DC 15魅力（说服力）检查来说服他他们不是盗墓者。如果他们很有礼貌，安布罗斯会护送他们离开死亡之城，并警告他们不要再闯入。否则，他将试图制服他们并将他们交给城市卫队。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 一旦他们追踪到钥匙的主人，角色们就可以前往南区寻找沃尔卡-基本斯了。春天的链子在第10个遭遇中继续，"改装的风车"。

entries.name: Mausoleum: Summer
entries: The characters travel to the City of the Dead, which is open to the public from dawn until dusk. One well-maintained mausoleum has the name CASSALANTER engraved above its entrance. The outer door is locked when the characters arrive in search of the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}. A successful DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check reveals that it has been opened recently, as evidenced by dirt smears on the door. A character can try to pick the lock using thieves' tools, doing so with a successful DC 15 Dexterity check. A {@spell knock} spell or similar magic also opens the door.

Human footprints crisscross through the dust on the upper level. A search of the underground crypt reveals the bodies of three humans-two males and a female, all dressed in hooded robes. Further inspection reveals that the woman is still breathing ({@condition unconscious} with 0 hit points).

entries.name: Left for Dead
entries: The three cultists were low-ranking members of {@creature Victoro Cassalanter|WDH}'s cult of Asmodeus. They were betrayed by two cult fanatics acting on orders from Lord Cassalanter, who not only wants the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} but also, as a security precaution, intends to eliminate cult members who know too much about it. These three cultists were felled by daggers and {@spell inflict wounds} spells.

The survivor is Vaelle Lurval (LE female Tethyrian human {@creature cultist}), a 30-year-old Waterdavian florist. She was brought into the cult by her boyfriend, Holiver Tornrudder, who lies dead nearby. The other dead cultist is named Kaeth Warloon.
如果她被治愈了，瓦伊尔就会恢复意识。她透露，邪教的狂热分子阿恩-沙隆达和塞菲亚-奈勒德克很可能会把石头带到南区的一个旧风车上，他们在那里举行自己的仪式来崇拜阿斯莫德。瓦埃勒可以提供方向，如果她已经完全痊愈，为了给她被谋杀的爱人报仇，她也可以带领角色去那里。
瓦埃勒认为，邪教狂热分子是自己的行为，而不是根据卡萨兰特大人的命令。除非受到魔法的蛊惑，否则她不会透露卡萨朗特人是邪教的领袖。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 继续进行第10次遭遇战，"改装的风车"。

entries.name: Villain Lairs
entries: 第5章至第8章描述了主要恶棍的巢穴。人物可能出于各种原因想要探索这些巢穴，包括以下原因。

items: 扰乱小人的行动
争取与反派会面（也许是为了达成休战或联盟）。
完成一个派系的特殊任务（见 "加入派系"）。
调查另一个恶棍编造的计划中给他们的一条假线索
如果反派拥有{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}，就偷取它，或者在线索中断时找到它的下落的线索

entries.name: Mausoleum: Winter
entries: {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}已经透露，龙之穹顶就在亡灵之城的布兰达斯家族陵墓下面。这些人物不太可能知道，但布兰达斯家族是一个古老的家族。达古特-纽文伯勋爵因其财富而嫁入该家族，而布兰达斯夫人为他生下了儿子雷纳。这是一个黑暗的讽刺，Neverember把他贪污的黄金的位置委托给他死去的妻子的家人。{@creature Renaer Neverember|wdh}得知真相后会感到惊恐，但不会感到惊讶。
墓地被大雪掩埋，虽然有些游客即使在冬天也会被它的美景所吸引，但暴雪使他们中的大多数人都离开了。摇摇欲坠的陵墓被封得严严实实，入口处上方刻着BRANDATH的名字。大榆树和白桦树围绕着这个结构生长，用它们无叶的枝桠尽可能地庇护它。

entries.name: Guardian Treant
entries: The largest tree growing in front of the entrance is a {@creature treant}. It awakens when one or more creatures approach the entrance and growls, "Only those of Brandath blood are welcome here! Begone!" The treant is particularly surly, it being winter and all.
如果布兰达斯后裔以外的人试图打开陵墓，树人就会使附近的两棵树产生灵性，然后攻击。树人和它的盟友都太大，无法进入陵墓。

角色们可以杀了树人，试图溜过去，或者撤退，直到他们了解更多关于布兰达斯家族的信息。经过一天的调查，并成功通过DC10情报（调查）检查，发现角色认识一个这样的人。{@creature Renaer Neverember|wdh}. 如果他们要求雷纳允许他们进入布兰达斯家族的陵墓，他同意这样做。因为树人可以感觉到雷纳身上有布兰达斯的血统，所以它允许他和那些被他称为朋友的人不受干扰地进入，并顺便对雷纳说："你母亲是个可爱的人。"

entries.name: Glyph of Warding
entries: 一个{@spell glyph of warding}的咒语被施加在通往地下一层的第一个台阶上，被设定为当一个人形生物经过该台阶时触发。除非地板上的灰尘被{@spell gust of wind}的咒语或其他方法清除掉，否则无法发现这个石刻。一旦灰尘被扫除，在楼梯上搜索的人只要成功通过DC15智力（调查）检查就能注意到这个石刻。
如果石刻被触发，它就会在以它为中心的20英尺半径的范围内爆发出魔法火焰。火焰会在角落里蔓延。该区域内的每个生物都必须做出DC 15的灵巧投掷，如果投掷失败会受到22({@dice 5d8})的火焰伤害，如果投掷成功则受到一半的伤害。石刻在被触发后会消失。

entries.name: Uld's Resting Place
entries: 一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语揭示了从地下一层的一个石棺中散发出来的转化的光环。这个墓室里有Uld Brandath的碎骨，他是一个Waterdavian魔法师，几十年前死于一场意外。 (一个石像鬼从政府大楼的角落里折断，掉在Uld身上，把他压死了。) 守护他遗体的是六只{@creature crawling claw||crawling claws}由被乌尔德判处死刑的杀人犯的手制成的。当盖子被抬起或推到一边时，这些不死的手就会弹出来并攻击。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Lying amid the bones is Uld's {@item headband of intellect}, which the characters can retrieve once the crawling claws are dealt with.

entries.name: Path to the Vault
entries: 地下一层的东端坍塌的地方实际上是一个幻象，它掩盖了一条完整的、10英尺宽的通道，并向下倾斜。人物可以直接穿过这个没有实质内容的幻象，一个{@spell dispel magic}的法术就能摧毁它。通道向下蜿蜒了几百英尺，逐渐变宽到20英尺，在那里它的终点是通往龙之谷的大门。

entries.name: Encounter 5: Rooftop Chase
entries: 这个奇遇使用了{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg}第8章中的追击规则。它还使用了屋顶追击并发症表，该表仅适用于步行穿越屋顶的生物。飞行生物不需要在该表上滚动。

entries.caption: Rooftop Chase Complications
rows: You come to a 10-foot-wide gap between rooftops. You can jump over the gap if your Strength is 10 or higher (each foot you clear costs 1 foot of movement), and you must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or fall {@condition prone} on the far rooftop. Or you can cross the gap using a 10-foot-long rope line that stretches between the two rooftops

You come to a rooftop that's 10 feet higher than the one you're on. Make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check. On a failed check, the height change counts as 10 feet of {@quickref difficult terrain||3}.

You come to a rooftop that's 10 feet lower than the one you're on. Make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check to jump down safely. On a failed check, you take damage from the fall and land {@condition prone}.
A roof is slippery. Make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, you fall {@condition prone}.

You step on a rotten section of roof, and it collapses underneath you. Make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, you fall partway into the hole in the roof and become stuck. While stuck, you are {@condition prone} and {@condition restrained}. You can use an action on your turn to make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check, ending the effect on a success.
Roof shingles or tiles give way as you step on them. Make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, you fall {@condition prone} and slide 10 feet back.

A rooftop protuberance such as a chimney or weather vane gets in your way. Make a DC 10 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check. On a failed check, the obstacle counts as 5 feet of {@quickref difficult terrain||3}.

You startle a flock of birds nesting on the rooftop, and they flutter all around you. Make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the birds count as 10 feet of {@quickref difficult terrain||3}.
你触发了一个放置在屋顶上的{@spell glyph of warding}咒语，以阻止盗贼。做一个DC13的智慧救赎动作。如果救赎失败，你会被一个{@spell Tasha's hideous laughter}的法术攻击，效果持续1分钟。

Someone on the ground throws a rock, a snowball, or a similar projectile at you. Make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the attack deals no damage but distracts you and counts as 5 feet of {@quickref difficult terrain||3}.

entries.name: Rooftop Chase: Summer
entries: The characters are trying to catch up with three {@creature spined devil||spined devils} that keep low above the rooftops, so as not to be seen by Waterdeep's Griffon Cavalry. The devils are 100 feet away from the characters at the start of the chase.
如果携带{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}的魔鬼变成{@condition incapacitated}，另一个魔鬼会抢走石头并带着它逃走。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 当人物接近拿到石头时，或者当你想结束追逐时，所有剩下的带刺魔鬼都会躲进一条小巷。如果人物失去了他们的猎物，他们可以询问地面上看到魔鬼去向的城市居民。继续遭遇1，"小巷"。

entries.name: Rooftop Chase: Autumn
entries: The characters are chasing two {@creature drow gunslinger|WDH|drow gunslingers} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) across windy rooftops in the Dock Ward. The drow stick together as they run, but each one acts on his own initiative count.

{@creature Fel'rekt Lafeen|WDH}和{@creature Krebbyg Masq'il'yr|WDH}开始时比他们的追兵领先40英尺。他们什么也不做，只是在他们的回合中移动，试图在他们和角色之间拉开尽可能多的距离。Fel'rekt在追击开始时拥有{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}，但只要两个乌鸦在10英尺范围内，一个乌鸦枪手可以将石头传给另一个作为反应。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 乌鸦一直在屋顶上奔跑，直到他们到达被称为Mistshore的破旧码头区。继续追赶的角色可以一直跟着他们到那里。如果所有的角色都失去了他们的猎物，他们可以询问地面上的城市居民，他们看到乌鸦朝迷雾海岸走去。无论哪种情况，都要继续进行遭遇战2，"迷雾海岸"。

entries.name: Rooftop Chase: Winter
entries: A Zhent named Vevette Blackwater (CE female Tethyrian human {@creature swashbuckler|VGM}; see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) has snatched the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} and is fleeing as fast as she can across icy rooftops during a blizzard. Characters who intend to pursue her are 60 feet away from their quarry at the start of the chase and must also take to the rooftops or lose sight of her.
薇薇特在加入真塔林之前是个邪恶的海盗，后来升为{@creature Manshoon|WDH}受宠的副官之一。面对危险，她疯狂地笑着，喜欢追逐的乐趣。她对沃特迪普的街道、小巷和屋顶非常熟悉。如果因为追逐的复杂情况而被迫进行能力检查或蓄力投掷，她在投掷时有优势。另外，她可以在追逐过程中采取冲刺行动，而不需要进行体质检查来避免（1%）。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 追逐的时间不超过5个回合，之后维维特就会掉到地上，躲进一个剧院。失去她踪迹的角色可以向她沿途的人求助，帮助他们摆脱困境。继续进行遭遇战6，"剧院"。

entries.name: Encounter 6: Theater
entries: 无论剧院是开业还是停业，它都有以下特点。

items: 房间的天花板是10英尺高，除了{@area P5|196}，它有一个20英尺高的椽子天花板。连接各房间的是8英尺高的通道和7英尺高的门洞。
剧院由灯笼照明，灯笼上有{@spell continual flame}的法术。在剧院内说一个命令词会使剧院和后台的灯光变暗；在剧院内说另一个命令词会使它们恢复全亮。所有的舞台管理员都知道这些命令词。

entries.name: Areas of the Theater
entries: 以下地点是地图4.4的关键。

entries.name: P1. Lobby
entries: 这个毛绒绒的大厅用红地毯和华丽的墙纸进行装饰。这里陈列着几个身着奇装异服的木制模特，每个模特都代表着一个著名戏剧中的人物。

entries.name: P2. Ticket Booths
entries: 每个摊位的西门都是锁着的。锁可以被一个使用小偷工具的角色在DC15的灵巧检查中成功撬开，或者可以在DC13的力量（运动）检查中成功将门打开。售票员和舞台管理员有这些门的钥匙。
A stack of torn tickets sits on a shelf beneath a counter inside the booth. Prior to a show, each booth holds a ticket seller ({@creature commoner}). Admission to the theater is 1 sp per person.

entries.name: P3. Ticket Offices
entries: A desk near the far wall in each of these rooms contains notebooks, {@item paper (one sheet)|PHB|papers}, and a lockbox.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 房屋管理员持有每个锁箱的钥匙。锁可以被使用小偷工具的人成功地进行DC12灵巧检查来撬开，或者锁箱可以被成功地进行DC15力量（运动）检查来强行打开。在表演期间，每个锁箱都有{@dice 10d10}sp。

entries.name: P4. Auditorium
entries: 该礼堂有以下特点。

items: 有坐垫的座位分七层排列，面对一个5英尺高的木制舞台。每行有20个座位。
在一块凸起的红色幕布后面，是为当前制作的绘画背景和舞台道具。

entries: During a performance, a stage manager ({@creature commoner}) watches from the back of the seating area.

entries.name: P5. Wing
entries: 这个舞台外的小区域被涂成黑色，有一张桌子，上面放着假匕首、剑和其他道具。道具武器可以在战斗中使用，但击中后只能造成1次破坏性伤害。

entries.name: P6. Stage Manager's Office
entries: 这个房间里有一张写满文件的桌子。舞台经理({@creature commoner})在演出间隙呆在这里。

entries.name: P7. Green Room
entries: 三张不匹配的沙发和一块污渍斑斑的米色地毯是这个房间的主要特征，其墙壁上涂有浅绿色油漆。当演员不在舞台上或在更衣室时，他们就在这里聚集。

entries.name: P8. Dressing Rooms
entries: 这个房间里有衣架、排满化妆品的桌子和长长的壁镜。在演出期间或紧接着演出之前，每个更衣室都有{@dice 1d3}的演员({@creature commoner||commoners})。

entries.name: Theater: Spring
entries: The name of the Pink Flumph theater is displayed on a sign mounted to the building's facade. Posters on the outside walls advertise the latest shows, {@i Meet the Goodberrys} and {@i Kiss of the Lamia}. The former is a comical glimpse into the travails of a large halfling family engaged in illicit criminal activity. The latter is a tragic play about an evil Mulhorandi prince who is banished to a desert, {@condition charmed} by a lamia, and sent back with powerful magic items to conquer his homeland in her name.

凌晨时分，后台区域热闹非凡，半身人演员们正在穿戴服装、假发和化妆，为下午的演出做准备。随着演出的结束，晚上的悲剧性演出的演员和乐师也来到了现场。扮演邪恶王子的演员是一位名叫亚利克-伊尔蒂兹玛（N female Rashemi {@creature bard|VGM}; see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）的女士，她也是哈珀斯的成员。她密切关注在后台打探消息的人物，然后在第一时间与{@creature Remallia Haventree|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）分享任何有趣的启示。如果雷玛利亚知道了龙库的位置，她会把这个信息传达给{@creature Mirt|WDH}，让水底城的领主们知道。

entries.name: Theater Owner
entries: 粉红庆典的主人伊奥卡斯特-达利安诺（N female Tethyrian {@creature commoner}）是一个自私的中年寡妇，对戏剧没有什么好感。粉红庆典 "是她丈夫的激情所在；对伊奥卡斯特来说，这完全是一种手段，通过它她可以与城市的精英们擦肩而过。她要求导演们选择剧本和雇用演员，而她则把时间花在 "工作 "上，迎接重要的客人，向他们承诺提供最好的娱乐。她对待她的演员和工作人员就像对待半个被遗忘的孩子一样，她拒绝那些来剧院寻求龙之谷的人物，除非其中有她的好处。吸引她的贪婪是适得其反的，因为伊奥卡斯特想把所有的财宝据为己有。

entries.name: Path to the Vault
entries: 其中一间更衣室（{@area P8|199}）的地板上有一个无人知晓的秘密活板门。只要成功地进行DC20智慧（感知）检查，就能发现它。这扇石门上有一个{@spell arcane lock}的咒语，只要成功进行DC30力量（运动）检查就可以拉开。一个{@spell knock}的咒语或类似的魔法也能做到这一点。
活板门下面是一个30英尺深的竖井，里面有一个木梯子。从梯子上下来的人发现自己在一条20英尺宽的石道的一端，石道逐渐向下倾斜100英尺，最后到达龙库的入口。

entries.name: Wishes the Faerie Dragon
entries: Iokaste's late husband, Algondar Daliano, had a violet {@creature faerie dragon (violet)||faerie dragon} companion named Wishes. The faerie dragon detests Iokaste but remains on the payroll, begrudgingly using its magic to enhance performances for the sake of preserving Algondar's legacy. It prefers to remain {@condition invisible} and unseen otherwise. Iokaste refers to it derisively as "the flying serpent."

If the characters threaten it or endanger the theater, Wishes uses its magic to confound and neutralize them. As they make their way to the Vault of Dragons, it follows them invisibly. Once it learns about the gold in the vault, the faerie dragon casts {@spell mirror image} on itself, turns visible, and addresses the characters telepathically. It demands a share of the hoard (at least 5,000 gp), threatens to tip off the City Watch if the characters refuse, and makes good on its threat if the characters don't share the wealth. The faerie dragon doesn't have a hoard of its own, since it gives its earnings to unfortunate Waterdavians by invisibly flying around the city at night and leaving coins on doorsteps, window sills, nightstands, and pillows.

entries.name: Theater: Autumn
entries: At the end of their previous encounter, the characters are no closer to finding the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}. Jarlaxle is waiting for them at the Seven Masks Theater in the Dock Ward. The theater caters to a lower-class clientele, and ship captains and sailors are admitted for free. The owner of the theater is a burly and jovial Shou man with a braided goatee named Rongquan Mystere-another of Jarlaxle's many disguises. When Jarlaxle is away, he entrusts his stage managers to look after things.

entries.name: Sapphiria's Booty
entries: 当人物刚到时，除了通往后台的门外，所有的门都锁着。从后面溜进来的人物看到演员和舞台工作人员在忙忙碌碌，导演在和剧作家争论，而舞台经理则无奈地看着。在舞台上，演员们走过他们的场景，对着大部分空荡荡的剧院读他们的台词。在前排抽着烟斗观看排练的是{@creature Jarlaxle Baenre|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}），伪装成荣泉。隐藏在不同位置的阴影中，有四个{@creature drow elite warrior||drow elite warriors}准备在贾拉索的身边作战。

The play, {@i Sapphiria's Booty}, is a romantic comedy about a blue-haired madam named Sapphiria who runs a thieves' guild out of a festhall. When a charming sea captain arrives with a hold full of booty from a faraway land, Sapphiria decides to steal it. Zaniness ensues when she falls in love with the first mate, who is half her age, while the captain falls in love with her. On one side of the stage is a backdrop resembling the deck of a ship; the other side is decorated to look like a madam's parlor in a brothel, complete with a gaudy chandelier and a fainting couch.

Westra Moltimmur (CG female Illuskan human {@creature commoner} with Insight +2 and Performance +6), the play's leading lady, is one of Waterdeep's great treasures, and the cast and crew are very protective of her. Now in her seventies and having been married no fewer than seven times, she has a brisk sense of humor and a zest for life. She's also insightful enough to know that "Rongquan Mystere" isn't what he appears to be. She has seen the dark elves who watch over Rongquan and observed him using subtle hand gestures (Drow Sign Language) to communicate with them.

entries.name: Speaking with Rongquan
entries: Jarlaxle has instructed the stage managers to bring all visitors to him. In the guise of Rongquan, he claims to be a member of the Lords' Alliance who answers directly to {@creature Laeral Silverhand|WDH}. He also seems to know all about the characters' meeting with Laeral (see encounter 1, "Alley") and says he can speak on her behalf. He asks about the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} and is disappointed if the characters don't have it. If they offer up the fake stone recovered in encounter 9, "Cellar Complex," Rongquan immediately realizes it's a fake.
如果人物不确定下一步该做什么，贾拉索就会传授以下信息。
"我的朋友们，不要灰心。风向正朝着我们的方向吹来! 我了解到，费纳鲁斯-斯托姆卡斯尔因偷窃被城市守望者逮捕，并被带到城堡区的法院，接受魔法师的审判。毫无疑问，他在被捕前把石头藏了起来。你必须马上和他谈谈。你需要设计一些诡计来接近费纳罗斯。我劝你不要使用暴力，否则你可能会发现自己被关在他身边。"
如果角色们问为什么{@creature Laeral Silverhand|WDH}不亲自审问费内鲁斯或者把他从监狱里保释出来，贾拉索笑着说，如果让人看到开放领主与一个对城市犯下滔天罪行的人谈判，这在政治上是不明智的。
Jarlaxle可以亲自和Fenerus谈话，但他不确定法院是否对魔法有防护措施。他不能冒这个风险，所以他派人代替。如果这些人物拒绝为荣泉工作，他就耸耸宽厚的肩膀，让他们不受干扰地离开，认为他们无论如何都会试图与费纳鲁斯交谈。
如果角色攻击他，贾拉索微笑着吹口哨给他的乌鸦保镖，并向他们开枪。如果角色在战斗中倒下，贾拉索和他的卫兵会先稳定濒临死亡的党员，然后把他们全部拖到一条雪巷，把他们和他们的装备留在那里。在乌鸦离开后，一阵寒风吹过小巷，唤醒了{@condition unconscious}的角色。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果人物决定与费纳鲁斯交谈，就继续进行遭遇战8，"法院"。

entries.name: Theater: Winter
entries: 当这场遭遇战开始时，角色们跟随一个逃离的赞特游侠进入贸易区的一家名为Brizzenbright的剧院。这家剧院是以它死去的主人马尔科姆-布里森布莱特（Malkolm Brizzenbright）的名字命名的，近年来一直在挣扎。为了生存，它在冬天保持开放，但每年这个时候剧院都会变得非常寒冷。

entries.name: Brizzenbright's Ghost
entries: 马尔科姆-布里岑布莱特，一个{@creature ghost}，在大厅里迎接所有访客({@area P1|191})。他身着西装，头发蓬乱，大部分时间都漂浮在人们的视线中，挥舞着双手做着问候和致意的手势。当地人已经习惯了他的幽灵般的身影和他的介绍。"绅士们，美丽的女士们，请不要因为我是你们友好的主人，而使你们的面容变得憔悴。今天，我们为你们创造了什么美好的艺术？买了票就看吧! 你们不会失望的！"
鬼魂可以进行轻松的交谈。它被束缚在剧院里，因为马尔科姆-布里岑布莱特的灵魂无法忍受离开这个地方。如果剧院关闭了，鬼魂仍会在那里出没，也许随着时间的推移会变得更加疯狂。只有把剧院夷为平地或烧掉才能迫使他的灵魂永远离开。

entries.name: Snakes in the House
entries: 在经历了一场惊心动魄的屋顶追逐战后，维维特-黑水（CE女性特提亚人{@creature swashbuckler|VGM}；见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）买了一张票，在{@i Blood Wedding}--一出关于爱、嫉妒和死亡的戏剧演出期间溜进了剧院。在这个故事中，一个年轻女子被一个伯爵带到了一个城堡，却爱上了他的弟弟，一个有信仰的人。她的背叛吞噬了嫉妒心强的伯爵。他在婚礼当天谋杀了他的弟弟，并追捕新娘，新娘在绝望中从城堡的城垛上跳了下去。伯爵被众神诅咒，变成了一个黑暗的生物，被诅咒住在他的城堡里，以血为食。一位女大提琴手和两位男小提琴手提供音乐伴奏。

The shivering audience includes thirty {@creature commoner||commoners}. Also present is a Zhentarim spy named Agorn Fuoco (NE male Turami {@creature bard|VGM}; see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) and his companion, Amath Sercent (LE female Mulan {@creature priest} of Bane). Agorn is swept up in the drama and fighting back tears while Amath pats his arm gently. Vevette takes a seat behind them and surreptitiously passes the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} to Agorn. Looking on from the back row is {@creature Remallia Haventree|WDH} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}), a member of the Harpers who suspects Agorn of being a high-ranking Zhent. She has been watching him for a while now, hoping to identify other Zhentarim leaders in Waterdeep. Although Remallia appears to be alone, the two violinists (LG male Illuskan human {@creature spy||spies} with Performance +5) are Harpers under her command. Agorn and Amath are unaware that they're under surveillance.

entries.name: Enter the Heroes
entries: 角色们在进入主剧院之前都要买票。如果他们不买，剧院经理就会追赶他们，威胁要召集城市守望者。
一个成功通过DC14智慧（感知）检查的角色在黑暗的剧院里发现了薇薇特。当这种情况发生时，薇薇特从她的椅子上跳起来，从最近的门逃了出去，打算带领角色们进行另一次欢乐的追逐。雷玛利亚和她的伙伴们饶有兴趣地看着，但除非他们的生命或无辜者的生命受到威胁，否则不会介入。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果这些人物上钩了，就继续进行遭遇战3，"街头追逐"。一旦维维特的追兵离开了视线，阿戈恩-福科和阿玛斯-塞尔森特就会利用这个分心的机会溜走，从大门外走出来，给一辆出租汽车打上旗语。

entries.name: Encounter 7: Old Tower
entries: 人物在几百年前由某个半被遗忘的Waterdavian法师建造的破旧的塔中面对敌人。它有以下特点。

items: 除了通往{@area O5|1b2}的门外，所有的门都没有上锁。
这些房间有15英尺高的天花板，有7英尺高的门洞连接它们。
The tower is brightly lit by {@spell continual flame} spells cast on wall sconces.

entries.name: Areas of the Old Tower
entries: 以下地点是地图4.5的关键。

entries.name: O1. Vestibule
entries: 外门有一个小小的窥视孔，里面有一个关闭的铁百叶窗。腐烂的挂毯装饰着墙壁，地板上积满了泥土和污垢。

entries.name: O2. Ground Level
entries: 石制的螺旋形楼梯弯弯曲曲地进入塔楼，然后向下进入地窖。镶嵌在西墙上的是一个被煤烟熏黑的壁炉。壁炉附近躺着一个曾经是软垫皮椅的焚烧堆。

entries.name: O3. Upper Level
entries: 这个房间以前是一个巫师的实验室，包含以下特点。

items: 一个沾满煤灰的壁炉的炉膛里有一个挂在铁钩上的无盖铁锅，壁炉上方的墙上有一幅巫师的画像。
地板上到处都是破碎的玻璃碎片、燃烧的纸屑、扭曲的金属片和鸟粪。
其他家具包括一把摇椅、一张花架桌和一个烧焦的书架残骸，都笼罩在厚厚的蜘蛛网中。
墙壁上有箭缝，鸽子在椽子上筑巢。

entries.name: Arrow Slits
entries: 每条箭缝有4英尺高，1英尺宽--足以让一个小型角色或一个瘦小的中型角色挤过去。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 对房间进行彻底的搜索会得到一个随机的宝物，通过滚动{@dice d4}和查阅旧塔的宝物表来决定。

entries.caption: Old Tower Treasure Table
rows: 一个被烧焦的{@item wand of magic missiles}(每消耗一次电荷，就有{@chance 50|50 percent}的机会，什么也没发生，电荷被浪费了)
一个{@item potion of healing}与一个{@item potion of flying}的混合体（如果这个混合体被浸泡了，请在《地下城主指南》第7章的{@table Variant: Mixing Potions; Potion Miscibility||Potion Miscibility}表上滚动以确定效果）。
裂缝{@item driftglobe}，发出闪烁的光，但其他功能正常
A burned scroll tube containing two blank sheets of paper that are actually {@item paper bird|wdh|paper birds} (see appendix A)

entries.name: O4. Cellar
entries: 这个房间包含以下特点。

items: 一张圆形的小木桌周围有四个用空桶做的凳子。一副有标记的扑克牌散落在桌子上面，地上躺着几张杂牌。
靠南墙堆放着三个箱子。每个箱子里都有20天的可食用口粮。
镶嵌在北墙上的是一扇结实的橡木门，上面有铁制的配件和一个内置的锁。

entries.name: Locked Door
entries: The door to {@area O5|1b2} is locked. The lock can be picked by a character who uses thieves' tools and makes a successful DC 20 Dexterity check. The door can also be forced open with a successful DC 25 Strength (Athletics) check.

entries.name: O5. Teleportation Circle
entries: 奥术符文被刻在这个原本空荡荡的房间地板上的一个圆圈里。这个圆圈是一个永久的传送圈（见{@book Player's Handbook|phb}中的{@spell teleportation circle}法术说明）。

entries.name: Old Tower: Spring
entries: 队伍中难以捉摸的猎物，一个{@creature kenku}，已经在一座古老的塔里避难了。当人物到达塔的入口时，肯库已经挟持了一名人质并逃到了上层。

entries.name: Street Urchins
entries: Just prior to the kenku's arrival, three children entered the derelict tower on a dare. If this encounter occurs on or around Trolltide, the children are wearing troll masks. These noncombatants are named {@creature Nat|WDH}, {@creature Jenks|WDH}, and {@creature Squiddly|WDH} (see "{@area The Three Urchins|14e|x}").
kenku绑架了{@creature Squiddly|WDH}并把他带到了楼上({@area O3|1ac})。人物在{@area O2|1ab}遇到了{@creature Nat|WDH}和{@creature Jenks|WDH}；他们恳求人物救出他们的年轻铁皮人朋友。

entries.name: Confronting the Kenku
entries: The kenku clutches the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} in one clawed hand and {@creature Squiddly|WDH} the tiefling in the other. When cornered, the creature mimics the sound of a screaming child-its way of threatening to harm the boy unless the characters leave at once. The kenku doesn't respond to verbal threats or attempts at persuasion, but it can be bribed with coin, gemstones, or shiny baubles. It gives up both the stone and the boy in return for 100 gp worth of treasure.
如果角色和Kenku陷入僵局，{@creature Squiddly|WDH}踢Kenku的小腿，使其释放他，并躲在一些旧家具下。当kenku拔出它的剑时，这个行为就启动了战斗。
If he has a clear path to the stairs, {@creature Squiddly|WDH} runs down them and rejoins his friends. The three children flee the tower together, disappearing into a nearby alley.

entries.name: Gazer Attack
entries: When the characters finally obtain the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}, three {@creature gazer|VGM|gazers} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) enter {@area O3|1ac} through the arrow slits and attack. They try to incapacitate whichever character has the stone and use their telekinetic rays to steal it. If successful, the gazers take the stone to a nearby alley.

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 无论{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}离开塔楼的是人物还是凝视者，都要继续进行遭遇1，"小巷"。

entries.name: Old Tower: Summer
entries: The old tower, formerly owned by a wizard, was recently bought by Esvele Rosznar, a young noblewoman with a fascinating alter ego (see "The {@creature Black Viper|WDH}" in appendix B).

entries.name: House Rosznar Guards
entries: 艾斯维勒带了四个{@creature guard||guards}的人到塔楼。他们穿着Rosznar家族的制服，在{@area O1|1aa}里站岗。

entries.name: Bought and Paid For
entries: 通过她的间谍网络，Esvele了解到Neverember勋爵与塔的前主人的友谊。此后不久，她发现了塔下的龙之谷的入口。不幸的是，她不知道进入它需要什么钥匙，也不知道里面有什么。当人物到达时，Esvele正在{@area O2|1ab}，与以下三个公会的代表会面（{@creature commoner||commoners}）。

items: 森布拉-瓦希尔（LN卡利希特族女性人类），木匠、屋顶工和装饰工公会的人。
帕恩特-奥姆特罗尔（CG女岩精），酒窖和管道工公会的人
贾博肯-霜髯（LG男盾牌矮人），石匠、泥瓦匠、陶匠和瓦匠公会的人

entries: 这次会议是一种形式。作为新的业主，法律要求Esvele使建筑符合规范。她正在收集相关行会的成本估算，但不打算继续进行维修。这些人物的到来为她提供了一个受欢迎的分心。
角色们很难说服Esvele他们是为了闯入龙之谷以外的任何原因而来。Esvele愿意把他们作为商业伙伴，允许他们进入金库（最好是在周围没有公会代表的时候），以换取金库中可能包含的任何财宝的平等份额。她和这些人物彼此之间都有好处。她不能让他们以盗窃罪被捕，而不被当局发现金库并扣押塔。他们也不能拒绝贵族妇女的要求，以免她向当局透露金库的位置以换取赏金。
Esvele提出要帮助人物获得打开龙库的钥匙，并坚持在他们第一次进入龙库时陪伴他们，同时声称她有能力照顾自己。无论如何，她试图尽可能长时间地向人物隐瞒她的秘密身份。
Esvele doesn't use a key to lock and unlock the door to {@area O5|1b2}. She uses thieves' tools instead.

entries.name: Path to the Vault
entries: 金库的入口隐藏在{@area O5|1b2}北墙的一扇暗门后面。这道密门是由熟练的矮人工程师制作的，需要成功地进行DC20智慧（感知）检查才能找到。埃斯维尔已经解除了门上的魔法陷阱，使其可以安全打开。门外是一个布满灰尘的楼梯，下行90英尺到一个20英尺宽的走廊。走廊又延伸了90英尺到金库门。在金库门的一侧，墙壁上的一个天然裂缝曾经是格力克的巢穴，但埃斯维尔杀死了格力克，并将其尸体留在地上。

entries.name: Old Tower: Autumn
entries: The characters come to this crumbling tower in the Dock Ward looking for the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}. Members of Bregan D'aerthe follow them invisibly. Superstitious locals think the tower is haunted, so they avoid it.

entries.name: Antimagic Field
entries: The interior of the tower is subject to a permanent {@spell antimagic field} spell. Consequently, no magic functions inside the tower. This effect was left behind by the tower's previous occupant, a wizard hermit who dabbled in "wild magic" and could no longer control it. Because of the antimagic field, the magic lights that normally illuminate the tower have been suppressed. Only a {@spell wish} spell or similar magic can end this antimagic effect.

entries.name: Tower Swords
entries: 在整个塔楼的地板上散落着六把长剑，上面没有生锈或流血的痕迹。这些剑被反魔法场{@creature flying sword||flying swords}变成了惰性的。如果从塔中取出一把飞剑，它就会活过来并进行攻击。

entries.name: Where's the Stone?
entries: 费纳鲁斯把{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}藏在挂在上层壁炉里的大锅里({@area O3|1ac})。但它已经不在那里了。

在人物到达{@area O3|1ac}之前，三个{@creature drow gunslinger|WDH|drow gunslingers}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）在{@item potion of invisibility||potions of invisibility}的作用下，使用他们的{@spell levitate}法术爬到塔的外面，从箭缝中爬过去。当他们在塔内时，他们的{@spell invisibility}法术被反魔法领域所否定。其中一个乌鸦人很快找到了石头，并在人物出现之前拿走了它。

Unless they were defeated earlier in the adventure, these drow are Jarlaxle's lieutenants: {@creature Fel'rekt Lafeen|WDH}, {@creature Krebbyg Masq'il'yr|WDH}, and {@creature Soluun Xibrindas|wdh}. Replace any that were killed earlier in the adventure with other drow gunslingers, and roll initiative for each drow. Soluun (or his replacement) can't resist a good fight and attacks the characters, buying time for the other drow to escape. Once they're outside the tower, the fleeing drow become {@condition invisible} again as they leap onto a nearby rooftop, but the potions wear off at the end of their next turns, enabling characters to chase after them.

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果角色们追赶逃跑的乌鸦，就进行遭遇战5，"屋顶追逐"。

entries.name: Old Tower: Winter
entries: 人物得知{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}与Amath Sercent在一起，她是Bane的牧师，与{@creature Manshoon|WDH}结盟。她和她的信徒们居住在Yellowspire，这是一座城堡区的塔楼，因其砖块呈现出淡淡的黄色而得名。阿玛斯正在将这座塔改造成贝恩的神庙。地下室有一个传送圈，可以迅速往返于科拉特塔和{@creature Manshoon|WDH}的维度外圣地。

entries.name: House of Tyranny
entries: Amath Sercent (LE female Mulan {@creature priest}) and her four followers (LE male and female {@creature acolyte||acolytes} of mixed ethnicities) dress in common clothing when outside the tower. Inside the structure, they wear fur-lined robes to stay warm. They refer to the tower as the House of Tyranny, and black prints of their right hands, with fingers and thumb held together, cover every interior surface. These handprints mimic the symbol of Bane.

Amath and her followers assemble here for worship but sleep elsewhere. When the characters first arrive, all five have gathered in prayer on the upper floor of the tower ({@area O3|1ac}). Three black {@creature flying snake||flying snakes} nest in the rafters and join any battle here. During this ceremony, Amath and her acolytes hold candles and form a circle around a gagged and blindfolded broadsheet publisher named Shan Chien (N male Shou human {@creature commoner}). The imperious, middle-aged man is shackled to the floor, and Amath carries the key to the shackles. The shackles can be broken by a creature that uses an action to make a successful DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check. Picking the shackles' lock requires thieves' tools and a successful DC 15 Dexterity check.
班尼特人的仪式是为了打破珊的意志，使他屈从于贝恩。阿玛斯一直在使用这种仪式来 "转化 "大报出版商，作为控制城市信息流的更大阴谋的一部分--这是（%%）接管的关键因素。前一天晚上，山被阿玛斯的信徒绑架了，当时他正走在去往贸易区的路上。他出版了{@i The Targe}，这是一份大报，对包括政治在内的各种当地话题进行尖锐的抨击。
阿玛斯把{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}放在她的口袋里。她正期待着（1%）或他的模拟人很快到来并取回它。

entries.name: Outer Scaffolding
entries: 这座塔被覆盖着冰雪的木制脚手架所包围着。尽管它看起来很危险，但脚手架是安全的，可以在上面行走，使生物能够在塔的外面攀爬而不必进行能力检查。然而，脚手架会发出嘎吱嘎吱的响声，任何在上面移动的生物都必须在DC16的灵巧（隐身）检查中取得成功，否则会被塔内的人听到。

entries.name: Simulacrum
entries: The characters must fight Amath and her acolytes to get the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}. When they finally obtain it, fate deals them an unkind hand as {@creature Manshoon|WDH}'s simulacrum (see "{@creature Manshoon|WDH}" in appendix B) arrives by way of the teleportation circle in {@area O5|1b2}. If the characters had the opportunity and the foresight to destroy the circle prior to obtaining the stone, the simulacrum instead must travel to Yellowspire on foot, giving the characters ample time to get away before it arrives as long as they leave within 1 hour after obtaining the stone. The simulacrum tirelessly pursues the stone, and characters who flee would do themselves well not to leave tracks in the snow.

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果一个角色与{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}相契合，它就会显示出龙库的位置，在亡灵之城的布兰达斯家族陵墓下，以及进入龙库所需的三把钥匙。当角色们准备好参观陵墓时，继续进行遭遇战4，"陵墓"。

entries.name: Encounter 8: Courthouse
entries: 被城市监察局逮捕的人被带到法院，并被拘留，直到地方法官对他们作出判决。每个法院都有以下特点。

items: Two {@creature guard||guards} stand outside each of the front and back doors (leading to areas H1 and H6) at all hours.
房间有10英尺高的天花板，有8英尺高的通道和7英尺高的门洞连接。
窗户上装有铁条，需要成功通过DC30力量（竞技）检查才能弯曲。
门是由铁制的橡木制成，没有上锁。
所有的区域都被墙上的壁灯所施展的{@spell continual flame}法术照得很亮。
Cisterns on the roof collect rainwater, which is funneled by pipes down to the showers ({@area H7|1cf}).

entries.name: Areas of the Courthouse
entries: 以下地点是地图4.6的关键。

entries.name: H1. Upstairs Waiting Room
entries: 这个房间有以下特点。

items: Two {@creature guard||guards} stand outside the doors to the records rooms ({@area H2|1ca}) at all hours. Behind a desk sits a court clerk ({@creature commoner}). Uncomfortable wood benches line the walls. A copper plaque mounted above each bench says, in Common, "Please have a seat. Someone will be with you shortly."
两个特权位于入口处的一个角落里。

entries.name: Clerk
entries: The clerk asks visitors what their business is and either directs them to the appropriate area of the courthouse or instructs them to wait. The clerk holds a key to the records rooms ({@area H2|1ca}).

entries.name: H2. Records Rooms
entries: 这些房间的门是锁着的。在里面，每一英寸的墙面上都有架子，上面放着一箱箱按月和年标明日期的文件。这些文件是法庭诉讼和取证的记录。

entries.name: H3. Clerks' Office
entries: 房间中间有两张挤在一起的桌子，上面放着羽毛笔、墨水和纸片。两名法庭书记员（{@creature commoner||commoners}）在这里工作，支持当值的法官。每个书记员都有一把通往记录室的钥匙（{@area H2|1ca}）。

entries.name: H4. Magister's Office
entries: 这间宏伟的办公室里有几把毛绒绒的扶手椅和一张胡桃木大桌子。木质地板上印有沃特德普的印记。
When not overseeing a trial, a magister on duty at the courthouse reviews cases and holds meetings here. If a magister is here, so is a {@creature knight} who serves as a bodyguard.

entries.name: H5. Courtroom
entries: 这个房间有以下特点。

items: 有两个{@creature guard||guards}的人一直驻扎在这里。
如果法庭正在开庭，法官和一名保镖（见{@area H4|1cc}）以及其他与正在审理的案件有关的人都在这里。
一个裁判长的布质办公桌面对着一个被告的箱子和三排马桶。
西边的墙上挂着流苏旗帜，描绘着水底城、水底城守卫队和水底城卫队的纹章，以及水底城领主的印章和正义之神泰尔的标志。

entries.name: H6. Downstairs Waiting Room
entries: 预定在法庭上作证的贵族和等待探视囚犯的人被关押在这里。该房间包含以下特点。

items: Two {@creature guard||guards} are on duty in this room at all times.
墙上挂着不匹配的沙发。
旧报纸散乱地堆放在桌子上。

entries.name: H7. Showers
entries: 肮脏的囚犯在被关进牢房之前，会在这里被剥去衣服并进行清洗。墙壁上突出的是铁制的喷嘴，当拉动门旁边的铁链时就会喷出冷水。石头铺成的地板上的排水管使房间不会被淹没。

entries.name: H8. Cell Block
entries: 两名{@creature guard||guards}随时驻守在这个大厅。

entries.name: Locked Cells
entries: 沿着这个大厅有五间牢房。每间牢房的门都是从外面锁上的，驻扎在这里的卫兵持有钥匙。门的锁不能从牢房内撬开。

entries.name: H9. Watch Wagon
entries: 这个房间包含以下特点。

items: Two {@creature veteran||veterans}, members of the City Watch, are here at all times.
一辆装甲马车站在一对由铁条固定的铁门后面。

entries.name: Armored Carriage
entries: 需要两匹马来拉动马车，马车一次最多可容纳8名中囚。马车的后门用铁链和两把挂锁固定。每个值班的老兵都有一把钥匙可以打开其中一把挂锁。

entries.name: Barred Outer Doors
entries: 需要两个人抬起阻挡通往外面的门的栏杆。一个成功的DC21力量（竞技）检查可以使一个人单独完成。

entries.name: Courthouse: Summer
entries: 获得{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}后，人物从下水道出来后不久就被城市守望者逮捕。

entries.name: Under Arrest
entries: The arresting force consists of twelve {@creature veteran||veterans}, a Watch {@creature sergeant|WDH} and eleven constables. They demand that the characters surrender their weapons and come along quietly. For guidance on how to handle character arrests, see "Breaking the Law,".
这些人物被指控扰乱治安，这是一种轻微的违法行为，会被罚款，并会被下达法令。这一指控源于他们在第3次遭遇中的行为，即 "街头追逐"。根据他们在之前的遭遇中的表现，这些人物可能会被指控对城市或市民犯下其他罪行，可能包括无故挥舞武器、抢劫、攻击市民或谋杀。如果他们拒捕，他们会被指控妨碍司法公正。有关此类罪行的处罚，请参见附录C中的法典法律讲义。

那些不慌不忙地交出可见武器的角色不会被搜查，但那些给守望先锋带来麻烦的角色会被搜查出隐藏的武器（并被剥夺任何有可能造成伤害的东西）。一个角色可以通过成功的DC12灵巧（灵巧）检查，将一个微小的物体隐藏起来，不让守望先锋发现。如果在搜索过程中发现了{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}，守望者{@creature sergeant|WDH}会检查它，得出结论说它没有什么问题，并把它还给它的主人。

entries.name: Dock Ward Courthouse
entries: 被逮捕的人物会被带到码头区的法院，并被关在牢房里({@area H8|1d0})直到审判。逮捕期间被拿走的任何物品都会被委托给前台职员（{@area H1|1c8}），等待审判结果。角色在被监禁期间可以进行短暂的休息，并利用这段时间来调整{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}。在{@dice 1d6}小时后，传来消息说法官准备听取人物的证词，于是{@area H8|1d0}的守卫打开了人物的牢房，将他们护送到法庭({@area H5|1cd})，法官正在那里等待。

entries.name: False Captain
entries: 如果卡萨兰特勋爵的{@creature doppelganger}侍从仍然在逃，它就会杀死一名守夜人队长，并利用受害者的制服来冒充角色们以前见过的另一名守夜人队长。然后，二重身化身为Hyustus Staget（见 "守望先锋到来"），徒手杀死了{@area H8|1d0}的守卫，用他们的钥匙打开了人物的牢房。"Hyustus "警告他们治安官是腐败的，并建议他们在被判处死刑之前逃离城市。"Hyustus "提出在他们逃跑的时候代表他们传递信息或重要物品。二重身希望人物能将{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}委托给它保管。如果失败了，它希望在越狱的混乱中从他们手中夺走石头。

If the characters refuse to play along, the doppelganger cries out in alarm, bringing the full weight of the courthouse garrison (ten {@creature guard||guards} and two {@creature veteran||veterans}) down upon the characters, whom "Hyustus" accuses of beating the cell block guards to death. These reinforcements have no reason to believe that Captain Staget isn't who he appears to be, and they side with him in any conflict.

If the doppelganger obtains the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}, it promptly delivers it to {@creature Victoro Cassalanter|WDH}. If the characters extricate themselves from the mess they're in, they can retrieve the stone from Cassalanter Villa (see chapter 6).

entries.name: Meeting with the Magister
entries: 主审法官是翁贝罗-扎斯特罗（Umbero Zastro），一个英俊、能言善辩、心地公正的30多岁的半精灵。他以其精巧的诗意的正义感和非传统的惩罚而闻名。
{@creature Magister Umbero Zastro|wdh}具有{@creature noble}的统计数据，并有这些变化。

items: 他是合法的中立者。
他没有武器，没有装甲（AC11），价值0XP。

He has these racial traits: He has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep. He has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. He speaks Common and Elvish.

entries: 法官已经听取了逮捕人员的证词，以及任何目击者的证词。在他提问的时候，这些人物有一个小时的时间为自己的案子辩护。试图欺骗扎斯特罗的人物必须进行魅力（欺骗）检查，并由魔法师的智慧（洞察力）检查进行反驳。输掉比赛的角色会被认定为妨碍司法公正，被关上一天，并被罚款200金币，以及其他针对城市和市民的犯罪行为的惩罚。那些不能或不愿支付罚款的人将被判处在Amendsfarm苦役一年，Amendsfarm是城市卫队在Undercliff的农场中设立的劳改营。
如果角色犯了一项或多项罪行，他们会被判定有罪并受到相应的惩罚（见附录C中的法典法律讲义）。如果一个角色恳求宽大处理，并在DC14魅力（劝说）检查中获得成功，那么对于那些没有死亡或流放惩罚的罪行，他可以得到另一种惩罚。如果该人物在一个受人尊敬的派别中享有声誉，例如灰衣军（灰手）、翡翠飞地、哈珀人、领主联盟或高塔骑士团，则该检查具有优势。对较轻罪行的替代惩罚包括以下内容。

items: 这个角色必须在警卫的监督下，在当地孤儿院铺床和清洁床单，时间为一个星期。
该角色必须向水手公会的矮人成员莫拉娜-胡尔达克报告，并在她的密切监督下在码头上刮除藤壶，时间为一个工作日。
这个角色必须在接下来的一个月里向驻扎在城墙顶上的卫兵运送30磅重的饮用水桶。
在一个星期内，这个人物必须在每天下午从早到晚站在一个特定的街角，像一个广播员一样，大声喊出他或她被认定的罪行，同时接受市民的责骂和口头鞭打。

entries: 被欺骗而按照二重身的意愿行事的角色可以被原谅在越狱过程中犯下的罪行，但前提是二重身被逮捕或杀死。(可以对被二重身杀死的牢房守卫施法，以获得证词，从而洗脱守卫被杀的罪名。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果一个角色与{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}相契合，它就会显示出龙库的位置，在海区的一座旧塔下面，以及进入龙库所需的三把钥匙。当人物准备好访问该地点时，就进行遭遇战7，"旧塔"。

entries.name: Courthouse: Autumn
entries: 角色们得知费内鲁斯-斯托姆卡斯尔被城市监察局关押在城堡区的一个法院里。如果他们想和他说话，前台的职员会告诉他们，他们必须先安排和魔法师见面，因为访客需要她的书面许可才能见到他。书记员说，与魔法师见面的时间不能早于第二天的上午，但如果贿赂10戈比或更多，就可以说服他把时间提前。
如果人物在有政治影响力的派别中有足够的声望，或者有欺骗的天赋，那么还有其他办法可以替代与魔法师交谈。

items: 一个在哈珀斯至少有4个声望的人物可以说服{@creature Mirt|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}），利用他作为水底世界领主的权力来确保费纳罗斯的释放。{@creature Mirt|WDH}曾在血鹰帮中损失过钱财，所以帮助费纳鲁斯从监狱中逃出来让他深感痛心。
一个在领主联盟中拥有至少4个声望的角色可以在皮尔吉隆的宫殿中安排与{@creature Laeral Silverhand|WDH}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）会面，并说服她给费纳罗斯他想要的东西，以换取关于宝石下落的信息。对她来说，Neverember的龙窖的安全返回比一个旅人的命运更重要。
人物可以故意让自己在城堡区被捕。即使是轻微的犯罪也会导致短暂的监禁，直到魔法师有时间做出判决。在此期间，人物可以尝试与费纳罗斯交谈。
角色们可以尝试使用普通的伪装或魔法潜入法院。冒充官员或使用魔法影响官员是一种犯罪行为（见附录C的法典法律讲义），所以他们必须隐蔽或擅长欺骗。

items.name: Meeting with the Magister
entries: The courthouse magister is {@creature Hester Barch|WDH} (LG female Turami human {@creature acolyte} with Insight +4), a petite woman in her seventies. Magister Barch is slow to anger and fond of sharing lengthy educational anecdotes and parables. Unknown to all but her closest aides, the magister has the innate psionic ability to cast the {@spell detect thoughts} spell without somatic or material components. After using it once, the magister must finish a short or long rest before she can cast the spell again. Wisdom is her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12).
县长不愿意同意任何与费纳罗斯私下会面的请求，理由是他是一个阴暗的、不知悔改的人，而且有逃跑的危险。她允许会面的条件如下。

items: 一个在哈珀斯或领主联盟中拥有至少3个声望的人物，或者一个属于沃特达维亚贵族家庭的人物，提出一个很好的论据，并在DC15魅力（说服力）检查中取得成功。

A character who is impersonating a noble or an official makes a good argument and succeeds on a DC 15 Charisma (Deception) check. If the check fails, Magister Barch sees through the ruse and uses her {@spell detect thoughts} spell to verify that the character is in fact disguised as a noble or an official-a crime that carries a punishment of flogging followed by imprisonment for up to a tenday, plus a fine of up to 500 gp.
一个角色向魔法师讲述了隐藏的龙的藏匿处以及费纳鲁斯在找到它方面的作用。

items.name: Talking to Fenerus
entries: 费内鲁斯-斯托姆卡斯尔（Tethyrian{@creature bandit captain}的N名男性）被关在{@area H8|1d0}的牢房里，等待接受审判。他被指控犯有多项盗窃罪（公路强盗罪）和攻击沃特达维亚公民罪。费内鲁斯知道，在有人向城市守望者通风报信之前，这只是一个时间问题；他怀疑是血鹰帮的另一名成员把他供出来的。这个时机对他来说是不幸的，因为他正计划通过将{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}交给他的卢斯坎特联系人来赚取一笔小钱。现在，他计划用这块石头来逃脱监禁，并将自己的犯罪记录抹去。
如果人物能够接近他并与他交谈，费纳鲁斯拒绝透露石头的位置，直到他被释放并获得对他过去罪行的豁免权。他知道主事的魔法师或水底世界的领主有权力给他想要的东西。

巴奇院长会考虑默许费内鲁斯的要求的唯一条件是，角色们必须说服她，让她相信这样的决定对水底世界有好处。为了达到这个目的，他们必须使用魔法来诱惑她（这是一种犯罪行为，一旦效果消失，施法者很可能会被逮捕），或者他们必须告诉她龙库和被盗黄金的事情。无论哪种情况，她都坚持在放他一马之前试一试：在短暂的休息之后，她让人把费内鲁斯带到她的法庭上，询问他关于石头的事情。她偷偷地用她的{@spell detect thoughts}法术扫描他的表面思想，试图分辨出石头的位置。鉴于石头在费内鲁斯的脑海中占据了首要位置，法官巴奇得知了石头的藏身之处，并将这一信息与其他人物分享，然后将费内鲁斯送回他的牢房。

items.name: Where's the Stone?
entries: 费纳鲁斯把{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}藏在码头区的一座旧塔的顶层--一座被屏蔽了所有形式魔法的塔。如果他被释放了，他愿意带领人物去塔里，或者提供方向让他们自己去找。

items.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果角色们知道了费纳鲁斯把石头藏在哪里并去找它，那么就继续进行遭遇战7，"老塔"。

entries.name: Encounter 9: Cellar Complex
entries: 地窖和下水道隧道交错在一起，在沃特迪普地下形成了小型地牢。这些建筑群有以下特点。

items: 天花板和门洞有7英尺高。
没有光源。

entries.name: Areas of the Cellar Complex
entries: 下面的位置是以地图4.7为关键。该建筑群有三个不同的部分：下水道隧道（B1-B3区）、南部地窖（B4-B9区）和北部地窖（B10-B11区）。

entries.name: B1. Sewer Access
entries: This chamber has stone steps and a locked, iron-bound wooden door with a sign mounted on it that reads, in Common, "SEWER ACCESS: AUTHORIZED CITY OFFICIALS ONLY." The door to {@area B2|1e3} is locked. The lock can be picked by a character who makes a successful DC 17 Dexterity check using thieves' tools, or the door can be forced open with a successful DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check. City Watch captains hold keys to sewer access points that correspond with their assigned wards.

entries.name: B2. Sewers
entries: Fresh sewage flows along a trough that runs parallel to a stone walkway. The sewage is 3 feet deep. Any creature immersed in it for 1 minute must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become infected with {@disease sewer plague} (see "Diseases" in chapter 8 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg}).
在隧道的分支处，一座石桥横跨从东部动脉中涌出的污水。这条通往B3和B4区的动脉通道中没有走道。

entries.name: B3. Secret Doors
entries: Secret doors blend with the surrounding stonework on opposite sides of this sewer tunnel. One door opens into {@area B7|1e8}, the other into {@area B10|1f0}. Characters who have a passive Perception score of 15 or higher spot both secret doors as they pass by. Otherwise, finding a secret door requires a search of the wall and a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check. The secret doors are set high enough that opening them doesn't cause sewage to flow into adjoining areas.

entries.name: B4. Rusty Iron Door
entries: 在一个干燥的、1英尺宽的石台上面，一扇生锈的铁门被镶嵌在墙上。门的锁早就腐蚀了，打开时门在生锈的铰链上发出响亮的吱吱声。

entries.name: B5. Arrow Slits
entries: 这个房间在某个时候增加了一个带箭缝的砖墙。箭缝的设计是为了让弓箭手能够以{@area B4|1e5}的速度向进门的入侵者射击。箭缝提供了四分之三的掩护。

entries.name: B6. Storage Room
entries: 一扇没有上锁的木门关闭了这个空房间。

entries.name: B7. Rubble-Filled Cellar
entries: 一堵墙倒塌了，在两个较小的房间中形成了一个较大的空间。空气中弥漫着灰尘，地上散落着瓦砾、垃圾和老鼠粪便。

entries.name: Secret Door
entries: The secret door to {@area B3|1e4} is easily spotted from this side (no check required).

entries.name: B8. Sunken Cellar
entries: 这个下沉式地窖有这些特点。

items: 一扇未上锁的铁门镶嵌在东墙上。
靠南墙的一个破旧的石阶爬上了一个平台，那里有一扇用铁链和挂锁锁住的木门。

entries.name: Iron Door
entries: 门打开后是一个空旷的小储藏室，天花板上挂着钩子。

entries.name: Stairs Up
entries: 使用小偷的工具，通过DC15的灵巧检查，锁可以被撬开，或者通过DC20的力量（运动）检查，门可以被撬开。这扇门通向一间木板房后面的小巷。

entries.name: B9. Rat-Infested Cellar
entries: These rooms are situated below a hostel ({@chance 75|75 percent chance}) or an orphanage ({@chance 25|25 percent chance}). Harmless rats crawl about, minding their own business.

entries.name: B9a
entries: 石头楼梯爬了10英尺，来到一扇木门前，这扇门通向一条街道或小巷。堆放在楼梯底部的板条箱和木桶里有可食用的食物，但没有其他有价值的东西。

entries.name: B9b
entries: 一扇普通的木门通向一个房间，里面存放着布满灰尘的家具。这些家具包括一张被划伤的木桌，几把摇晃的椅子，一个衣架，两张小桌子，以及一个空的木箱。有一个{@chance 25|25 percent chance}的家具（随机确定）是一个{@creature mimic}，它通常以老鼠为食，但从不放弃大餐。

entries.name: B10. Old Tavern Cellar
entries: 这个宽敞、空旷的地窖有以下特点。

items: 石柱和拱门支撑着天花板。
在半截墙的两边有不匹配的石块，表明这个区域曾经是两个独立的房间。
石头楼梯爬到一个用砖头砌成的门口。(这扇门曾经通向一家老酒馆后面的小巷）。

entries.name: Secret Door
entries: The secret door to {@area B3|1e4} is easily spotted from this side (no check required).

entries.name: B11. Back Cellars
entries: These rooms are extensions of {@area B10|1f0}.

entries.name: B11a
entries: 这个房间曾经是一个酒窖。它的墙壁上堆满了腐烂的木头（储存架）和破碎的瓶子。

entries.name: B11b
entries: 这个空荡荡的房间曾经是一个冷藏室和根窖，被灰尘和蜘蛛网所窒息。

entries.name: Cellar Complex: Spring
entries: The characters have learned that a halfling necromancer named {@creature Losser Mirklav|wdh} took the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}. He lives in a cellar complex under a powdered wig shop in the Trades Ward. The shop, Dandymops, is closed and locked with an iron gate. The lock can be picked by a character who makes a successful DC 15 Dexterity check using thieves' tools, or the gate can be forced open with a successful DC 25 Strength (Athletics) check. Since the shop is in a highly visible location, an attempt to break into it is 75 percent likely to be noticed by someone who alerts the City Watch. Two {@creature veteran||veterans} of the City Watch arrive in {@dice 1d10} minutes to investigate the shop and talk to witnesses.

{@creature Xanathar|WDH}'s {@creature gazer|VGM} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}) doesn't follow characters into the shop. It remains outside and waits for Xanathar Guild forces to arrive. If the characters destroyed the gazer in an earlier encounter, another one arrives with the Xanathar Guild forces.

entries.name: Dungeon Entrance
entries: {@area B1|1e2|u}是假发店的地下室，也是人物进入地窖群的地点。

entries.name: Misty Sewers
entries: 外面的浓雾在下水道里沉淀，B2、B3和B4区域被轻度遮挡。

entries.name: Necromancer
entries: {@creature Losser Mirklav|wdh}是一个光脚半身人{@creature mage}，有这些变化。

items: He is chaotic evil and has 31 ({@dice 9d6}) hit points.

He has these racial traits: He is Small, and his walking speed is 25 feet. He can move through the space of a Medium or larger creature. He has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}. He speaks Common and Halfling.
He has the {@spell animate dead} and {@spell blight} spells prepared, instead of {@spell counterspell} and {@spell greater invisibility}. All his spell slots are currently expended.

entries: 洛瑟带着一本用缝制的肉装订的法术书，里面有他所有准备好的法术。他还有一把挂锁门的钥匙，装在{@area B8|1ea}和{@dice 4d10}金币里，装在精灵皮肤制成的袋子里，用矮人头发编织的绳子束缚着。
洛瑟对该建筑群进行了一些改变。

items: {@area B6|1e7|u}包含三张床--两张是为洛瑟的人类学徒准备的，另一张是为他准备的小床。
{@area B10|1f0|u}包含12个{@creature skeleton||skeletons}攻击除Losser和他的学徒以外的人。
{@area B11|1f2|u}包含成堆的从死亡之城偷来的人骨。洛瑟还没来得及给它们做动画。

entries.name: Where's the Stone?
entries: Before the characters reach Losser, kenku members of the Xanathar Guild break down the door leading into the cellar complex via {@area B8|1ea} and confront the necromancer. The characters find Losser cowering in one corner of {@area B7|1e8}. Two {@creature skeleton||skeletons} stand between him and three {@creature kenku}. The kenku aim to kill the halfling. Lying on the floor around them are four dead kenku and the remains of two destroyed (and previously animated) skeletons.

If the characters demand the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}, Losser tells them the truth: he surrendered it to the kenku, two of which fled south with it. In {@area B8|1ea}, the characters see one {@creature kenku} standing over the bodies of Losser's murdered human apprentices, Retchyn and Kreela. This kenku is joined by {@creature Xanathar|WDH}'s {@creature gazer|VGM} (see {@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}). The kenku and the gazer try to hold off the characters for as long as possible, buying time for a second kenku to flee with the Stone of Golorr.
If the characters pursue the stone and leave Losser alive, he eventually slips away and retreats to {@area B11|1f2}.

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 一旦人物在地窖里打败了{@creature Xanathar|WDH}的部队，他们就可以追赶逃跑的Kenku，它把{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}抓在手里。继续进行遭遇战3，"街头追逐"。

entries.name: Cellar Complex: Summer
entries: 当孩子们窜入码头区下面的下水道时，这些人物正在紧追三个街头顽童。

entries.name: Sickening Smell
entries: The summer heat makes the sewer smell worse than usual, and characters become {@condition poisoned} by the stench unless they cover their noses with perfumed scarves. The effect lasts until they leave the sewers. The street urchins and other creatures that live in the sewers are accustomed to the smell and aren't {@condition poisoned} in this way.

entries.name: Search for the Urchins
entries: 角色们从东边接近地窖群，最终来到下水道通道一侧的一个铁门前（{@area B4|1e5}）。

The street urchins took the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} to {@area B7|1e8} (which serves as their clubhouse), entering the room through a secret door ({@area B3|1e4}). The eldest child, {@creature Nat|WDH}, attuned to the stone, but contact with the aboleth so terrified her that she dropped it, screamed, and ran away. The boys were panicked by her reaction and fled as well, leaving the stone in {@area B7|1e8}. If the characters open the door at {@area B4|1e5}, they startle the children on the other side, causing them to scream at the top of their lungs.
通过其他孩子的沟通，{@creature Nat|WDH}告诉他们她把石头丢在哪里，并警告他们石头是 "活的"。她和男孩们都不急于再看它。

entries.name: Chair Today, Gone Tomorrow
entries: If the characters head to {@area B7|1e8}, they see the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} underneath a wooden rocking chair. If the street urchins are present, one of them asks, "Where'd that rocking chair come from?"
这张摇椅是{@area B9b|1ef}的{@creature mimic}。它听到了海胆的尖叫声，并进行了调查，希望能抢到一份简单的食物。它攻击任何伤害它或把手伸向石头的人。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 一旦人物获得了{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}，他们就可以离开这个地窖群。继续进行遭遇战8，"法院"。

entries.name: Cellar Complex: Autumn
entries: The characters have been encouraged to explore a Xanathar Guild hideout under the Southern Ward. They enter the location through {@area B1|1e2}. The Xanathar Guild Roster table provides a summary of the forces stationed throughout the complex. The sections that follow describe some of the hideout's features.

entries.caption: Xanathar Guild Roster
rows: 1个{@creature Half-Ogre (Ogrillon)||half-ogre}在喝了六桶廉价酒后变成了{@condition poisoned}。
3个{@creature duergar}和1个{@creature gazer|vgm}(见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12})站岗，而{@creature Thorvin Twinbeard|wdh}(见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12})在机械须弥上工作（见下文 "机械须弥"）。
Korgstrod Uxgulm，{@creature duergar}领袖(40点命中率)，坐在石椅上，有3个{@creature kobold||kobolds}随从(见下文 "欺骗之石")
7 {@creature troglodyte||troglodytes} 潜伏在阴影中的人
1个{@creature gibbering mouther}守卫在{@area B11b|1f4}的宝箱(见下文 "宝箱")

entries.name: Mechanical Beholder
entries: A mechanical beholder built for the Day of Wonders parade lies on its side in {@area B7|1e8}. {@creature Xanathar|WDH} wants this mechanical version of itself to hover over the crowd, reminding the Lords of Waterdeep of the beholder's superiority, but no one can figure out how to make it fly. A character can use an action to try to activate the machine, doing so with a successful DC 10 Intelligence check. The activated beholder shoots dazzling lights from its eyestalks for 1 minute and then stops working.
如果在地窖里发生战斗，{@creature Thorvin Twinbeard|wdh}会从{@area B8|1ea}的楼梯上逃出来，用钥匙打开通往外面的门。他对驻扎在这里的其他生物没有忠诚度。

entries.name: Stone of Deception
entries: Korgstrod Uxgulm, the duergar leader, has what he believes to be the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}. He found it during a search of Fenerus's house in the Trades Ward. This stone is a clever imitation. It's gray and ovoid with streaks of black, but has no magical powers. Korgstrod has been unable to attune to it and assumes he's unworthy of it, not that the stone is fake.
Korgstrod计划在适当的时候把石头交给{@creature Xanathar|WDH}，在那之前他不会心甘情愿地放弃它。他用鞭子鞭打他的哥布林奴才，让他们保持一致。如果科布林受到攻击，这些胆小的科布林就会逃到下水道里，否则就会在他面前畏缩。

entries.name: Treasure Chest
entries: An old, locked chest in the back of {@area B11b|1f4} can be opened by someone who makes a successful DC 13 Dexterity check using thieves' tools. The chest contains 277 cp, 135 sp, a spherical gold beholder pendant with tiny gems for eyes (worth 250 gp), and a {@item spell scroll} of {@spell darkvision}.

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 无论他们是否找到了假石头，角色们都没有什么办法，只能在码头区的七张面具剧院向 "Laeral "咨询。如果他们去了那里，请继续进行遭遇战6，"剧院"。

entries.name: Encounter 10: Converted Windmill
entries: 这座摇摇欲坠的两层石制建筑在它周围的城市兴起之前很久就已经是一座风车了。除非区域描述或遭遇另有说明，否则以下特征适用。

items: 房间有15英尺高的天花板，有10英尺高的通道和7英尺高的门洞连接。
门是木制的，封闭的，没有上锁。
墙壁上布满了涂鸦，石头地板上散落着垃圾和残渣。窗户是没有玻璃的空铅框。
没有光源。

entries.name: Areas of the Converted Windmill
entries: 以下地点与地图4.8相呼应。

entries.name: W1. Stone Staircase
entries: 一组弯曲的石阶爬上了20英尺的上层。楼梯上布满了鸟粪、破碎的屋顶瓦片、泥土和霉菌。

entries.name: W2. Squatters
entries: 在春天、夏天和冬天，这些房间里都住着{@dice 1d6 + 1}棚户区居民({@creature commoner||commoners})，他们用旧家具和从垃圾堆里打捞出来的东西为自己做窝。棚户区居民并不是来找麻烦的。
为了得到一些食物或硬币，棚户区居民可以引导或带领角色到上层的上锁公寓（{@area W7|20d}），并描述公寓里的居民。角色也可以通过成功的DC10魅力（恐吓）检查来确保寮屋居民的合作。

entries.name: W3. Privy
entries: 门外只不过是地板上的一个洞，从那里升起一股可怕的臭味。

entries.name: W4. Weak Ceiling/Floor
entries: 区域{@b W4a}在区域{@b W4b}的正下方。上层房间的地板会在第一个走过它的小型或大型生物的重量下坍塌。拥有石匠特质或精通石匠工具的人物可以看出地板是不安全的，无法行走。
当W4b区域坍塌时，任何站在该区域地板上的生物都会坠落20英尺，落在W4a区域。天花板塌陷时，W4a区的任何生物都必须做一个DC11的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到4({@dice 1d8})坠落碎片的重击伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。

entries.name: W5. Ancient Millstone
entries: 一块古老的磨石躺在一片杂乱的碎片下，其中包括机器和倒塌的屋顶碎片。灰尘和蜘蛛网覆盖了一切。

entries.name: W6. Pigeon Roosts
entries: 这些房间的屋顶有很大一部分已经塌陷，留下了鸟类和降水可以进入的洞。地板上到处都是碎瓦片、鸟粪、残破的家具和其他残渣，几十只鸽子在发霉的椽子上栖息。

entries.name: W7. Secure Apartment
entries: 这个房间的北门被装上了一把闪亮的新锁，使用小偷的工具，通过DC15的灵巧检查，就可以撬开。这扇门也可以从房间里打开，或者在成功通过DC20力量（竞技）检查后强行打开。
该公寓维修良好，包含以下特点。

items: 一张木质框架的大床靠着一面墙，上面有干净的床垫。(在床的旁边，西墙上有一扇没有上锁的门，通往{@area W8|20e}。)
窗户最近被修理过，在涂过油的铁铰链上安静地摇开。
在窗户的对面，靠墙站着一个木制衣柜。

entries: 衣柜里有四套干净的衣服，两件灰色的斗篷，一把沉重的十字弓，以及一个装有二十支弩箭的木箱。

entries.name: W8. Back Room
entries: 这个房间正上方的那段锥形屋顶大部分已经坍塌，房间里充满了瓦砾。这里的空间刚好可以打开门。

entries.name: Converted Windmill: Spring
entries: The key that the characters found in the mausoleum leads them to an old windmill in the Southern Ward. Volkarr Kibbens and Urlaster Ghann (NE male Illuskan human {@creature commoner||commoners}) are hiding out in a secure apartment on the upper floor ({@area W7|20d}). In combat, they wield shovels that deal damage as clubs. Each carries {@dice 3d6} gp in a pouch.

Volkarr and Urlaster were recently hired by {@creature Losser Mirklav|wdh}, a halfling necromancer, to help him break into mausoleums in the City of the Dead. They undertook the job because the pay was good, but they have no loyalty to the necromancer. If the characters confront them, Volkarr and Urlaster attack, but they surrender quickly if overwhelmed and share the following information in exchange for their lives and freedom:

items: {@creature Losser Mirklav|wdh}和他的两个人类学徒Retchyn和Kreela，住在贸易区下面的一个地窖里。通往他们巢穴的路是通过雷琴的粉状假发店，这家店叫Dandymops。
洛瑟正在从死亡之城偷取骨头，以创造一支动画骷髅军队。(沃尔卡和乌拉斯特都不知道原因）。
在Garloth陵墓，Losser杀死了一只老鼠，并拿走了它身上的小石头。这只老鼠死后就消失了，而洛瑟认为这块石头有魔力。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 一旦人物开始寻找半身人死灵法师，就继续进行第9个遭遇，"地窖情结"。

entries.name: Converted Windmill: Summer
entries: 这些人物前往南区的一座破旧的建筑，那里曾经是一个风车。在那里，他们预计会发现{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}被两个奸诈的{@creature cult fanatic||cult fanatics}所控制，这两个人分别是阿恩-沙隆达（LE男性泰特里亚人）和塞菲亚-纳伊莱克（LE女性泰特里亚人）。

entries.name: Cult Fanatics
entries: 阿恩和塞菲亚在{@area W7|20d}等待，他们把那里当作公寓。他们把公寓的门一直锁着。他们已经清除了(1%)的杂物，并在地板上用血画了一个五角星。在五角星的两端有五个黑色的蜡团--燃烧过的蜡烛的残骸。

Lord Cassalanter sent Arn and Seffia on a mission to retrieve the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} from his family's mausoleum. He also gave them secret orders to dispose of three other members of the cult whom he couldn't trust to keep quiet about the stone. Arn and Seffia would be horrified to learn that they failed in so simple a task; they try to correct their mistake by killing Vaelle Lurval if she's with the party (see "Mausoleum: Summer").

entries.name: Devils' Arrival
entries: As characters try to break into the cult fanatics' apartment, three {@creature spined devil||spined devils} arrive. The devils fly to the tower, knock on the apartment window, and are let inside by Seffia, whereupon Arn gives one of them the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}. When the characters enter, they see the devils fly off with the stone. The cult fanatics do everything in their power to enable the devils to escape.

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果角色们对付了邪教的狂热分子，他们可以通过跑过屋顶来追赶逃跑的脊柱魔鬼。继续进行遭遇战5，"屋顶追逐"。

entries.name: Converted Windmill: Autumn
entries: 这座古老的石制风车在一个多世纪前被改造成住宅，现在已经年久失修了。一位古怪的沃特达维亚艺术家住在这里，自从她的真爱抛弃了她之后，她就变得不一样了。住宅里没有寮屋。
外面的门总是锁着的。使用盗贼工具的角色可以通过成功的DC15灵巧检查来撬开锁，或者通过成功的DC15力量（运动）检查来砸开一扇门。任何试图闯入塔楼的行为都有75%的可能被{@creature Kalain|wdh}的邻居看到或听到。八名（1%）城市守望者在10分钟后到达，调查入侵事件。

entries.name: Let Me Paint You a Picture
entries: {@creature Kalain|wdh}，一位著名的沃特达维亚画家，在公元1475年被委托为达古特-纽文伯勋爵，当时沃特达维亚的公开勋爵，画一幅肖像画。她与纽文伯的会面标志着一段持续了一年多的炙热爱情的开始。他送给她的众多礼物之一是位于海区的一座庄园。
随着达古特对永夜的访问越来越频繁，时间越来越长，他们的关系也动摇了。他对{@creature Kalain|WDH}的承诺没有兑现，当她提出忠诚承诺的话题时，他对她的态度很差，因为他的真爱是永夜城。在达古特被拒绝后，{@creature Kalain|WDH}变得很愤怒，转而去画那些在她心中代表他的怪物。她驾驭 "编织 "的能力附着在她的作品结构上，使她有能力根据命令让这些怪物活过来。
最终，纽文伯利用他的影响力毁掉了{@creature Kalain|wdh}她，并使她与沃特德普的上流社会离婚。她被允许保留她的家，但她的作品和她的声誉被慢慢地、有条不紊地摧毁了。(1%)的精神被击垮，导致了疯狂的发生。现在她把自己关起来，满足于让时间侵蚀她最后的良知。她总是把达古特和水底世界看成是一个整体，而现在它们都是她的死敌。

entries.name: Visiting the Residence
entries: {@creature Kalain|wdh}在陌生人面前无法表现得有礼貌，因为她认为他们都是达古特-纽伦堡派来谋杀她的刺客。唯一和她相处融洽的人是Vhaspar Holmdreg（伊鲁斯坎男性人类（1%）），他在住宅的西翼租了一个房间，并在圣劳普森临终关怀医院的北病房工作，该医院是痛苦之神伊尔马特的神庙。瓦斯帕是一个七十多岁的老人，因白内障而半盲，每周给她送两次食物，冬天每周送三次柴火，每隔几个月送一次绘画用品。Vhaspar有一把钥匙，可以打开{@creature Kalain|WDH}住所的外门。

除了{@area W5|20b}之外，每个房间都陈列着{@creature Kalain|WDH}的画作之一。要确定任何一幅画的主题，请掷出{@dice d12}，并查阅绘画主题表。一个主题有可能会出现不止一次。住宅里也爬满了老鼠。如果{@creature Kalain|WDH}受到攻击，这些害虫会组成六个{@creature swarm of rats||swarms of rats}来保护她。

entries.name: Kalain
entries: {@creature Kalain|wdh} spends most of her time in {@area W5|20b}, which serves as her studio. It contains moldy scraps of food, empty pots stained with colored paint, discarded brushes, and her easel, which is situated in front of a large, lead-paned window in the north wall. Upon the easel rests a fresh painting of a {@creature displacer beast}. If the characters confront her, {@creature Kalain|WDH} accuses them of being assassins, brings the displacer beast to life, and commands it to attack them.
{@creature Kalain|WDH}是一个半精灵{@creature bard|VGM}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}），有这些变化。

items: 她是混乱的邪恶。

She has these racial traits: She has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep. She has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. She speaks Common and Elvish.
她没有休息之歌的特质，而是拥有艺术模仿生活的行动选项。

entries.name: Art Imitates Life (3/Day)
entries: {@creature Kalain|wdh}触碰她的一幅画，使其主体涌现出来，成为一种生物，只要其CR为3或更低。该生物出现在画作5英尺范围内的一个无人空间，画作变成空白。该生物对(1%)的人友好，对所有其他人都有敌意。它以主动权来决定它何时行动。1分钟后，当它的命中率降至0时，或当{@creature Kalain|WDH}死亡或倒下{@condition unconscious}时，它将消失。

entries.name: Path to the Vault
entries: 在W4a区的地板上有一个沉重的石质活板门，只要对房间进行彻底的搜索，并成功地进行DC12智慧（感知）检查，就可以发现。拉开门可以看到一个石阶，它下行120英尺，到达一个20英尺宽的走廊，走廊又延伸了60英尺，在通往龙之谷的门前结束。{@creature Kalain|wdh}和Vhaspar对金库和通往金库的活板门一无所知。

entries.name: Converted Windmill: Winter
entries: 一个名叫{@creature Thrakkus|wdh}的邪恶龙裔将田野区的一个被火烧过的旧风车改成了一个肉店。作为屠夫公会的成员，{@creature Thrakkus|WDH}有一个有利可图的副业。忠于{@creature Manshoon|WDH}的镇民付钱给{@creature Thrakkus|WDH}，让他把他们杀的人剁成肉酱，而他则偷偷地卖掉这些肉。随着死冬日的到来，这种肉的需求量很大。尸体在夜深人静时被送到他那里，最常见的是由西德拉-罗梅尔（见第8章，{@area K2|3db}）用草泥马拉着的有盖小车送来。

entries.name: Butchery
entries: 在{@creature Thrakkus|wdh}屠房的门上挂着一个红色的木牌，看起来像一把屠刀，它占据了西翼最西边的房间。屠宰场在冬天是冰冷的，散发着肉和血的味道。一块沾满血迹的砧板占据了整个房间，墙上摆放着用血色羊皮纸包裹的切肉架子。地板上血迹斑斑，布满了碎肉。
{@creature Thrakkus|WDH}在晚上挂上门锁。撬锁需要使用盗贼的工具成功地进行DC15灵巧检查。也可以用成功的DC18力量（竞技）检查来强行打开门。

entries.name: Larder
entries: 屠宰场旁边的房间被改造成了一个储藏室，其门在任何时候都被挂上了锁。上锁的门与屠宰场的门（见上文）是一样的。和屠宰场一样，储藏室在冬天也很冷，有肉和血的味道。六具半冻的人形尸体堆放在靠近西墙的10英尺见方的帆布篷布下。{@creature Thrakkus|wdh}还没来得及把它们切开。

entries.name: Squatters
entries: 龙裔允许棚户区居民居住在他的家里。那些能做琐碎家务的人被放过，并被喂以熟肉的残渣；其余的人最终被砍死。这些无家可归的家伙太{@condition frightened}{@creature Thrakkus|wdh}了，不敢说他的坏话，而城市守望者似乎并不关心在田野区犯下的罪行。

entries.name: Thrakkus the Butcher
entries: 屠夫没有时间去受愚，而这些人物都是傻子，因为他们插手他的生意。{@creature Thrakkus|wdh}一天的大部分时间都在屠宰场。黄昏时分，他回到自己的公寓，在那里一直待到天亮，或者直到有人带着尸体来敲门。{@creature Thrakkus|WDH}带着肉店、储藏室和他公寓的钥匙（{@area W7|20d}）。
{@creature Thrakkus|wdh}是一个拥有红龙血统的龙裔{@creature berserker}，有这些变化。

items: 他是混乱的邪恶。
他有这些种族特征。他可以用他的行动呼出一个15英尺的火锥（但在他完成短期或长期休息之前不能再次这样做）；火锥中的每个生物都必须做一个DC13的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到{@dice 2d6}火的伤害，救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。他对火灾伤害有抵抗力。他能说普通话和德拉科尼亚语。

entries.name: Where's the Stone?
entries: {@creature Thrakkus|wdh}把{@item Stone of Golorr|WDH}藏在最近一次送肉到贸易区的一条小巷里。{@creature Thrakkus|WDH}没有保留他的非法交易记录，所以人物必须审问他或住在他住所的一个平民。
{@creature Thrakkus|WDH}是好战的，不急于放弃他的Zhent朋友。需要一个{@spell charm person}咒语或类似的魔法来迫使他开口。他的住户则是另一回事；一旦龙裔屠夫不再是他们福祉的一个因素，他们就会迅速翻身（2%）以保住自己的皮。无论是哪种方法，都能得到以下信息。

items: {@creature Thrakkus|WDH}的最后一批肉被运到贸易区的一家叫卡特尔肉馅饼的商店。它位于一条小巷中。
这批肉是由屠夫协会的一个名叫贾斯丁-拉斯克的成员送来的。{@creature Thrakkus|WDH}支付了额外的硬币，以看到它 "快速和安静地 "被送到。
拉斯克有一辆血迹斑斑的马车，他用它在野外病房外送货。

entries: 这些人物可能在自己与屠夫公会的交易中认识贾斯丁-拉斯克（见 "公会代表样本"）。

entries.name: Next Encounter
entries: 如果人物沿着送肉的线索前进，则继续进行遭遇战1，"小巷"。

entries.name: Vault Keys
entries: At the end of an encounter chain, a character who is attuned to the {@item Stone of Golorr|WDH} can learn the location of the Vault of Dragons and what three keys are needed to open its doors. The artifact also reveals that an adult gold dragon named {@creature Aurinax|WDH} guards the vault.
打开金库所需的三把钥匙由你选择或通过在金库钥匙表上滚动来随机确定。虚幻版本的钥匙不能打开门。
每把钥匙都可以在沃特迪普找到或获得。如果人物还不知道钥匙的位置，他们可以收集关于它的信息。要做到这一点，一个角色必须花1天时间和5金币来研究一把钥匙的位置。在这一天结束时，该角色进行DC 15智力（调查）检查，如果成功就能知道钥匙的位置。如果检定失败5次或更多，主要的恶棍就会知道这次搜索，并派出走狗来攻击人物，如果可能的话，从他们身上夺取戈罗尔之石。

items: {@creature Xanathar|WDH}派出五名{@creature goblin||goblins}装扮成戴着巨魔面具的儿童和{@creature bugbear}({@chance 70|70 percent chance})，或四名{@creature wererat||wererats}的人形({@chance 30|30 percent chance})。

卡萨兰特人派出两只{@creature imp||imps}的乌鸦形态，三只人类{@creature cultist||cultists}，以及一只人类{@creature cult fanatic}({@chance 70|70 percent chance})，或四只{@creature spined devil||spined devils}({@chance 30|30 percent chance})。

{@creature Jarlaxle Baenre|WDH}发送{@creature Fel'rekt Lafeen|WDH}和{@creature Krebbyg Masq'il'yr|WDH}，或另外两个Bregan D'aerthe{@creature drow gunslinger|WDH|drow gunslingers}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}），以及六个{@creature drow}。

{@creature Manshoon|WDH}派出了四个Zhent {@creature martial arts adept|VGM|martial arts adepts}（见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12}）。有一个{@chance 50|50 percent chance}，这些振特人是由{@creature Manshoon|WDH}的一个副官领导的，如果他们还活着的话，就是维维特-黑水或阿戈恩-福科（见第八章，{@area E8|425}）。

entries.name: Key Descriptions
entries: 下面将按字母顺序进一步描述金库钥匙表中所列的钥匙。

entries.name: Adamantine bar
entries: The characters can purchase a 10-pound adamantine bar for 1,000 gp. The genasi smiths {@creature Embric|WDH} and {@creature Avi|WDH} (see chapter 2, {@area T3|09d}) can acquire one if the characters think to ask them.

entries.name: Animated Construct
entries: Any creature of the construct type works as this key, provided the creature hasn't been destroyed or rendered inoperable. If the characters have befriended {@creature Valetta|wdh}, the dragonborn priest of Gond (see chapter 3), she happily releases Nim the {@creature nimblewright|wdh} into their custody until they no longer have need of it. An object animated by the {@spell animate objects} spell also qualifies as this key.

entries.name: Beardless dwarf
entries: 大多数女性矮人都是没有胡子的，因此符合条件。一个男性矮人NPC可以被说服剃掉他的胡子，这可以作为打赌失败的结果或得到某种补偿的结果。角色们也可以为他们俘虏的男性矮人剃须，或者与他们有某种关系的男性矮人。

entries.name: Beholder eyestalk
entries: 眼柄不需要来自真正的、活着的看守者。它可以从一个填充的beholder（见 "Old Xoblob Shop"）身上摘取，或者从一个较小形式的beholderkin身上获得，比如一个凝视者或一个旁观者。眼柄也不需要被分离出来。{@creature Xanathar|WDH}(见{@adventure appendix B|WDH|12})很乐意陪同人物去金库，如果那是保证得到它那份财宝的方法。无论它与角色的安排如何，"它的份额 "相当于所有的财宝。换句话说，一旦金库被解锁，{@creature Xanathar|WDH}就会背叛党派，除非有强大的NPC（如{@creature Laeral Silverhand|WDH}或{@creature Vajra Safahr|WDH}）在场，以控制这个疯狂的看守者。

entries.name: Bronze Dragon Scale
entries: Zelifarn, a young bronze dragon, has taken up residence in Deepwater Harbor. Many sailors and dock workers have seen the dragon, and {@creature Grinda Garloth|WDH} (see "Encounter 2: Mistshore"), owns an apparatus of Kwalish that characters can use to search for the dragon. Characters who go looking for Zelifarn find him lurking inside a shipwreck 120 feet underwater. As the characters approach the wreck, Zelifarn comes out and tries to scare them away. (He's not done searching the wreck for treasure.) He inflicts harm only in self-defense. A successful DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check or an offer of treasure worth at least 1,000 gp convinces the dragon to talk with the characters and part with one of his scales. If the characters mention the contents of the Vault of Dragons, Zelifarn demands a promise of 10 percent of the gold before he gives them what they came for.

entries.name: Cask of dwarven ale
entries: 一桶矮人啤酒可以在沃特迪普的任何一个市场上以5戈比轻松获得。角色们有可能买到不是矮人制造的山寨品牌。任何矮人角色都可以通过品尝来区分真正的矮人啤酒和假货。

entries.name: Drunken elf
entries: Any elf who is {@condition poisoned} from drinking alcohol qualifies as this key.

entries.name: Gems worth 1,000 gp
entries: 只要一颗或多颗宝石的总价值在1,000金币以上，就有资格成为这把钥匙。这些宝石可以在冒险过程中找到，也可以在沃特德普的市场上购买。

entries.name: Gift from a queen
entries: {@creature Laeral Silverhand|WDH}，沃特德普的开放领主，曾经是一个叫做斯托南特的古老王国的女王。角色们可以通过成功的DC20智力（历史）检查来回忆这个事实，或者通过信息收集来了解它。他们可以通过{@creature Jalester Silvermane|WDH}或{@creature Mirt|WDH}请求与拉罗尔会面。Laeral给了他们一份礼物--大法师Elminster亲手送给她的羽毛笔--如果他们承诺将被盗的黄金归还给Waterdeep的国库。

entries.name: Invisible creature
entries: 任何受到{@spell invisibility}法术影响的生物都算作这把钥匙，自然{@condition invisible}的生物也是如此。

entries.name: Painting of a dwarf miner
entries: 一个矮人矿工的画作，价格为{@dice 5d10}gp，可以在角色花时间搜索艺术商店时找到。一个精通画家用品的人物可以创作出一幅符合这个关键的画。完成这幅画需要{@dice 3d6}小时。

entries.name: Pair of bugbear ears
entries: The Xanathar Guild employs {@creature bugbear||bugbears}, and characters can chop the ears off any of them. A live bugbear also counts as this key.

entries.name: Performance of "Your Beardy Face"
entries: The dwarf love song, "Your Beardy Face," is a duet performed by bagpipers. The characters can obtain this music easily for 1 gp and hire two performers to play the piece for 10 gp each. A character who has proficiency with bagpipes can perform the song, though a successful DC 10 Charisma (Performance) check using bagpipes is required for the performance to count as this key. A glass jar in Cassalanter Villa (see chapter 6, {@area C3|2f2}) plays this song when it is uncorked.

entries.name: Severed drow hand
entries: This ghastly key can be forcibly obtained from a member of Bregan D'aerthe or some other dark elf. If the characters have encountered no drow, they might hear rumors that {@creature Xanathar|WDH} employs a drow advisor.

entries.name: Shapechanger
